Enoothong Rangsah rah ih heh suh liita, “Nakcho uh, Jekaria! Rangte ih an rangsoom chaat eta, an minuh suh no miwasah an raangtaan ih koh ah. An ih heh men ah Joon et men theng.
Heh tupsa doh tumthan tenroonjih ang ah an raangtaan ih ah, erah damdoh wahoh loong uh tumthan ih tenroon ang ah!
Joon ah Teesu miksok doh elong mina esiit ang ah. Heh ih kham naktoom mok jok ah. Heh phang doktup damdam heh ah Esa Chiiala pan ang ah,
eno heh ih Ijirel mina loong neng Teesu Rangte ko ih ngaak thoksiit ah.
Khowah Elija likhiik ih heh uh Teesu nganah chaan aphaan lam ih ban kah ah. Heh ih hewah heh sah loong we jun songtong thuk rum ah; heh ih Rangte jeng daante loong asuh kateng lampo jatthuk ah; heh ih Teesu mina loong heh raangtaan ih ban khookham thiin ah.”
Jekaria ih Rangsah asuh liita, “Emah mok ang abah ngah ih mamet jat ang? Ngah ah teekaang nih nga minuh uh wikuh ih hoonla nih.”
“Ngah Gabrel,” Rangsah rah ih ngaakbaatta. “Ngah Rangte pandi chaplang, heh ih ngah an suh arah Ruurang Ese ah baat suh kaat thuk halang.
Enoothong an ih nga jengkhaap ah tahanpi ko, heh rangwuung thok ha doh amiisak ih langte lek ang kano ah. Nga jengkhaap lahanpi thoidoh an tami jengko ang uh; ngah ih an damdi kakham hala ah amiisak maang langlang an suusu ih tong uh.”
Erah tok adi miloong ah ih Jekaria ah ban sok ruh ih rum ano Rangteenok ni saatang tumjih thaam eha ih paatja rumta.
Jekaria dokkhoomha no neng damdi heh tami waanta, eno neng ih jat rumta Rangteenok nok ni mot amang hetupta eah. Khaapsiit uh lami dongjeng thoi heh lakthaak pamaak ih waan rumta.
Heh Rangteenok ni rangsoom phansiit saapoot ah thoon ano, Jekaria heh nok ni ngaakwangta.
Eno rekam ritdi heh minuh Elijabet rah heh sah dong wokta, eno laabanga heh nok nawa tadok khoomta.
Heh ih liita, “Nga Teesu ih hethoondi kok chosok halang. Heh ih ngah noksong dung nah rakri theng taat angtang rah toonhaat ha!”
Elijaabet sah la arok wok adi Rangte ih Rangsah Gabrel Galili samnuh Najaret hadaang adi daapkaatta.
Heh ih jaalah esiit suh tiitkhaap baatjih angta, jaalah ah Dewid luungwang sutoom Josep damdi nook suh kakhat muicho angta. Heh men ah Meeri angta.
Rangsah ah ra haano heh suh baatta, “Khooteng toomtong uh! Teesu an damdi heh ih romseetam koh halu!”
Meeri ih Rangsah jeng ah chaat ano rapne ih mongsaamta, eno erah jengkhaap ah tumjih suh liita ih paatjaata.
Rangsah ih liita, “Nakcho uh, Meeri; Rangte ih an minchan ih halu.
An sah wokte anglu eno miwasah et tup uh, heh men ah Jisu et men uh.
Heh ah elong angte eno heh suh Elong Echoong ni tongte Rangte sah et li ah. Teesu Rangte ih heh ah luungwang et hoon ah, heh te Dewid likhiik ah,
eno heh ah Jaakob sutoom dowa rootang raang ih luungwang ang ah; Heh hasong ah babah uh lathoon thang angte!”
Meeri ih Rangsah asuh liita, “Ngah roibaamuh jaalah boh ah. Erah mamah maami ang ah?”
Rangsah ih ngaakbaatta, “Esa Chiiala an sak nah raaha, eno Rangte chaan ah ansak nah tong raaha. Erah raangtaan ih esa noodek asuh Rangte Sah et poon ah.
An sano Elijabet ah taat samthun thaak uh. Heh suh samuh nuh ih kaliitan ah, amadi heh sah la arok angla, wikuh ih hoon adi nep ah.
Rangte lajen reejih tumjih uh tajeeka.”
“Ngah ah Teesu laksuh,” Meeri ih liita; “An ih baattu jun ih toom ang raaha nga sak nah ah.” Eno Rangsah ah mat khoomta.
Erah lilih Meeri phangla ih kong akaan deek Judia ko nah kaat suh dokchapta.
Heh Jekaria nok ni nop kah ano Elijabet suh jengseeraata.
Elijabet ih Meeri jengseeraata ah japchaat damdam, heh mong nawa noodek ah jaapmota. Elijabet ah Esa Chiiala pan angta
eno erongwah ih jengta, “An ah minuh loong dungni romseetam choh cho mina, erah dam ih an ih tupte noodek asuh uh romseetam choh cho!
Arathan elong ah nga taang ni mame ang raak kohala, Teesu nuh anep nga jiinni jen chomui jih ah?
An jengseera ah japchaat damdam, nga mong nawa noodek ah nep roon ano wookla.
Teesu jengkhaap ah ansak nah amiisak ih ang raaha ih hanpi thoidoh an tumthan ih tenroonte anglu!”
Meeri ih liita, “Nga ten ih Teesu ah phoong ha;
nga pangte Rangte suh nga la roonla,
tumeah heh ih ngah, ehin laksuh ah dokthun thoi ah! aadowa ih miloong ah ih ngah suh tenroon mina et poonhang,
tumeah Chaan apaan Rangte ih nga raang ih elongthoon moot ah reekot thoih ah. Heh men ah Esa;
roosiit tokkhodi roosiit Heh ih heh soomtuute asuh minchan noisok ha.
Heh ih chaan apaan pan lak ah janghaat ano engaam ete loong nyia neng tenthun mongtham ah phaang thukla.
Heh ih chaan apaan luungwang loong ah neng tongtheng nawa dattong thuk ano; ehin loong ah toonjoh ah.
Heh ih ramtekte suh phaksat ese koha, eno changteng loong ah lak huung daap haat ha.
Heh ih sengte sengwah suh kakham thiinta rah reeta, eno heh laksuh Ijirel ah chosok ra hala.
Heh ih sengte Abraham nyia heh sutoom satoom loong asuh, rootang raang ih minchan noisokta ah samthunha!”
Meeri ah Elijabet damdi laajom roongtongta eno heh nok ni ngaakwangta.
Elijabet sah tup rangwuung thok haano, heh sah ah miwasah ih tupta.
Hekhuung hetok nyia heh joonte sano loong ah ih chaat rum ano Teesu suh tumthan ih seela ih phoong rumta, eno neng ah heh damdi rapne ih roong roon rumta.
Noodek ah saasinet ang adi, neng ah khoopkhan banlam hoon suh ra taha, eno heh men ah Jekaria, heh lilih et men theng ih liirumta.
Enoothong heh nuh ih liita, “Tah angka! Heh men Joon et men theng.”
Eno neng ih heh nuh asuh baat rumta, “Enoothong erah bah ante anwah men tah angka!”
Eno neng ih heh wah suh neng tokmoot damdi cheng rumta, an ih mamet men ih doh se ah ih thunhu.
Jekaria ih eraangtheng jonglo ah suh ano, raangta, “heh men ah Joon.” Eno mirep rapne ih paatja rumta!
Erah tok adi Jekaria we mi dongjengta, eno Rangte rang ah phoongta.
Hekhuung hetok joonte loong ah neng cho dongta, eno erah ruurang ah Judia hah kong akaan noongrep ni thok ruurang kata.
Warep ih erah tiit ah chaat rum ano samthun rumleh cheng et rumta, “Arah noodek ah mamah ih dong hakte angla?” Tumeah heh sak ni Teesu chaan aphaan ah samkhikhih angta.
Joon wah Jekaria ah Esa Chiiala pan angta, eno heh ih Rangte jengkhaap ah baatta:
“Seng Teesu ah phoong ih Ijirel Rangte rah ah! Heh mina loong pang raangtaan ih ra taha eno neng ah puipangta.
Heh ih seng suh chaan aphaan pan Khopiipangte kojah hali, Heh laksuh Dewid sutoom dowa ah.
Heh ih teewadi esa khowah loong damdi thoom hoonta
Heh ih seng piiara nawa panghe, seng miksukte hang achaan nawa jen toonpang raang ih ah.
Heh ih liita sengte sengwah loong ah heh ih tenthet et ah eno heh ih esa nuumiijeng ah dokthun ah.
Sengte sengwah Abraham, suh kakhamta Heh ih seng piiara loong nawa pang et he eno seng ah heh mootkaat ah lacho thang ih moh thuk he,
<range>
eno ba seng ah heh ngah nah esa nyi epun jen ang ih seng roidong tang ih ah.
“Nga sah, an ah, Elong Echoong Rangte khowah ih poonho. An Teesu nganah kah uno heh raangtaan ih lam ban tan kah uh,
heh mina loong suh neng rangdah loong ah biin anaan rum ano neng khopui tiit ah baat suh ah.
Seng Rangte ah minchan nyia tenthet Rangte. Heh ih khopiiroidong ah rangsa phaakla likhiik ih phaak thukla,
eno rang nawa ih warep kaangtook ah laamang nyia etek lampo ni tongte loong rah ah, seng khooteng lampo nah khoom thuk raangtaan ih ah.”
Noodek ah hansi nyia chiiala ni rongtangtang ih hakta. Ijirel noksong damdi chomui suh rangwuung maang thokthok Joon ah woma mong ni tongta.
Erah tokdi Luungwanglong Agastas ih Roman noksong loongtang rookweh thuk ano neng men ah le ni raangthiin thuk rumta.
Erah phang raang et thukta tok adi, Siria hate Kobono ah Kurinus angta.
Eno, warep ih neng teewah men ah, maama hah ni raangwan rumta.
Josep ah Galili hah Najeret nawa, Dewid luungwang tup hadaang Judia hah Betlehem ni kata. Tumeah Josep ah Dewid sutoom angta.
Josep ih Meeri heh suh nook raang ih kakhatta damdi, heh men ah wak raang wanta. Heh ah sakjih angta,
eno neng Betlehem ni ang tokdi, nootup rangwuung ah thok taha.
Heh sah phangkhoh rah miwasah eh tupta, eno nyuh rah ih khoon ano maan tokkhuung ni jupthiinta naangjam nok laje thoi eah.
Erah deek adi mararah saapriimte loong rangphe pheetang ih phek ni, neng saapsah loong ban sok rumta.
Rangsah rah neng reeni dongchapta, eno Teesu chaan ah neng khothung ni phaakta. Eno neng ah rapne ih cho rumta,
enoothong Rangsah rah ih liirumta, “Nakcho an! Ngah aradi sen suh Ruurang Ese huijah halang, erah ih mina loongtang suh rapne tenroon thuk ah.
Chiinyah Dewid hadaang ni sen pangte tupta—Teesu Kristo ah!
Eno sen suh erah jatthuk han: sen ih noodek esiit nyuh ih khoon ano maan tokkhuung nah jupthiin arah tup an.”
Baphuk ih heh damdi rangsah loong hantek ih rang nawa dong taha, eno boongkaat lam ih Rangte rangphoong rumta:
“Rangte chaan ah echoong thoon rangmong ni phaakjaaja, erah dam ih hah nah semroongroong ang thuk ah heh thunghaanla loong asuh ah!”
Rangsah loong ah neng re nawa rang ni ngaakwangta adi, saapriimte loong ah neng chamchi ni waan rumta, “Betlehem nah kah ih no, erah ni tumjih angla Teesu ih baat tahe loong ah sokkah ih.”
Eno neng ah echaan ih Meeri nyia Josep reeni karum ano noodek ah maan tokkhuung ni jupthiin arah japtup karumta.
Saapriimte loong ah ih heh ah sok rum ano, Rangsah ih noodek tiit tumjih baatta loong ah neng suh we toombaat rumta.
Saapriimte loong ih baatta rah japchaatte loong ah paatja ih rumta.
Meeri ih erah loong tiit ah dokthun ano rapne ih samthunta.
Saapriimte loong ah ngaakwang rum ano, neng ih tup rumta nyia chaat rumta loong asuh boongkaat damdi neng Rangte ah phoongpha rumta; erah ah rangsah ih mamet baat rumta jun ih angta.
Saasinet lini noodek ah heh khoopkhan banlam hoontok thok kohaano, heh ah Jisu et men rumta, marah rangsah ih heh nuh mong ni maangje tokdi dook ban menta men rah ah.
Moses Hootthe ih baatta jun ih Meeri nyia Josep, sak saasiit hoon banlam saapoot ah thok ih taha. Eno nyi noodek ah Jerusalem hadaang ni Teesu suh baat kokaat suh huikaat nyuuta,
erah langla Teesu Hootthe ni raangthiin cho angta: “Warep ih ephangtup ela phokhothoon noodek ah Teesu suh kottheng.”
Erah damdi nyi ih tokparusah enyi adoleh wotuupi enyi, Teesu Hootthe jun ih nyi siik hoon et koh nyuuta.
Erah tokdi Jerusalem hadaang ni mih wasiit heh men ah Simoon songtongta. Heh ah wase nyia Rangte ra choote mina angta, eno Ijirel mina loong khopui suh heh ih Rangte ah ban sok ruh eta. Esa Chiiala ah heh damdi angta
erah dam ih heh suh Teesu ih thoomhoon cho Kristo ah maang tuptup an tatiiko ih kakhamta.
Chiiala ah ih siit ano Simoon ah rangsoomnok ni wangta. Heh jaatang ih khobaang Jisu ah rangsoomnok ni Hootthe ih jamha jun ih piijah nyuuha di,
Simoon ih noodek ah heh lakkhoni toonpi ano Rangte suh lakookmi liita:
“Teesu, an ih thoomhoon jengdang ah thiincho, eno an laksuh ah semroongroong et kaat thuk uh.
Nga mikmik ih an jiin dowa khopiiroidong ah tup ih hang,
marah an ih loongtang pandi hoon thiin tu rah ah:
Jehudi lah angte loong suh an tenthun ah jathuk suh weephaak ah phaak ah no an mina Ijirel loong tenroon ih phaakjaaja ang rum ah.”
Simoon ih Jisu tiit baatta ah chaat nyu ano heh nuh nyi wah ah paatja ih nyuuta.
Simoon ih nyi suh romseetam koh nyuuta no heh nuh Meeri, suh baatta, “Arah noodek ah Rangte ih danje cho Ijirel loong thet haat nyia khopiipang raangtaan ih ah. Heh ah Rangte mikthe ang ano warep mina ih heh thetbaatte totoh ang ah
erah thoi ih neng husah tenthun loong ah dongjat ah. Eno an ten ah langtheh ih dook arah likhiik, sattiiti ih sat uh.”
Teewadi khonuh wikuh, thaknuh heh men ah Anna, Ashir nok hate Phanual sah angta. Heh sawah suh nookta dowa ih paang sinet ba angta eno heh miwah ah tiita. Heh paang rook asat paang baji angta. Heh ih Rangteenok ah babah uh tathiin haatta; rangwuung rangphe heh Rangte rangsoom, nyi samurangsoom ih tongta.
<range>
Erah pootdi Anna thok haano Rangte suh jengseeraata. Eno Jerusalem ah Rangte ih piipang et ah ih bansokte loong asuh noodek tiit ah baatta.
Josep nyia Meeri ih Teesu Hootthe ih jamta loong ah jen khom hoon thiin nyu ano, nyi hah Galili ni Najaret hadaang adi ngaak wang nyuuta.
Noodek ah rongkopkop ih hakta; mongtham ese ah heh jiinni hantek angta, eno Rangte ih heh suh romseetam kota.
Paang rookwih Jisu jaatang ah Khopui Kuwaang di Jerusalem ni bankah ruh kah ih rumta.
Jisu asih paang nyi ih hak adi, neng erah kuh adi paang hoh dowa likhiik ih karumta.
Kuh ah thoon kano neng ah ngaak wang ih rumta, enoothong noodek Jisu ah Jerusalem ni tangtongta. Erah ah heh jaatang ih tajat rumta;
neng ih thunta heh ah sengdung ni eje heh angla eah, rah thoi neng henih nitang mokkhoom rumta eno Rekamdi neng joonte sano dung ni phang jam sok rumta.
Neng ih Heh ah tajap jam rumta, erah thoih ih neng Jerusalem ni ngaakwang rum ano eni jam sokwang rumta.
Saajom di neng ih heh ah Rangteenok ni japtup rumta, Jehudi nok hate nyootte loong damdi, neng jeng boichaat nyia neng suh chengphi damdi tong arah ah.
Warep ih heh tiit chaatte loong ah epaatja ih rumta heh ih jatwah jenglam ih ngaakbaat rum kano ah.
Heh nuh nyi wah ah doonmoot ih rumta heh ah tup rum ano ah, eno heh nuh ih liita, “Nga sah, an ih tumjih hoon wan halu? “Sek ah anwah ah rapne ih sootsaam thuk haliitih, an ah noongrep ni taat tum jam sok hiitih.”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Ngah set ih tumet suh jam sok hali tih? Set ih tanih jattansih ngah seng wah nok ni eah?”
Jisu ih ngaakbaat rumta ah neng ih tajen samjat rumta.
Eno Jisu ah neng damdi Najaret ni roong ngaakwangta, heh nuh nyi heh wah jeng chaatchaat ah. Erah di mamah angta erah loong ah heh nuh ih heh tenni lomthun ruh eta.
Jisu ah hansi nyia ese mongtham ni choocho ih hakta, mina nyi Rangte uh heko ih roopta.
Luungwanglong Teberius ih asih paang banga phansiit adi; Pontius Pilat ah Judia ni Kobono angta, Hirod ah Galili phansiitte angta, heh no Philip ah langla Ituria nyia Trakonite phansiitte angta; Lisania ah Abilini hadaang phansiitte angta,
eno Annas nyia Kaiphas ah romwah phokhothoon ang nyuuta. Erah tokdi phisaang hah ni Jekaria sah Joon suh Rangte ih jengkhaap baatta.
Eno Joon ih Jordaan Juungko ni Rangte tiit ah tumbaat kaatta, “Sen rangdah nawa ngaak hanno juungtem an, eno ba Rangte ih sen rangdah ah biin anaan han.”
Erah ah khowah Isaia leedap ni raangthiin cho angta: “Mih phisaang hah ni riingla; ‘Teesu raang ih lam ban hoon thiin an; Heh khoomtheng lamjun ih tan an!
Hoongbeng haleng loong ah ebook et ah, kong akaan loong ah hoongthung hane ih hoon ah. lam koongkot loong ah lamjun ih hoon ah, lamthih loong ah lamse ih hoon ah.
Rangte jiin nawa khopiiroidong ah warep ih tup ah!”
Miloong hantek Joon ih juungtem toom tem he ih ra rum taha. Joon ih liirumta, “Pu sen loong ah!” “O ih baat tahan Rangte ih echamnaang theng daapkaat ha dowa sen epui etheng eah?
Rangdah nawa elek elang ih sen reeraang pakna nawa ih noisok anbah. Sen chamchi nah seng Abraham sutoom ih laklak nakwaan an. Abraham sutoom bah Rangte ih jong ah toon ano botseh jen hoon et ah!
Bang hehing nah joot haat suh chaang ah ban thiin et ha; hetiikmuh bang loong ah joot haat ano we nah haattak ah.”
Miloong ih heh suh cheng rumta, “Erah ang abah, seng ih tumjih et theng ah?”
Heh ih ngaakbaat rumta, “O di samsong enyi jeela esiit ah samsong mute suh kotjih, erah damdi o di phaksat jeela rah ih pheekot et theng.”
Mararah sokse seete nep juungtem ra taha, eno cheng rumta, “Nyootte, seng ih tumjih reejih ah?”
Eno Joon ih baat rumta, “Sokse mathan seejih ah erah ba se an erah tokkhodoh ehan nak mook se an.”
Mararah sipaahi ih nep heh suh cheng rumta, seng ih aleh? Tumjih etjih ah? Heh ih baat rumta, “Mih dowa ngun chaan ih nakmok suh an adoleh mih lathika doh ethih etu ih nak nan an. Sen ngun la di mathan cholan erah suh roon an.”
Mina loong ah ih choocho ih dong laalom rumta, eno neng ih Joon asuh Kristo tam angla ih thun rumta.
Eno Joon ih loongtang suh baat rumta, “Ngah ih juung nawa ih juungtem rumhala, enoothong nga lini mih wasiit nga nang ih elong raaha. Ngah bah heh lakhoop pak taajoh tha uh taliikang. Heh ih bah Esa Chiiala nyia we nawa ih juungtem han.
Heh jiinni nunrek je ah, erah ih raan ah dannun ano pung nah toonthiin ah, eno hephaang loong ah we nah babah uh lamettheng adoh tak ah.”
Joon ih hejaat hejaat lam nawa ih miloong asuh Ruurang Ese ah nyootsoot leh neng roidong ah elek raangtaan ih baat rumta.
Enoothong Joon ih Kobono Hirod asuh liita, tumeah heh ih Hirodias heh no minuh ah, kapta, erah damdi uh ethih loong ephoop reeta.
Hirod ih Joon ah phaatak ni sakta rah boot thetreeta.
Miloong juungtem lini, Jisu ih nep heh juungtem ah we temta. Heh ih rangsoom adi, rang kaasak ah daap eta,
eno Esa Chiiala ah hansi ni wotuupi likhiik heh khothung ni datpura taha. Eno rang ni root esiit dongjengta, “An ah nga mongnook sah. Ngah an suh eroon elang.”
Jisu heh mootkaat phangmota tokdi, Heh ah paang rookjom taan angta. Heh ah miwasah, erah raang ih miloong ih, Josep sah ih thunta, Josep ah Heli sah angta,
Heli ah Mathat sah, Mathat ah Leewi sah, Leewi ah Melki sah, Melki ah Jannai sah, Jannai ah Josep sah,
Josep ah Mattathias sah, Mattathias ah Amos sah, Amos ah Nahum sah, Nahum ah Esli sah, Esli ah Naggai sah,
Naggai ah Maath sah, Maath ah Mattatthias sah, Mattatthias ah Semin sah, Semin ah Joseek sah, Joseek ah Joda sah,
Joda ah Joonan sah, Joonan ah Resa sah, Resa ah Jerubabel sah, Jerubabel ah Siltiel sah, Siltiel ah Neri sah,
Neri ah Melki sah, Melki ah Addi sah, Adidi ah Kosam sah, Kosam ah Elmadiam sah, Elmadiam ah Er sah,
Er ah Josua sah, Joshua ah Eliijer sah, Eliijer ah Jorim sah, Jorim ah Matthat sah, Matthat ah Leewi sah,
Leewi ah Simoon sah, Simoon ah Judah sah, Juda ah Josep sah, Josep ah Joonam sah, Joonam ah Elaikim sah
Elaikim ah Melea sah, Melea ah Menna sah, Menna ah Mattatha sah, Mattatha ah Nathan sah, Nathan ah Dewid sah,
Dewid ah Jiisi sah, Jiisi ah Obed sah, Obed ah Booj sah, Booj ah Salmon sah, Salmon ah Nason sah,
Nason ah Aminadab sah, Aminadab ah Admin sah, Admin ah Arni sah, Arni ah Hejron sah, Hejron ah Perej sah, Perej ah Judah sah
Juda ah Jaakob sah, Jakob ah Isak sah, Esak ah Abraham sah, Abraham ah Terah sah, Terah ah Nahor sah,
Nahor ah Serug sah, Serug ah Reu sah, Reu ah Peleg sah, Peleg ah Eber sah, Eber ah Sela sah,
Sela ah Kiinan sah, Kiinan ah Arphaksad sah, Arphaksad ah Sem sah, Sem ah Nuah sah, Nuah rah Lameek sah,
Lameek ah Methuselah sah, Mathuselah ah Enook sah, Enook ah Jared sah, Jared ah Mahalalil sah, Mahalalil ah Kenan sah,
Kenan ah Enosh sah, Enosh ah Seth sah, Seth ah Adam sah, Adam ah Rangte sah.
Jisu Jordaan juung nawa Esa Chiiala pan ih ngaakwang taha eno moong achaang ih phisaang hako ih siit kaatta,
erah di heh saarookbaji Hakhoh juungbaan ih phate kaatta. Erah tokdi heh ih tumjih taphaksata, erah raangtaan ih hethoon sa adi heh ah ramtek angta.
Hakhoh juungbaan ah ih liita, “An Rangte sah anglu bah, arah jong ah baanlo et hoon thuk thaak uh.”
Eno Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Rangteele ni liiha, ‘Mina ah phaksat nawa ih laklak tathingka.’”
Eno hakhoh juungbaan ah ih kongchoong ko ih siitwan ano mikkhojaap siit di mongrep hasong loong ah sok thukta.
“Nga ih an suh arah loong chaan nyia nyamka ah koha,” Hakhoh juungbaan ih heh suh baatta. “Arah loong ah ngah suh kotahang, eno nga ih o suh thunghaan ang erah suh ejen kot et ang.
Loongtang arah loong ah an raangtaan ang ah, an ih nga soomhang bah ah.”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Rangteele ni liiha, ‘An Teesu Rangte rang aba soom uh eno heh raangtaan ih laklak ba moh uh!’”
Erah lidi Juungbaan ah ih Jerusalem ni siitkaat ano Rangteenok nok khochoom thoon adi, siitwan ano baatta, “An Rangte Sah ang ubah, aadowa an teeteewah taat pit thaak uh.
Tumeah Rangteele ni amet liiha, ‘Rangte ih Rangsah loong asuh an ese tham ih ban kooncha thuk suh baat ah eah.
Erah di amah nep et liiha, ‘Rangsah loong ih an neng lak ih banjoh hoono an lah taan uh jong nah tajap satnak thuk ru eah.’”
Enoothong Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Rangteele ni liiha an Teesu Rangte ah an ih nak taari uh.’”
Juungbaan ih Jisu ah jaatrep lam nawa ih jen joonnaam phate ano, heh erah dowa pootsiit raangtaan ih dokkhoom kata.
Eno Jisu Galili ni ngaakwangta, Esa Chiiala moong achaang ah heh damdi angta. Heh tiit ah harep ni ruurangta.
Heh ih Jehudi rangsoomnok ni nyootsoot rumta eno warep ih guuta.
Erah lidi Jisu ah heh haktheng hadaang Najaret adi wangta, erah damdi Jehudi naangtongsa adi saahoh dowa likhiik Jehudi rangsoomnok ni wangta. Heh ih Rangteele ah wet suh toonchapta
eno khowah Isaia leedap ah heh suh kota. Heh ih Rangteele ah ja ano marah di raangta erah ah japtupta,
“Teesu Chiiala ah nga damdi, tumeah heh ih ngah ah changthih loong suh Ruurang Ese baatkaat suh danje tahang. Ekhak eha loong daap haat tiit ah baat suh daapkaat tahang nyia edook loong suh neng mik ih japtup thuk suh, mih lakhu ni chamte loong ah pang raangtaan ih ah
nyia saapoot ah chang ela ih baat suh daap tahang erah saadoh Teesu ih heh mina loong ah epang et ah.”
Eno Jisu ih Rangteele ah khoon ano, heh jeng chaatte asuh ngaak koh, ano tongta. Jehudi rangsoomnok nawa miloong ih heko totoh ih sok rumta,
eno heh ih neng suh baatta, “Arah Rangte jengkhaap ah chiinyah amiisak ih thok hala, erah wetang adi boichaat tan rah ah.”
Neng ah heh suh rapne ih seechoh rumta heh jengkhaap ah laangpopoh ih chaat rum ano epaatja nep ih rumta. Eno liirumta, “Arah Josep sah ah tam angla?”
Heh ih neng suh baatta, “Ngah ih jat ehang sen ih arah tiitthaak ah ngah suh nyootbaat ette, ‘Phonwah, ih an teeteewah deesiit uh.’ Sen ih Kapernum ni japchaat tan ah likhiikkhiik ngah suh uh arah nga hadaang adoh re thuk suh baat ette ang hali.
Ngah ih arah baat rumhala, Jisu ih boot baatta, “Khowah ah heh hadaang nah babah uh taseechoka.”
“Nga jeng ah boichaat an: arah amiisak tiit Elija tokdi Ijirel ni thaknuh ephoop angta, paang jom paangthom rangphaat laphaat thang angta adi ah nyia harep ni ramkhah angta tok adi ah.
Ang abah uh Elija rah Ijirel ni o reeni uh takaat thukta, Sidoon juungkhuung Jarephat hadaang dowa thaknuh jiin adi luulu ba kata.
Erah damdi eni engam loong ephoop angta Ijirel ni khowah Elisa angta tokdi ah; ang abah uh o uh tade rumta, Siria nawa Naaman luulu ba deeta.”
Jehudi rangsoomnok nawa miloong ih erah chaat rum ano, neng ah ekhat ih rumta.
Neng ah toonchap rum ano, erah samthung dowa Jisu ah dok hoom kaat rumta, eno samthung kongchoong ni angta dowa kaang adoh dat haat suh ih thun rum ano taat hoom wan rumta,
ang abah uh Jisu ah miloong laktung adi dokkhoom ruh ih kata.
Eno Jisu ah Galili ni Kapernaum samthung adi kata, Jehudi naangtongsa adi Heh ih miloong asuh nyootsoot rumta.
Heh ih nyootsoot karumta asuh miloong ah rapne ih paatja rumta, tumeah heh ih chaan aphaan lam ih baat rumta.
Jehudi rangsoomnok ni Chiithih laakhah pan mih wasiit angta; heh erongwah ih riinghuungta,
“Aah! Tumjih et he seng ah, Najaret nawa Jisu oh? An aadi seng thet haatte nih ah? An o ah nga ih jat ehala: an ah Rangte Esa kongphaak huite!”
Jisu ih Chiithih laakhah asuh baatta, “Nak hoopti uh arah wah sak dowa suusu ih dokkhoom ho!” Laathih rah ih mih ah neng ngathong ni loonghaat thiin ano tumjih uh lah et thang heh sak dowa doksoon kata.
Miloong ah rapne ih paatja rum ano neng chamchi ni waan rumta, “Arah tumjaat jengkhaap ah? Arah mih rah ih chaan aphaan lam ih laathih asuh baat kano, neng loong ah doksoon karum arah ah!”
Eno Jisu tiit ah erah hah adi noongrep ni ruurang kata.
Jisu ah Jehudi rangsoomnok nawa dokkhoom ano, Simoon nok ni kata. Simoon hopnuh ah sokwi ih rapne satta, eno neng Jisu damdi erah nuh tiit ah roongwaan rumta.
Jisu ah heh reeni chap wang ano sokwi khoisat ah dokphanta. Sokwi ah laan de ruh eta, eno erah damdam heh ah laan saatsoon ruh eta, eno neng suh phak asat nep jamjaang korumta.
Rangsa lup lini loongtang ih neng joonte hephan dowa khoisatte loong ah Jisu reeni thutsiit jarum taha; warep sak ni heh lak ih taajoh leh deesiit et rumta.
Laathih loong ah uh warep sak nawa doksoon leh riinghuung erumta, “An juuba Rangte sah ah!” Jisu ih laathih loong ah tajeng thuk rumta, tumeah neng ih jat et rumta heh ah Kristo eah.
Erah saalih rangkhano di Jisu erah hah dowa hatik ni kata. Miloong ah ih heh ah laan matjam ruh et rumta, eno neng ih japtup rum ano heh ah lakaat thuk suh thun rumta.
Enoothong heh ih baat rumta, “Ngah ih Ruurang Ese Rangte Hasong tiit ah hahoh nah nep uh ebaatjih jaatjaat, tumeah erah raangtaan ih Rangte ih ngah ah kaat thuk tahang.”
Erah raang ih heh ih Jehudi loong rangsoomnok harep ni Rangte tiit ah baatta.
Saasiit Jisu Genisaret juungsitum kaang ni chap adi miloong ah heh reeni Rangte tiit chaat suh tuutmui rumta.
Heh ih khoonkhuung enyi juungkaang ni chaakwah loong ih neng chaak saachot kaat pootdi hoomthiin arah japtupta.
Khoonkhuung esiit adi Jisu ah dung tongta—erah langla Simoon Khoonkhuung angta—eno heh suh amasah juungko nah hengtuut suh baatta. Jisu ah Khoonkhuung adi tong ano miloong asuh nyootsootta.
Heh ih jen thoon nyootsoot rum ano, Simoon suh baatta, “Khoonkhuung ah juungsitum echoong koh et tuut uno, an joonte loong damdoh nyah joot suh chaak ah ha an.”
“Nyootte, “Simoon ih ngaakbaatta, “Seng ih pheetang taat haati takapke. Ang abah uh an ih li ubah, ngah ih eha et ang.”
Neng ih chaak ah haata eno nyah loong ah hantek ih chaak laan ranpat ruh taantaan ih nyaanta.
Erah raang ih neng ih khoonkhuung esiit dowa neng joonte ah neng lak khoh ih jap rum ano nyah loong ah roong joot thuk suh poon rumta. Neng wangrum taha adi nyah loong ah khoonkhuung nep luppat arah ih meeta.
Eno Simoon Pitar ih tumjih angta rah loong ah sok ano, Jisu ngathong ni heh lakuh di tong ano baatta, “Nga re nawa hengkhoom uh, Teesu! Ngah rangdah mina!”
Simoon nyia heh joonte loongtang rapne ih paatja rumta nyah loong hantek ih kap rum ano ah.
Simoon joonte Jebidi sah Jeems nyia Joon, uh paatja ih nyuuta. Jisu ih Simoon suh liita, “Nakcho an; adowa ih bah sen ih mina joh an.”
Neng ih Khoonkhuung ah juung saangkook ni hoomthiin rumta, jirep thiinhaat rum ano Jisu lini roong phankhoom rumta.
Saasiit Jisu samthung esiit ni ang adi mih wasiit engam angta. Eno heh ih Jisu ah tup ano, heh lakuh di kotbon ano liita, “Chuupha, an ih thunhang bah, saatsiit weehang!”
Jisu ih heh lak ah janghaat ano taajota. “Ngah ih an deesiit suh thun ehala,” Heh ih liita. “De uh!” Erah damdam erah wah ah laan de ruh eta.
Jisu ih heh suh baatta, “O suh nak baat uh, erah nang ih bah romwah jiinnah phangla ih kah uno heh ih toomhuk sokje ho; eno ba mih ih de etu ih jat ho, Moses ih baatta jun ih an khosa ah koh et kaat uh.”
Ang abah uh Jisu ruurang ah noongrep ni ehan han ih huk ruurang katta, eno miloong hantek heh jeng boichaat suh nyia neng khoisat de thuk suh lomthok rum taha.
Ang abah uh Jisu ah, hatik ni rangsoom dokkhoom kata.
Saasiit Jisu ih nyoot rum adi, mararah Pharisi nyia Hootthe Nyootte loong erah di roongtongta Galili samthung nyia Judia nawa eno Jerusalem nawa ra rumha rah ah. Teesu chaan ah Jisu damdi mih khoisat deesiitjih eje angta.
Mararah mina ih hiimuung juptheng ni thokpi rum taha, eno neng ih nokmong ni noppi leh Jisu ngathong adoh thiinwan suh taatthun rumta.
Mih hantek ang tungthoidi, nokmong nah noppi suh lam tachoh rumta. Erah raangtaan ih neng ih nok khoni piiwan rum ano poohoom rum ano, juptheng pan ih miloong laktung Jisu ngah thong adi datthiin rumta.
Jisu ih neng erathan tuungmaang rumta ah sok ano, heh ih mih asuh liita, “Nga joonwah, an rangdah loong ah biin anaan et halu.”
Hootthe Nyootte nyi Pharisi loong ah neng mongmong ni phang huthun rumta, “Arah mih ah o angla Rangte kaanju tiit baat ha! Rangte luulu baalek ah mih rangdah jen biin anaante ah!”
Jisu ih neng tenthun ah jat ano baat rumta, “Sen ih emah tumet suh thunhan?
‘An rangdah ah biin anaan et taho,’ ih baat ah elaang nih ang ah, adoleh ‘Saat uno khoom uh’ ih baat ah elaang nih ang ah?
Ngah ih sen suh ejat etthuk rumha, erah ang abah ah, Mina Sah adi arah hah dowa mih rangdah jen biin anaan theng chaan eje eah.” Eno heh ih hiimuung wah asuh baatta, “Ngah ih baat hala, saat uh, an juptheng ah toonpi uno an nok nah wang uh!”
Erah damdam erah mih ah neng ngathong ni toonchapta, heh juptheng ah toonpi ano, heh nok ni Rangte ah phoongpha ano wangta.
Neng ah loongtang rapne ih paatja rumta! Echo damdi neng ih Rangte rangphoong rumta, “Chiinyah tumthan epaatja jih seng ih japtup hi!”
Erah lidi, Jisu dokkhoom kah adi, sokse seete wah heh men ah Leewi, apit ni tong arah japtup kata. Jisu ih heh suh baatta, ‘Nga lih ah phanhang.”
Leewi ih jirep thiinhaat ano, heh lilih ih roong toonkhoomta.
Eno Leewi ih heh nok ni kamkam saroom ih hoon ano Jisu ah poonta, eno wen loongdung adi sokse seete loong nyi wenhoh loong hantek angta.
Mararah Pharisi nyia Hootthe Nyootte loong ih Jisu liphante loong suh cheng rumta “Sen ih sokse seete nyia rangdah mina loong damdi mamet phaksah han?” Neng ih chengta.
Jisu ih ngaakbaat rumta, “Mih eseete ih Phonwah ah tajamka, khoisatte ih ba jam ah.
Ngah ih jatwah loong ah elek toom ih rum ah ih tapoon ra rumrang, erah nang ih bah rangdah mina loong poon ra halang.”
Mararah mih ih Jisu suh liita, “Joon liphante nyia Pharisi liphante loong ah uh samurangsoom etong rumla; enoothong an liphante loong ah ih jok phaksah ruh et rumha.”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Sen ih kuhoon sa doh jalakapte wah pandoh wen loong ah samuh ngaakdaap ah ih nih thunhan? Emah tah angka!
Enoothong kuhoonte warah neng re nawa toonsiit wan saakaan ah thok eha, eno erah doh ba neng samurangsoom tong ah.”
Jisu ih arah tiitthaak tiit nep wakbaatta: O eh uh samsong ena rah ehak nah loopphing suh tajopcheeka. Emah mok et abah, heh ih samsong ena rah jopche etjih ang ah, eno ena lep ah ehak samsong damdoh tajunka ang ah.
Erah damdoh o eh uh kham na ah siikhoop tiikook ehak nah tasakka, tumeah kham na rah ih tiikook ehak ah eraapphok etthuk ah, eno kham ah emat jan eah, eno tiikook ah thih ah.
Erah thatnang ih bah, kham na rah tiikook ena nah thiintheng!
Erah damdi sen ih kham hak jok cho doh kham na ah tajam kan ang an. ‘Ehak ah seela,’ ih sen ih li an.
Jehudi naangtongsa di Jisu ah phek ni chamtong ko ih tumkhoom kata. Heliphante loong ah ih raanteh ah thi rum ano, neng lak ni saasek leh, phak et rumta.
Mararah Pharisi loong ih cheng rumta, “Sen ih tumjih et han seng Hootthe jun ih naangtongsa doh sen emah tajen re kan?”
Jisu ih ngaakbaat rumta, “Dewid nyia heh joonte loong ih neng ram ih ti rumta adi tiim et rumta rah sen ih tanih wetan?
Heh Rangteenok ni wang ano, Rangte suh kota baanlo ah toonphakta, eno heh mina loong suh nep kota. Erah uh seng Hootthe jun ih emiit angta, o mina reh uh tajen phaksata romwah ih luulu ba phaksata.
Eno Jisu ih thoonbaatta, “Mina Sah rah naangtongsa raang ih Teesu.”
Naangtongsa saahoh di Jisu ah Jehudi rangsoomnok ni kah ano nyootsoot rumta. Erah ni jaawako lakkoong ang arah mih wasiit angta.
Mararah Hootthe Nyootte nyia Pharisi loong ih Jisu ah tumjih doh lasah thetre ah ih thun rumta, erah thoidi naangtongsa doh mih maamok deesiit jaoh ih dangdang et ban sok rumta.
Enoothong Jisu ih neng tenthun ah jat ano mih wasiit suh baatta, “Chap uh, ngakhoh ko ih raaho.” Eno erah wah ah toonchapta.
Eno Jisu ih baat rumta, “Ngah ih cheng rumhala: seng Hootthe jun doh naangtongsa doh tumjijih ah jen re thuk he? Epang tam ah, ethet haat ah? Mih roidong ah epang tam ethet haat ah?”
Heh ah nengko ni lengsok ano heh lakkoong wah asuh baatta, “An lak ah janghaat uh.” Eno heh lak ah janghaat kano ese we ih ngaak hoonta.
Neng loong ah neng the ah saanghaat rum ano khah rumta eno neng chamchi ni waan rumta Jisu ah mamet ih eah.
Erah tokdi Jisu kongchoong ni wang ano Rangte rang pheetang ih soomwangta.
Rang ah wuung ano, heliphante loong ah heh reeni lompoon ano neng dung nawa asih wanyi danjeeta, heh ih erah loong men ah kaamwah et menta:
Simoon (Heh ih Pitar et menta) erah damdi heh no Endriu; Jeems nyia Joon, Philip nyia Batholomi,
Mathiu Thomas, Jeems ah Alphaeus sah, erah damdi Simoon (hadaang pangte ih poonta),
Judas ah Jeems sah, erah damdi Judas Iskerot, mih khuumtante ih hoonte warah ah.
Jisu kong nawa heh kaamwah loong damdi dat ra rumha di, heliphante hantek loong damdi hathung ni roong chapta. Miloong hantek erah di Judia hah noongrep nawa, Jerusalem nawa erah damdi juungkaang ko niiwa Tairi nyia Sidoon samnuthung dowa;
neng heh jeng boichaat nyia neng khoisat deesiit thuk suh thok rum taha. Chiithih laakhah ih paklakte loong anep ra rum taha enooleh de ih rumta.
Warep ih heh sak nah taajoot totoh thun rumta, tumeah heh sak nawa chaan kala rah ih mirep deetsiitta.
Jisu ih heliphante loong ko ih sok ano liita, “Changthih loong ah tenroon ang an; Rangte Hasong ah sendi!
“Amadi ramtekte loong ah tenroon ang an; sen suh ekot et han! “Amadi ehuungte loong ah tenroon ang an; sen engit ean!
“Mina Sah tungthoidoh, sen mih ih miksuk halan, dut haat halan, kaanju ih halan, nyia ethih li halan adoh tenroon ang an!
Erah saakkaan ah thok ha doh sen tenroon lam ih wook anno boong an, tumeah sen raangtaan ih elong thaangchojih Rangmong Hasong ni thiinha. Nengte nengwah ih uh emamah Rangte tiitbaatte loong damdi thetre rumta.
“Enoothong amadi nyamte loong asuh tumthan echoojih ang ah; sendi tenroon roidong ah elang eta!
“Amadi laboot beete loong asuh tumthan echoojih ang ah; sen ramtek tok ethok eha! “Amadi engitte loong asuh tumthan echoojih ang ah; sen ehuung nyia moongjoong ean!
“Mina ih ese ih liite loong asuh tumthan echoojih ang ah; nengte nengwah reh uh emoong tiitbaatte suh emamah et li rumta.
Enoothong nga jeng boichaatte suh baat rumhala: sen piiara ah mongnook et an, sen miksukte damdoh ese ih re an,
sen tamte loong asuh romseetam koh an, sen siiwiite asuh rangsoom koh an.
O ih bah uh an the nah buh ho bah haangko the adoh we wak buh thuk uh; o ih bah uh an samsong toon ah, erah suh samsong ehoh bootkoh uh.
Mih ih an dowa tumjih suho erah kot et uh, erah damdoh mih ih an hukkhaak toon abah, nakmok ngaaksuh uh.
Mih ih an suh mame reekot theng ih jam hu emamah an ih mih suh reekoh uh.
“An mongnook halu mina damdam adoh mongnook ubah, romseetam ah mamah ma ih choh uh? Emah bah rangdah mina loong bah lengkot mui rumla, hephoopho thaang ah we ngaakchosuh ah!
Ese reeraang ah an damdi ese reete loong damdam adoh mok re ubah, romseetam ah mamah ma ih choh uh? Emah bah rangdah mina loong reela!
An suh jen ngaakthemte ah sok uno luulu nam koh ubah, romseetam ah mamah ma ih choh uh? Erah thaang thaang ah ngaakchosuh bah, rangdah mina loong nep nam kotmui rumla!
Emah tah angka! Senpi senra loong ah mongnook anno neng damdoh ese ih re an; enam kot et an, eno engaak choh nak thuntak an. Eno ba sen thaang elong ah choh an, nyia sen ah Echoong Thoon Rangte suh asah ang an. Tumeah Heh ah lajak nyia jengse lajengte loong raangtaan ih uh ese.
Sen Wah tenthet jeela likhiik tenthet mina ang an.
“Mihoh nak dande an, eno ba Rangte ih uh sen tadande ran; mihoh nak dut haat an, eno ba Rangte ih uh sen tadut haat ran; mih biin anaan et an, eno ba Rangte ih uh sen biin anaan et han.
Mih suh ekot et an, eno ba Rangte eh uh sen suh kohan. Amiisak ih, sen ehan ih ngaakchoh an, mih chosok thaang rah ah, sen ih mathan jenthaang an erathan—sen lak nah keekoja han. Marah saanthaak sen ih wahoh suh maak han erah saanthaak dowa ih Rangte ih sen ah maak han.”
Eno Jisu ih arah tiitthaak ah baat rumta: “Edook wasiit ih mihoh edook ah tami siitka; emah mok ang abah, wanyi nyi beng nah ba dat nyu ah.
O Leewette noodek ah Nyootte nang ih ejat tami angka; enoothong noodek thoontang ih, neng suh nyootsootta ah jen jat rumta no ba, Nyootte likhiik neng ejen lang erum ah.
Sen mik dowa bangtan ah lasamthun thang ih, Sen joonte mikmaang ehinsah ah mamet jam sok han?
Sen ih mamet mi li sen joonte suh ah, an mikmaang ah beeha, senteewah mik dowa bangtan ah laphang miisok kanbah ah? Sen lonoite loong! Sen mik dowa bangtan ah chaak dok haat anno ba sen pho senno mikmaang ehin ah samseksek mi samsok an, eno ba mi beek haat an.
“Bang se adoh tiikthih tatiikka, eno bangthih adoh uh tiikse tatiikka.
Bang ah hetiik tiikla dowa ih ba danjat ha; an ih puksak tiik ah subang nawa tachoh thiiko adoleh anggut tiik ah woma bang nawa tachoko.
Mina eseete ih heten hemong ni ese loong lomthiin ha dowa dong re ah; ethih mina rah ih heten hemong ni ethih lomthiinha ah dong noisok ah. Tumeah ten among ni tumjih jeela tuikhoop ni erah dongjeng ra hala.
“Ngah ih baat rumhala lare thang di ngah ah Teesu, Teesu,’ ih tumet suh poon hali?
O bah uh nga re nah thok haano nga jeng ah boichaat ano kap ah—eno erah mih ah mamah ang ah, ngah ih noisok rumha.
Heh ah arah likhiik ang ah, o ih heh nok jong hah nah, halup ih thoh ano hoon arah likhiik ang ah. Juung ah nuung ano liim abah uh tamoka ang ah, tumeah erah rongkopkop ih hoonta.
Enoothong o ih bah uh nga tiit ah chaat ano laphanka bah erah ih heh nok naririh jong hah ni lahoonka likhiik ang ah; eno erah nok ah juungnuung tak ih sot kano laan rungdat ruh eah—eno tumthan echoojih ih bundat ah!”
Jisu ih erah loong tiit ah miloong asuh thoonbaat ano, heh Kapernum ni katta.
Erani Roman saahaap laksuh heh rapne ih mongnook arah esiit angta; erah mih rah rapne ih sat ano etek nanah angta.
Saahaap rah ih Jisu raak ah chaat ano, heh ih mararah Jehudi mihak suh heh laksuh ah toom deesiit raaha ih poonkaat thukta.
Neng loong ah Jisu jiinni ra rumha no heh lasih joot lam ih baat rumta, “Arah mina abah an ih chosok udoh ju se ah.
Seng mina loong ah heh ih rapne ih nook hali erah damdi uh heh ih Jehudi rangsoomnok nep hoonkot kotahe.”
Eno Jisu ah neng damdi roongwangta. Saahaap ih ma dowa poonkaat thukta erah nok dowa ih heh haloot ni tah angta, “Nyootte, an nak thaam chamnaang uh. Ngah ih an nga nok nah poon theethe tah angkang,
adoleh nga teewah rah an re nah nga pupu ih jen chomui theethe tah angkang. An ih aadowa ih ba baat uh, eno bah nga laksuh ah ede eah.
Ngah uh apit ni Elong saahaap loong lakhu ni esiit, eno nga khui ni raabante uh eje. Ngah ih erah loong asuh, ‘Kah uh!’ ih baatkang bah ekaat eah; ngah ih therah asuh, ‘Raaho!’ ih baatkang bah heh raak eha; erah damdi ngah ih nga laksuh asuh, ‘Arah re uh!’ ih baatkang bah heh ere eah.”
Jisu ah epaatja eta erah chaat ano ah; eno heh ngaakchaap ano heh lini khoomte loong asuh baatta, “Ngah ih sen suh baat rumhala, a likhiik ih tuungmaang arah babah uh tathaak jatkang, Ijirel hah loongtang ni botseh uh tajeeka.
Jeng chaatte loong saahaap nok ni ngaakwang rum adi laksuh rah ejen de ih arah tupwang rumta.
Erah damdam Jisu ah Nein samthung ni wangta, heh damdi mina loong nyia heliphante loong ah hantek ang rumta.
Paathong ni thok damdam ih, mangbengte loong dokkhoom ra rumha ah chomuita. Etek ete wah ah thaknuh adi heh sah erah luulu angta, heh damdi samthung dowa miloong ah hantek ang rumta.
Teesu ih erah nuh ah sok ano, heh tenthet dongta, eno baatta, “Nak huung uh.”
Eno Jisu ah hengkhoom ano mangkhok ah taajota, eno mang piite loong ah tangchap rumta. Jisu ih baatta, “Jaaro! Ngah ih baat hala, Saat uh!”
Etekte ah saattong ano neng damdi nep waantiitta, eno Jisu ih heh nuh suh kota.
Neng loong thoontang echo damdi Rangte rangphoong rumta. “Elongthoon Khowah rah sengdung ni dong hala!” Neng ih liita, “Rangte ah heh mina pangsuh ra hala!”
Jisu tiit ah erah dowa ih deek akaan nyia juungkhuung rep ni ruurangta.
Joon liphante loong ih heh suh jaatrep erah tiit loong ah baat rumta, eno heh ih neng dung nawa wanyi poonta,
eno Teesu suh chengkaat thukta, “An tam angkoko Joon ih raak eha ih kabaatta rah ah, tam aleh seng ih wahoh banthoothak jih angka?”
Neng Jisu jiinni thokrum ano cheng rumta, “Juungtemte Joon ih an suh cheng raang ih daapkaat hali heh ih banbaatta eraak ete eah erah ah an tam ang koko, tama seng ih wahoh banthoothak jih angka.”
Erah tokdi Jisu ih mina loong ah neng khoisat, maasat, nyia Chiithih laakhah paan nyia edook ekoong loong deesiit tok angta.
Heh ih Joon jeng chaatte loong asuh ngaakbaatta, “Sen ih tumjih tup han nyia chaat han rah Juungtemte Joon suh amet ngaakbaat wan an: edook ih tup et ha, ekoong ah ekhoom ela, eput engam loong esaasiit eta, naabaang ih echaat ha, etekte ah ngaaksaat eta, erah damdi Ruurang Ese tiit rah changthih loongdung ni baat et ha.
Tumthan tenroon ah ngah suh mongchi lah angte loong rah ah!”
Joon jeng chaatte loong wangta lini, Jisu ih heh tiit ah miloong asuh we baat rumta: “Sen Joon damdoh phisaang hani wangtan adi, sen ih tumjih japtup ih ebanthun tan? Pong ih naam pheekmot arah tama?
Tumjih japtup suh wangtan? Mih moongdong ih choom arah japtup suh tama? Emah ih choomchaakte loong abah kunuchangteng nok loong nah ba japtup an!
Baat he, sen tumjih sok suh wangtan? Khowah sok tam? Elang eah, enoothong sen ih khowah nang ih elong ah tuptan.
Joon ah Rangteele ni baat ha ah: ‘Rangte ih liita, ngah ih nga tiitbaatte sen nganah daapjah hang sen suh lamtan kot raang ih ah.”
Ngah ih baat rumhala,” Jisu ih boot baatta, “Joon ah o nang ih uh elongthoon heh juuba dongta. Enoothong o Rangte Hasong ni ehinsah angla erah ah Joon nang ih elongthoon ang ah.”
Warep ih heh jeng ah chaat et rumta; loongtang nang ih ehanthoon ah sokse seete loong ah ih Rangte amiisak tiit ah thang rumta eno neng juung uh Joon ih tem rumta.
Enoothong Pharisi nyia Hootthe Nyootte loong ah Rangte mongtham neng raangtaan suh taat angta rah daan et rumta erah thoidi Joon juungtem uh daan rumta.
Jisu ih toombaat ruh eta, “Eno bah Ngah ih tumjih doh toobaat ang aahaangwa mina loong ah? Neng ah tumjih likhiik angla?
Neng ah noodek loong thaangsang theng ni tong arah likhiik boh ah. Noodek dungsiitte loong ah ih dunghote suh riingbaat ah, ‘Seng ih kuhoon boongkaat saamtom koh ih, ang abah uh sen taboong kan! Mangboong ah seng taat boongti, ang abah uh sen tahuung kan!’
Juungtemte Joon ah ra haano, kham uh lajok thang ih samurangsoom tongta, eno sen ih liitan, ‘Heh sak ni laathih pan eah!’
Mina Sah ah we ra haano heh ih jok phaksah, eno sen ih liihan, ‘Sok arah mih rah ah! Heh bah mangda nyia kham jokte boh ah, sokse seete loong nyia rangdah loong joonte boh ah!’
Rangte thung atak ah, o mina loong ih kap hi loong sak dowa ih amiisak et noisok ah.”
Pharisi wasiit ih heh nok ni Jisu rangja phaksat poonta, eno Jisu ah kah ano phaksat suh tong kata.
Erah samthung adi rangdah ni tongte minuh esiit angta. Minuh rah ih Jisu Pharisi nok ni cham saha ih chaat ano, phontum jongtek adi hemeesiit ih piijah taha
eno Jisu reeni ehuung damdi heh lathong ko ih chap ra taha, eno heh mikse rah ih Jisu lah adi siimseeta. Eno heh khoroon ih hook hut ano, heh lah adi chupphakta, eno phontum rah ih lokta.
Pharisi warah ih erah tup ano, heh teeteewah suh liita, “Arah wah ah amiimi khowah angta bah, heh ih jat etjih angta, arah minuh ah tumjaat mih ih taajoh halang eah; heh ih jat etjih angta arah minuh ah tumthan rangdah lam ni tongsongla eah!”
Jisu ih heh suh liita, “Simoon, ngah ih an suh jaatsiit baatjih jeela.” “Um, Nyootte,” heh ih liita, “Baat hang.”
Jisu ih phangbaatta “Ehak di mih wanyi ih ngun namte wah dowa ngun nam nyuuta.” “Wasiit ih ngunkholok chaabanga namta, wasiit rah ih rook banga namta.”
Eno nyi ih lajen ngaakthem nyu koka no, ngun namte kotte warah ih nyi dowa lakah ngaaksuh thang ih toohaatta. Erah ang abah, marah wah asuh, ehan minchan ah?”
Simoon ih liita, “Ngah ih thun angdi ehan ih namte wah ah.” “An ih punbaat et hu, Jisu ih liita.
Eno Jisu ah minuh ko ih leksok ano Simoon suh baatta, “An ih arah nuh ah tup tam et hu? Ngah an nok ni ra tahang adi, an ih ngah lah chot suh juung taban kotahang, arah nuh rah ih bah nga lah ah heh mikse ih chot hangno heh khoroon ih hook hut tahang.
An ih ngah echupphak damdi taban thoothak tahang, eno arah nuh rah ih bah ra tahang dowa ih nga lah chupphak ah tatoohaatka.
An ih ngah Olip bangthiing ih nga khoh ni tamook tahang, eno arah nuh rah ih bah nga lah ni phontum ih hut halang.
Erah raang ih, ngah ih baat hala, erah than elong minchan heh ih noisok halang rah ih heh rangdah loong biin anaan etta. Enoothong o amasah biin anaanta erah suh amasah minchan noisok ah.”
Eno Jisu ih minuh asuh baatta, “An rangdah loong ah biin anaan et halu.”
Mihoh loong teebun ni tongte loong ah ih neng jengjeng eta, “O ah arah mih rah ah, mih rangdah nep biin anaante ah?”
Eno Jisu ih minuh asuh baatta, “An tuungmaang ih puipang halu; semroonroong ih tong kah uh.”
Rekam ritdi Jisu ih Ruurang Ese Rangte Hasong tiit ah tumbaat suh hadaang hadaang nyia samthung loong adi dokkhoomta. Asih wanyi heliphante loong uh heh damdi roong kata,
erah damdi minuh loong neng khoisat deesiitta nyia laathih pan deesiitte loong ah anep roong karumta: Meeri (Magdaleni ih poonta rah), heh sak nawa laathih sinet dokphanta nuh ah;
Joanna, heh sawah Chuja ah Hirod luungwang noklong ni saahaap angta rah. Erah damdi Susanna, nyia minuh ehoh loong Jisu nyia heliphante loong suh neng ngun ah koh ano chosok rumta rah lang ih rumta.
Miloong ah Jisu jiinni samthung harep nawa lomkhoom rum taha; eno miloong ah hantek lomthutthi kano, Jisu ih arah tiitthaak ah baat rumta:
“Ehak di mih wasiit ih raanjih wen kaatta. Heh ih phek ni raanjih ah wenkaat adi, mararah raanjih ah lam ni datta, eno mih ih noopnak kaat, erah damdi woh ih nep toontop kaat.
Mararah ah jong hah ni datta, eno hephook ah dong ano, paakwaan ah laje thoidi laan hookti ruh eta.
Mararah raanteh ah suh haang rok ni datta, eno hak ano champhook ah suh haang rah ih loopjota.
Eno mararah raanteh ah hah se ni datta; eno champhook ah hak ano, hetiik ah chaasiit chaasiit ih dong tiikta.” Jisu ih thoonbaat rumta, “Eno bah, chaat et an, sen na je abah ah!”
Heliphante loong ah ih Jisu suh erah tiitthaak ah tumjih men ettu ih cheng rumta,
eno heh ih ngaakbaat rumta, “Rangte Hasong husalam ah jen thoijat suh sen suh bah thung atak koh rumhala, enoothong wahoh loong suh bah tiitthaak lam ih ju raaha, erah thoidoh neng ih taatsok rum abah uh tattup rumka ang ah, nyia chaat rum abah uh tasamjat rumka ang ah.
“Tiitthaak tiit ah arah suh liiha: Raanjih ah Rangte tiitkhaap.
Raanjih lam ni datta rah tiitkhaap chaatte asuh liita, enoothong Juungbaan luuwang ah thok haano neng ten nawa jengkhaap ah nge rum ah, Rangte suh hanpi rum ano neng khopi theng pho ang rum ah eah.
Jong hah ni datta raanjih ah langla, tiitkhaap ah chaat ano tenroon lam ih thaangchaatte asuh liiha. Neng ten ni dangdang tatongka, pootsiit raang ih hanpi rum ano, phate joonnaam saapoot ah thok kah no, neng laan dat ruh ih rumla.
Suhaang rok ni datta raanjih ah langla echaat ete asuh liiha; enoothong sootsaam nyia changteng tenthun, erah dam ih arah hatoh dowa tenroon roidong loong ah ih loopjoh ah, eno neng tiik ah babah uh lasumka loong asuh liiha.
Hanoop ni datta raajih ah langla o ih jengkhaap ah thaangchaat ano neng tenni ese lam ih dangdang ih thiin rumha loong asuh liiha, eno hetiik maang dong tiik tiik ih bantongla asuh liiha.
“O ih uh weetook ah took ano khoowaan ih tahopsongka adoleh phaangkhulu nah tatookka. Erah nang ih bah, mina ih weephaak ah chosuh, hethiin thengnah ba thiin ah.
“Tumjaat hotthiin et ha loong ah wuungsa nah dong ha, nyia tumjaat hoppat eha loong ah chotup ano weephaak nah dongthiin ah.
Erah raang ih “Mamet chaat han erah naririh ih kap an; tumeah o di tumjih bah uh eje angte loong asuh ebootkot et ah, eno o di amuh ah, erah dowa amasah jeela ih taatthun rumha rah uh ethoon nge et ah.”
Jisu nuh nyia heh no loong heh jiinni thok rumta, enoothong miloong hantek ang thoidi tajen chomui rumta.
Mararah ih Jisu suh baatta, “An nuh nyia an no loong an damdoh chomui suh taakkhuung ni chap rumla.”
Jisu ih thoontang suh baatta, “Nga nuh nyia nga no loong bah o ih Rangte tiit chaat ano naririh ih kapte loong ah!”
Saasiit Jisu heliphante loong damdi Khoonkhuung ni dungtong ano baat rumta, “Seng therah juungsitum saangko adoh daan kah ih.” Eno karumta.
Neng khoonkhuung ni soon tokdi, Jisu ah emokjup eta. Eno baphuk di juungsitum adi pong pongta, khoonkhuung mong adi juungwaak ah wang eta, eno neng thoontang echoojih ih hoon rumta.
Heliphante loong ah ih Jisu ah saatsiit karumta, ame jeng rum ano ah: “Nyootte, Nyootte! Seng ah etek nanah angli!” Jisu ah saat ano pong aphaat asuh baat kano; pong aphaat loong ah laan tikmat ruh eta, eno tikpakpak ih semdatta.
Eno heliphante loong asuh liita, “Sen tuungmaang ah maani ah?” Heliphante loong ah echo damdi paatja ih rumta, eno neng chamchi ni esiit esiit ih chengmui rumta, “Arah mih o angla? Heh ih pong aphaat suh nep baat ano heh jeng chaatchaat ih rumla!”
Jisu nyia heliphante loong khoonkhuung ah Gerasa juungkhuung ko ih jopkaat rumta, erah langla Galili juungsitum saangko adi angta.
Jisu ah juungkaang adi datkhoomta, eno samthung dowa mih laathih pan ang arah wasiit chomuita. Rekam dowa ih dook erah mih ah nyumuh khatmuh, heh nok ni uh latong thang ih, mangbeng luung ni tong arah angta.
Heh ih Jisu ah tup ano, erongwah ih riinghuungta eno Jisu lathong ni heloong loongdat eta eno riingta, “Jisu Elong Echoong Rangte Sah! An ih ngah ah tumjih et suh chung halang? An lasih johala, nak chamnaang thuk weehang!”
Erah liita ah langla Jisu ih laathih asuh emok sak dowa doksoon uh ih li kano riingta. Lekrookwih laathih rah ih heh ah banjoh ruh eta, erah damdi helak helah ah jaanruh ih kitleh phaatak ni taat sak, ang abah uh thaphui leh laathih rah ih woma ni moongsiit kaat kah eta.
Jisu ih chengta, “An men o ah?” “Nga men ah ‘Ephoop,’” heh ih ngaakbaatta tumeah heh sak ni laathih loong hantek nopta.
Laathih loong rah ih Jisu suh neng ah hetangmuh haluung nah lakaat raang ih heh lasih joh rumta.
Kaanjang adi wak loong ah hantek tek riimthuk arah angta. Eno laathih loong ah ih Jisu suh neng ah wak sak adoh kaat thuk raangtaan ih Jisu lasih joh rumta, eno emah ju et kaat thuk rumta.
Neng mih sak dowa doksoon rum ano wak sak adi nop karumta. Wak loong ah kaangphut adi loongtang doruk karum ano juungsitum adi lupdat karumta.
Wak riimte loong ah ih tumjih ang rumla ih sok rumta, eno soon rum ano erah tiit ah samnuthung rep nyia phek aphaang loong adi tiibaat wanrumta.
Miloong ah tumjih ang kota ih sokkah rumta, eno Jisu jiinni thokrum adi, laathih heh sak nawa doksoonta wah ah Jisu lathong ni tongta, nyuh akhat pan thungsek ih ban tongta; eno miloong ah loongtang cho rumta.
Erah japtupte loong ah ih mihoh loong suh erah wah deeta tiit ah tumbaat rumta.
Eno erah juungkhuung dowa miloong ah ih Jisu suh haloot nah kaat baat rumta, tumeah neng ah rapne ih cho rumta. Erah thoidi Jisu ah khoonkhuung adi dungtong kata.
Heh sak nawa laathih doksoonta warah ih Jisu lasih jota, “Ngah uh an damdoh roong ra weehang.” Ang abah uh Jisu ih ehoh ni kaat thukta, amet baat ano ah:
Noknah ngaak wang uno Rangte ih tumjih deesiit taho erah baatwan uh.” Eno erah wah ah samnuthung lam ih wang ano, Jisu reeraang tiit loong ah baat wanta.
Jisu juungsitum jooko nawa ngaak wang adi, miloong ih jengseera lam ih heh ah bantho rumta, tumeah neng loong ih heh ah jaatjaat ban sok rumta.
Eno mih wasiit heh men ah Jairas thok taha; heh ah Jehudi rangsoomnok ni mote angta. Heh teeteewah Jisu lathong ni kottong ano heh nok nah kaat raangtaan ih lasih jota,
tumeah heh sah asih paang nyi minusah, esiit laklak ang arah, thoon tek nanah angta. Eno Jisu ah roong kata adi, miloong ah rongrep nawa thutkhoom rum taha.
Neng dung ni minuh esiit asih paang nyi heh sih sih arah angta; heh ih jirep heh di tumjih jeeta loong ah Phonwah jiinni thoon thaaja arah angta, heh ah o ih uh lajen deesiitka rah mina angta.
Heh miloong dung ni ra haano Jisu liko ni heh nyuh kaangba adi taajota, eno heh sih rah erah damdam laan tang ruh eta.
Jisu ih chengta, “O ih taajoh tahang?” Eno mirep ih daan et rumta, eno Pitar ih liita, “Nyootte, miloong ephoop laangma kookchap halu.”
Ang abah uh Jisu ih liita, “O ih ang abah uh ngah taajoh ih tahang, tumeah ngah ih nga sak nawa chaan katta adi jattang.”
Minuh rah ih sok ano thunta Jisu ih ejen japjoot ih halang eah, eno emoot cho damdi kah ano Jisu lathong ni kotbon kata. Erah di mirep ngathong ni baatta, heh ih tumjih thoih taajota nyia lakdamdam di mame deeta tiit rah ah.
Jisu ih heh suh baatta, “Nga sah an tuungmaang nawa ih deelu, Semroongroong ih tong kah uh.”
Jisu ih erah baat rum adi, saahaap nok nawa kongphaak huite thok taha. Eno Jairas suh baatta, “An sah bah etek ela,” “Nyootte ah nakcham thaam hoom kuh.”
Enoothong Jisu ih erah japchaat ano Jairas suh baatta, “Nakcho uh; tuungmaang ba eh uh, ese ang ah an sah ah.”
Eno heh nok ni thok rumta adi, Jisu ih o uh nokmong ni tanop thukta, Pitar, Jeems, nyia Joon erah damdi noodek nuh nyi wah ba nop rumta.
Warep erah di noodek thun huungte nyi mongjoongte luulu angta. Jisu ih baatta, “Nak huung an; noodek ah etek tah eka ejup boh ela!”
Loongtang ih Heh ah engit et rumta, tumeah neng ih jat et rumta noodek ah jen tek eta eah.
Ang abah uh Jisu ih noodek ah heh lak ni saat hoom ano poonta, “Noodek oh, saat uh!”
Eno heh tak ah dong heengta, erah damdam noodek laan saat ruh eta, eno Jisu ih phaksat jam koh an ih baat rumta.
Heh nuh nyi wah loong ah rapne ih paatja rumta, enoothong Jisu ih o suh uh labaat thang arah tiit rah ah ih tanghaam rumta.
Jisu ih asih wanyi heliphante loong ah lompoon ano neng suh Chiithih laakhah loong ah jen dokphan theng nyia khoisat deesiit theng chaan aphaan ah korumta.
Eno heh ih neng loong ah Rangte Hasong tiit tumbaat nyia khoisatte loong ah deesiit suh kaat thuk rumta,
erah lilih amah we ih baatta, “Erah kah an doh sen sak nah tumjih uh nak hui an: kiingthom uh nak pi an, kunma khaak uh nak hui an, phaksat uh nak hui an, ngun akom uh nak hui an, samsong boseh hedak nak hui an.
Marah doh sen noppoon han, erah nok adoh erah samthung dowa maang dokdok khoom ih tong an;
marah doh mih ih sen tanoppoon ran, erah samthung adoh sen lah nawa bungwiik ah jaanak thiin ano dokkhoom an, eno neng raang ih erah ethih banthoothak theng toom ang ah.”
Heliphante loong ah harep ni tumkhoom rumta, Rangte Ruurang Ese ah tumbaat rum ano khoisatte loong ah harep nawa deesiit karumta.
Hirod, Galili phansiitte warah ih, erah tiit loong ah thoontang japchaat ano heh thung phaangta, tumeah mararah miloong ih liita Juungtemte Joon ngaakthingla.
“Rukho loong ah ih li rumta Elijah dong hala, eno rukho loong ih li rumta teewah dowa khowah loongdung nawa ngaakthingla.
Hirod ih liita, “Joon khoh ah boleh ngah ih thah thuktang nih; eno arah chaat hang mih ah o angla?” Eno heh ih Jisu ah japtup raangtaan ih banthoota.
Heh kaamwah loong ah ngaakwang rumha no Jisu suh neng ih tumjih reeta loong jaatrep baat rumta. Heh ih neng ah heh damdi siit rumta, eno Betsaida samthung liita adi neng kaatkaat ih rumta.
Miloong ah ih erah japchaat rum ano, noongrep nawa roong phankhoom karumta. Heh ih ese ih ra halan ih li ano Rangte Hasong tiit ah baat rumta, erah dam ih khoisatte loong o ih jamta erah loong ah deesiit etta.
Rangsa phanglup kah adi, heliphante asih wanyi ah heh reeni kah rum ano baatta, “Miloong ah daap et uh neng ih neng phaksat nyia ejup ejam theng arah hadaang loong re ko nah nyia phek aphaang loong adoh toom jam karum ah, tumeah arah hah ah heh luulu hatik ni.”
Ang abah uh Jisu ih baat rumta, “Mathan ang abah uh sensen ih phaksat ah jam kokaang an.” Neng ih ngaakbaatta, “Seng jiinni bah baanlo banga nyasi enyi ba jeela, an ih seng suh arah than mina loong asuh phaksat toom reh koka rum ah ih tam li hu?”
(Erah di haajaat banga taan mina angta.) Jisu ih heliphante loong suh baatta, “Miloong ah dungsiit nah rookbanga rookbanga ih pheetong thuk an.”
Heliphante loong ih jen phe tongthuk ano,
Jisu ih baanlo banga nyia nyasi enyi ah toon ano, rangko ih toonsokta, eno Rangte suh lakookmi li ano chepphiitta, eno heliphante loong suh koh ano miloong asuh pheekoh kaat thukta.
Loongtang ih laanphoot ruh ih phaksah rumta, eno heliphante loong ih asih hongnyi dakta rah toon rumta.
Saasiit Jisu ih heh laklak rangsoom adi, heliphante loong ah heh jiinni wang rumta. Jisu ih cheng rumta, “Miloong ih ngah suh o angla ih kah li rumhang?”
Neng ih ngaakbaatta, “Mararah ih Juungtemte Joon ih liirum halu,” “Rukho rah ih Elijah ih liirum halu, rukho loong ah ih teewah khowah loongdung nawa wasiit ngaakthingla ih liirum halu.”
“Sen ih tumjih liihe?” Heh ih neng suh chengta. “Ngah suh o et liihe?” Pitar ih liita, “An ah Kristo Rangte.”
Eno Jisu ih neng suh dangdang ih baat rumta erah tiit ah o suh uh labaat theng eah.
Heh ih wakbaatta, “Mina Sah ah rapne ih cham jaatjaat eah eno mihak phokhoh, nyia romwah phokhoh loong, erah damdoh Hootthe Nyootte loong ih edanhaat nep et rum ah. Heh ah etek haat et rum ah, enoothong sa jom linah we ngaakthing eah.”
Eno heh ih neng loongtang suh baatta, “O mina nga damdoh wangsuh nookla, heh ih heh teewah ah beehaat et theng, heh bangphak ah saarookwih huitheng, eno ba nga lih ah jenrik hang.
Tumeah o mina heh roidong ah pui raangtaan ih thunha erah emat eah, eno o ih heh roidong ah nga raangtaan ih mat haat ah erah ah epui eah.
Mina ih arah mongrep dowa jaatrep ah kap ano, heh teewah ah thet haat nyi maat haat abah tumjih choh ah? Emah tah angka!
O mina ngah suh nyia nga jengkhaap asuh erakri ean bah, Mina Sah rah uh heh chaan aphaan nyia heh Wah adoleh esa rangsah loong chaan aphaan rangwuung sa doh sen suh engaak rakri eah.
Ngah ih kamkam ih baat rumhala arah di marah marah mih eje Rangte Hasong ah maang japtup doh latekte ah.”
Heh ih sa sinet lini baatta, Jisu ih Pitar, Jeems nyia Joon ah siit ano kong ni rangsoom wangta,
Heh ih rangsoom adi, hethe hekhoh ah lek eta, eno henyuh hekhat ah pungkoopkoop ih phaakta.
Baphuk di mih wanyi dong taha eno Jisu damdi waan nyuuta. Erah nyi ah Moses nyia Elijah angta,
rangmong weephaak lam ih dong nyuuha no Jisu damdi waantiit nyuuta, Rangte ih tumjih chungta erah ah heh ih Jerusalem nah tek ano mamah lamdoh jen phansiit theng tiit rah ah.
Pitar nyia heh joonte loong ah emokjup ih rumta, eno saat rum ano sok rum adi Jisu ah phaakjaaja angta eno heh damdi mih wanyi roong chapta.
Mih wanyi ah dokkhoom lini, Pitar ih Jisu suh liita, “Nyootte, tumthan ese ah seng aani ang ih no ah! Seng ih nyutaap ejom than hoon ih, esiit ah an raangtaan, esiit ah Moses raangtaan, eno esiit ah Elijah raangtaan.” (Amiimi di heh teeteewah ih tajatta heh ih tumjih suh liita rah ah).
Heh ih tiit ah maang thoon baatka di, jiingmuung laaphaang ah ih wiithuk rumta; eno heliphante loong ah jiingmuung ih loopjoh rum kano echo erumta.
Eno jiingmuung mong ni jeng arah japchaat rumta, “Arah nga sah, ngah ih daanje ang rah— heh jeng ah echaat et an!”
Jeng toojengta adi, Jisu ah heh luulu ih dong hoonta. Erah pootdi heliphante loong ah tikwaawa ih tikdat rumta, tumjih tup rumta tiit ah neng chamchi ni nep tanaan waantiit rumta.
Saalih adi Jisu nyia Heliphante wajom kong nawa dat karum adi, miloong hantek Jisu damdi chomui rumta.
Erah loongdung adi mih wasiit riingta, “Nyootte! An lasih johala, nga sah ah sokboi weeuh—nga sah ngah di heh luulu!
Laathih rah baphuk ih eriing damdi heh sak adi patleh loonghaat eno leh mangtek thuk kah et ah, eno heh tu adi tookwu ah dong kah eah; emamah ban chamnaang thuk ruh et ha, chaan ih ba kadaap haat ah!
Ngah ih an liphante loong lasih taat joh rumtang, ang abah uh neng ih tajen dokphan rumta.”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Sen loong lahanpiite nyia ethih mina loong boh ah! Ngah sen damdam sa mathan maajen roong tonghang? Sen damdam tonghang no sa mathan maajen toonjoh rumha?” Eno heh ih erah wah asuh baatta, “An sah rah aako et siit wanho.”
Noodek ah wang damdam, laathih rah ih hah ni loonghaat ano mangtek thukta. Jisu ih laathih rah dokphan kano noodek ah laan de ruh eta, eno heh wah suh ngaak kota.
Rangte chaan ah tup rum ano warep paatja rumta. Heliphante loong suh baat rumta tok adi, mina loong ah Jisu reeta asuh thok paatja ruh ih rumta.
“Ngah ih sen suh baat theng eje erah sen ih labeehaat theng! Mina Sah rah hansi chaan aphaan mina loong lak nah jokoh rumte angla.”
Ang abah uh heliphante loong ih tumjih suh liita erah tajat rumta. Erah jengkhaap ah neng suh tami dongjat thuk rumta, erah thoidi neng ih tajen samjat rumta, eno erah tiit ah cheng suh uh echo ih rumta.
Heliphante loongdung ni elongthoon ah o angjih ah, erah tungthoidi daanmui rumta.
Jisu ih neng tenthun ah ejat eta, eno heh ih noodek esiit toonsiit ano heh re adi chap thuk ano,
baat rumta, “O mina ih arah noodek nga mendoh noppoon ah, erah ih ngah noppoon halang; erah damdi o ih ngah noppoon halang, erah ih ngah daapkaat teewah anep noppoonha. Erah raang ih sengdung ni ehin thoon o ah erah ba elongthoon ang ah.”
Joon ih liita, “Nyootte, seng ih mih wasiit ih an mendi laathih dokphan arah tupti, eno seng ih tanghaamti, tumeah heh ah sengjoon tah angta.”
“Nakmok tanghaam an,” Jisu ih heh suh liita eno wahoh loong heliphante loong asuh nep baatta, “Tumeah o mina sendi tadaan muira erah sen raangtaan ang ah.”
Jisu ah rang nah toonsiit wan saapoot thok kohaano, heh thung ni Jerusalem nah kaat suh thunta eno dokkhoomta.
Samaria ni hadaang esiit heh raangtaan ih jaatrep ah ban khookham suh, heh ih kongphaak kotte bandaap kaatta.
Enoothong erah nok hate loong rah ih tabansok rumta, tumeah heh ah jatririh Jerusalem nah kaatte angta.
Jeems nyia Joon ih erah soknyu ano, li nyuuta, “Teesu, an ih sek suh arah mina loong ah tek haat raangtaan ih rang nawa we tam datpoon thuk he tih?”
Jisu ih ngaaksok ano kanja nyuuta.
Eno Jisu nyi heliphante loong ah hahoh ko ih karumta.
Neng lam ni karum adi, mih wasiit ih Jisu suh baatta, “An maako ih kah uh ngah an damdam ehang.”
Jisu ih baatta, “Maaut di heluung jeela, woh de ah neng tep, enoothong Mina Sah raangtaan ih bah maani uh heh naangtong theng taan uh tajeeka.”
Heh ih wahoh asuh we baatta, “Nga lilih eho.” Eno erah warah ih liita, “Nyootte, jaakhoh ngah ih sengwah mang chaak beng wang ang.”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Etekte loong ah neng neng toom beng mui rum ah. An ih Rangte tiit thong tumbaat kaat uh.”
Eno wahoh ih we baatta, “Chuupha, ngah an lilih ehang, enoothong ngah jaatang damdoh chaak raajeng wang ang.”
Jisu ih heh suh baatta, “O bah uh phek ah taat phang moot ano heh lakkah ah ban ngaaksok ruh eha mina abah Rangte Hasong ni tapunka.”
Erah lilih Teesu ih wahoh wah rook sinet wah nyi danje ano wanyi wanyi et daapkaatta, marah doh heh kaat theng ah erah hah adi hengah hengah ih ban kaat thukta.
Heh ih neng suh baatta, “Chamkhan theng erah ni ephoop je ah, enoothong ekhante ah amasah. Phek changte wah asuh rangsoom koh an heh ih cham khante toomdaap jaha suh ah.
Kah an! Ngah ih sen so dung ni saapsah likhiik et daapkaat rumhala.
Sen ngunkhaak adoleh kunma khaak adoleh lah khoop sen ih lahuitheng; lam nah sen ih tangchap anno mih lasoom theng.
Maatok doh sen mih nok nah nop an, erah doh jaakhoh sen ih li theng, ‘Arah nok adoh semroongroong toomtong an.’
Erah doh semroongroong ih tongsongte mina tong abah, sen ih marah jengkhaapse jengtan rah neng damdam toomtong ah; lah angka bah, marah semroongroong ih tong suh jengseeraatan ah ngaaktoon etheng.
Erah noknok adoh tong anno neng ih tumjih kohan erah phaksah an, tumeah paknaate suh heh thaang ekotjih. Nok hoh nok hoh nah laleng tongtheng.
Mararah sa doh samthung ko ih kah andoh mih ih nok nah noppoon hanbah, tumjih kohan erah phaksah an,
erah samthung dowa khoisatte ah deesiit an, eno miloong asuh baat an, ‘Rangte Hasong ah sen reeni thok hala.’
Enoothong mararah samthung adoh sen tanoppoon ran, erah dowa taakkhuung nah dokkhoom anno li an,
‘Sen hah nawa bungwiik seng lah ni rapla taan anep sen suh thichoh ih no saaphuk thiin hi. Enoothong samthun et an Rangte Hasong abah sen reeni thok ehala!’
Ngah ih amiimi et baat rumhala Daande Saadoh Rangte ih erah samthung nang ih Sodom hah asuh tenthet ehan noisok ah!
“Tumthan echoojih ang ah sen raangtaan suh ah, Korajin mina loong! Tumthan echo theng ang ah, Betsaida mina loong asuh nep ah! Epaatja jih marah sen suh noisok tahan erah Tairi nyia Sidoon suh noisokta bah, neng ih ehak doh dook khuupo nyuh ah wok rum ano, neng sak nah laabot pan ih neng ah rangdah nawa esa eti ih noisok theng rumta!
Rangte ih sen nang ih Dande Saadoh Tairi nyia Sidoon suh heh tenthet ah ehan ih noisok ah.
Eno Kapernum miloong! Sen teeteewah ah rang nah jen wang ih eh tam liitan? Sen ah soolam nah dat haatte ang halan!”
Jisu ih heliphante loong suh baatta, “O mina ih sen jeng boichaat han erah ih nga jeng uh boichaat ehang; O ih sen danhaat han; erah ih ngah uh danhaat et hang; eno o ih ngah danhaat hang erah ih ngah daap teewah ah nep danhaat ha.”
Wah rook sinet wanyi ah tenroon lam ih ngaak wang rum taha, “Teesu,” neng ih liita,” Juungbaan ih nep seng jeng chaat eta seng ih an mendi dokphan kino ah!”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta rumta, “Ngah ih Soitaan ah rang nawa weephaak daat raaha rah likhiik tup ettang.
Boichaat an! “Ngah ih sen suh ejenjih chaan koh rumhala, eno ba sen pu nyia siingngaangraang khonah nep jen khoom an erah damdoh sen Piiara chaan anep jen an, eno tumjih ih uh sen tathet haat ran.
Enoothong sen jeng juungbaan ih chaat ha ih nak mokroon an; erah nang ih bah sen men ah rang ni raangha asuh thong roon an.”
Erah tokdi Jisu ah Esa Chiiala ih tenroon thuk ano liita, “Ewah, rang nyia hah Teesu! ngah ih an suh lakookmi li hala tumeah an ih lajatte loong asuh jaatthuk hu marah jatwah loong re nawa taat huthiintu loong ah jatthuk hu. Elang euh, Ewah, erah ah an ih jamtu loong aju angla.
“Sengwah ih ngah suh jaatrep ah kotahang. O ih uh heh Sah ah tajatka heh wah luulu ih ba jat ha, erah damdi, o ih uh heh wah ah tajatka heh sah luulu ih ba jat ha eno o mina suh jatthuk suh heh Sah ih daanje ha erah ih baajat ha.”
Erah dowa ih Jisu ih heliphante loong ko ih leksok ano neng suh ngiija ni dan baatta, “Sen tumthan khangraangse ah sen ih tumjih japtup han erah tup an no ah!
Ngah ih sen suh baat rumhala khowah nyia luungwang loong ih uh sen ih marah tup han erah ah tup suh taatthun rumha, ang abah uh neng ih tajaptup rumka, nyia sen ih marah chaat han, erah japchaat suh taatthun rumha ang abah uh neng ih tajap chaat rumka.”
Hootthe Nyootte ah ra haano Jisu jeng matjoot thunta, eno heh ih chengta,” Nyootte,” “Babah uh lathoonka roidong ah chosuh, ngah ih tumjih et angdoh se ah?”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Rangteele ni mamet liita leh? Sen ih erah mamah kah ih toombaat an?”
Erah mih rah ih ngaakbaatta, “‘An Teesu Rangte ah an ten nawa ih minchan uh, an chiiala nawa, an tah nawa ih, an thung atak nawa ih minchan uh’ nyia ‘ankhuung antok ah an teewah thanthan ih minchan uh.’”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “An ih epun baat et hu,” Erah loong ah re uno ba khothing tong uh.”
Enoothong Hootthe Nyootte warah ih jatririh di, Jisu suh chengta, “Khuung atok ah nga raang ih o ah ang ah?”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Teewadi mih wasiit Jerusalem nawa Jeriko ni dat kah adi miputte loong ih joh rumta, eno put rum, ebot ah buh rum, eno lam ni etek nanah ih thiinhaat rum.
Eno erah lam adi romwah wasiit dat khoom kata; eno mih rah tup ano, heh ih jiit khoom ano, lamhoh ko ih kata.
Emamah Leewi nok hah we ra taha, no mih rah sok ano, lamhoh ko ih siip khoomta.
Enoothong Samaria nok hah wasiit ra haano, mih ah sokta, eno erah sok ano, heh minchan dongta.
Heh ah heh re ko ih kah ano, phonthiing nyia kham ih hema ah mook ano loopkhakta; no naangjam nokmong ko ih toon hu wan ano, naririh ih soksam wanta.
Saalih adi heh ih jaan ngun loonyi dok ano nok bansokte asuh kota, eno baat thiinta, ‘Arah wah ah ban sok weeuh joh,’ ngah arah lam we ih ngaak wanghang adoh, an ngun mathan wang ah erah we ngaakthem et wan ah.’”
Eno Jisu ih thoonbaatta, “An thung ni erah wajom tung dowa ih, miputte ih noopbuta wah ah marah ih hekhuung hetok likhiik noisokta?”
Hootthe Nyootte rah ih ngaakbaatta, “Marah ih heh minchanta erah warah ih.” Jisu ih baatta, “An kah uno, emamah ih re uh.”
Jisu nyia heliphante loong lam ni kaat tokdi, hadaang esiit adi minuh heh men ah Martha ih heh nok ni poonwanta.
Erah nuh adi heh no esiit heh men ah Meeri angta, erah nuh rah Teesu lathong adi kottong ano heh jengkhaap ah boichaatta.
Martha ah mongjoong angta jaatrep pakna theng ah hesuh totoh thiinhaat kot kano ah, eno heh ah ra haano liita, “Teesu, “An ih tanih jatko nga no ih jaatrep pakna theng ah ngah suh totoh thiin haat kohalang rah ah? Baat weeuh nga damdoh toomroong pakna wang weeha!
Teesu ih ngaakbaatta, “Martha, Martha! An ah jaatrep suh sootsaamlu nyia chamnaanglu,
enoothong esiit luulu ba an ih wakjamjih. Meeri ih epunjih lam ah danjeeha, eno erah ah heh dowa lah ngaak toonjih.”
Saasiit hah esiit ni Jisu ih rangsoomta. Eno erah thoonsoom adi, heliphante wasiit ih heh suh baatta, “Teesu, seng suh rangsoom nyoot he, Joon ih heliphante loong suh kanyootta likhiik ah.”
Jisu ih baat rumta, “Sen ih rangsoom an doh, ame jeng an: ‘Ewah: An men esa ah toomphoong ho; an Hasong toom raaha.
Seng suh roijang phaksat ah kohe.
Seng rangdah ah biin anaan he, seng ih uh seng damdi thetreete loong ah biin anaan et ih. Eno seng thisusuh ih nak phate thuk he.”
Eno Jisu ih heliphante suh baatta, “Jengthaak ah sen jiiwah nok nah mottom doh kah anno taat suh kah thaak an, ‘Nga jiiwah ngah suh baanlo loojom than nam kohang.
Nga nok ni nga jiiwah wen nawa amadi thok hala, eno ngah di phaksat heh suh kottheng taan uh tajeeweeka!’
Eno jengthaak ih an jiiwah rah ih nokmong nawa ih toom ngaakbaat thaak ho, ‘Nak paklak raahang! Kaasak ejen tangsak etang, seng nga saloong ejen jup eli. An suh tumjaat kot suh uh, tajen saat kang.’
Eno bah mamah angtheng ah? Ngah ih baat rumhala an jiiwah mendi heh ih baanlo ah tajen kotaho, ang abah uh an ih larakri thang ih laat suruh et ubah heh saat ano an ih tumjih sutu erah ekot eho.
“Erah raang ih ngah ih baat rumhala: Cheng et uh, eno ba an choh uh; ejam et uh, eno bah an ih chojam uh, erah damdoh erengdok et uno ba an suh kaasak ah daap koho.
Tumeah o ih cheng ah erah mih choh ah, erah dam ih o mina ih jam ah erah ih chojam ah, nyia kaasak ah o ih rengdok ah erah suh ba daap koh ah.
Sen heh wah angte loong ah ih sen sah ih nyasi suh handi pu ni koh an?
Adoleh wotih suh hanbah siingngaangraang ni koh an?
Tumthan ih thih ubah uh, an sah suh ese jih ah mamet kottheng abah ejat et hu. Erah ang abah, rang niiwa sen Wah rah ih tang, Esa Chiiala ah tumthan ehan koh ah o ih heh dowa chengha asuh ah!”
Jisu ih engong juungbaan ah dokphanta, eno juungbaan ah doksoon kano, engong ah phang dongjengta. Eno miloong ah paatja ih rumta,
enoothong mararah mina ih li rumta, “Arah bah Beljibul boh ah juungbaan loong luungwang rah ah, heh suh neng jen dokphan theng chaan kotcho boh ah.”
Rukho loong ah ih Jisu heh matjoot chungta, erah thoi ih neng ih heh suh epaatjaajih Rangte reeraang ah noisok he ih baat rumta.
Ang abah uh Jisu ih jat etta neng ih tumjih thunha rah loong ah, eno li rumta, “Marah deek akaan neng chamchi ni pheetong ano rookmuila loong ah roitang tatongka; changka siit ah pheerook ano tong abah ethet eah.
Erah raang ih juungbaan hasong adoh uh neng chamchi nah pheerook ano tong abah, mamah jen ih chengtong ah? Sen ih li hali ngah ih juungbaan dokphan hang chaan ah Beljibul luungwang ih koha eah.
Ngah ih dokphan hang ah emah ang abah, sen liphante loong ih mamet dokphanta? Sen liphanteete loong ih jatthuk ha sen ah emoong lan eah!
Emah tah angka, arah bah Rangte Chaan nawa ih Chiithih laakhah loong dokphan hang, eno erah ih jatthuk halan Rangte Hasong ah sen reeni jen thok ih taha eah.
“Maradoh tathat mina ih, helang hepah pan ih, heh nok ah ban sok abah, heh damdi tumjih jeela loong ah pi eah.
Enoothong heh nang ih tathat wahoh ih mok we jen abah, heh laalom theng helang hepah loongtang soonpi ano pheekokaat ah.
“O mina nga miksukte loong ah nga raangtaan tah angka; o mina ih nga tachosok rang erah loong ah phaangjaang eah.
“Laathih ah mina sak nawa doksoon ano, deek akaan hookpakpak adoh heh naangtong theng jam sokkah ah. Eno heh ih esiit uh lachoh jamka bah heh ih heh teeteewah suh li ah, ‘Nga nok nah ngaakwang ang.’’
Eno heh ngaak wang ano nok ah saachamcham khookham cho et tupwang ah.
Eno we ngaak kah ano heh damdoh laathih sinet boot poonkah ah heh nang ih uh ethithoon ang arah ah, eno neng erah nok adoh tongwang ah. Eno bah erah mina ah jaakhoh nawa nang ih ehanthoon ih thih arah ang ah.”
Jisu erah baatta adi, midung ni minuh esiit jengta eno Jisu suh baatta, “Tumthan tenroonjih ah an dongtupte nyi an koonchaate rah ah!”
Enoothong Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Erah thaknang ih bah, tumthan tenroonjih ah o mina ih Rangte jeng ah chaat ano kap ete loong rah ah!”
Miloong ih Jisu ah kookchap rum adi, heh ih liirumta, “Ahaangwa mina loong ah tumthan ethih ah! Neng ih epaatjaajih cheng rum halang, enoothong epaatjaajih o suh uh takokang Joona suh kotang aju ang ah.
Khowah Joona ah Ninewe mina loong raangtaan suh nyootsok theng angta likhiik, mina Sah rah uh ahaangwa mina loong raangtaan ih nyootsok theng ang ah.
Dande sa doh wangchaanuh Siba ih ahaangwa mina loong ah chamnaang thuk han, tumeah heh ah hedeek nawa luungwang Solomon jatwah jengkhaap chaat thok hala; eno ngah ih baat rumhala Solomon nang ih elong ah aani.
Dande sa doh Ninewe mina loong ih sen ah chamnaang thuk et han, tumeah neng ah rangdah nawa ngaaklek eta Joona ih Rangte tiit baatta ah kap rum ano ah; eno ngah ih amiimi tiit baat rumhala adi Joona nang ih uh elong ah seng damdi!
“O ih uh weetook ah kaangtook ano tekmong nah tahuthiinka; erah nang ih bah, hethiin thengnah ba thiin ah, eno ba nokmong ni wangte mina ah khom kaangtook ah.
Sen mik ah sen sak raangtaan ih weephaak likhiik. Sen mik ah ese ang abah, sen sakpuh weephaak ang ah; enoothong sen mik ah laseeka bah, sen sakpuh ah laamang nah ang ah.
Naririh ih thun an, erah ang abah, sen sak nawa weephaak ah laamang maamok angja oh.
Sen sakputang ih weephaak nah ang abah, sen sak marah nah uh laamang tah angka, kaangjaaja ba ih phaak ah, weetook ih kaangtook ho di kah ang ah likhiik ah.”
Jisu ih tiit ah thoonbaat kano, Pharisi wasiit ih heh nok ni phaksat poonta; eno heh phaksat suh roongtong kata.
Jisu ih laktiimuh ih phaksah arah sok ano Pharisi ah paatja eta.
Eno Teesu ih heh suh liita, “Eno bah, Pharisi sen loong ih bah sen khuung akhaak nyia sen lokkep khaplang ah rangkhoh ah ba saachot han, enoothong sen mong ni bah changrook nyia ethih loong tenthun ah meela.
Thungko ah loong! Rangkhoh hoonte wah Rangte ih, heh mong uh heh ih tanih hoonta?
Enoothong sen lokkep nyi tek akhuung ni tumjih jeela rah changthih suh koh anbah, jirep ah an suh esa we ih hoon ah.
“Tumthan echoojih ang ah sen Pharisi loong asuh ah! Sen ih Rangte suh hekuung di khokileeso asih thiik uh ekot et han, jengthaak ih pochiina erah damdi uh jaat hoh mesih chaangtiik anep kohan, ang abah uh sen Rangte minchan nyia sen epun tenthun ah maat haat et han. Sen ih erah loong ah, marah uh lamaat haat thang ih reejih.
“Tumthan echoojih ang ah sen Pharisi loong asuh ah! Sen ih rangsoomnok ni tongtheng ese ah ban thiin thuk suh nook lan, eno thaangsang thengnah uh mirep ih soomtu suh nook lan.
Tumthan echoojih ang ah sen suh ah! Sen loong ah mangbeng theng ni lajat thang ih khoomte mina loong likhiik.”
Hootthe Nyootte wasiit ih heh suh liita, “Nyootte, an ih erah jenglu adi seng nep wak kaanju hali!”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Sen Hootthe nyootte loong raangtaan ih uh tumthan echoojih ang ah! Sen ih mih tamkhoni huijih ah lajen huitheng et huthuk han, eno sen ih neng huijih ah roong chaang hui suh sen laktiik taan uh tajanghaat kan.
Tumthan echoojih ang ah sen suh ah! Sen ih khowah loong mangbeng theng ah jaaseemoong ih hoonhan—erah khowah loong ah ih senwih sente tek haatte lek ang kano ah.
Sen ih sen teeteewah ih noisok han, senwih sente tumjih reeta rah ah; neng ih khowah loong tek haat et rumta, eno sen ih neng mangbeng nok loong ah hoonkoh han.
Erah thoih Rangte mongtham ese rah ih liita, ‘Ngah ih neng suh khowah nyia kongphaak baatte loong daapkaat ang; eno neng ih rukho ah tek haat rukho ah echamnaang toom et rum ah.’
Erah raang ih amah dowa mina loong asuh chamchojih ang ah teewah haphangsong di khowah loong tek haat rumta thaang rah ah,
Abel phangtek haat rumta dowa ih Jekaria tek haat rumta tuk ih, marah Roomthong nyi Esa hah chamchi ni tek haatta rah ah. Elang eah, ngah ih baat rumhala, ahaangwa mina loong ah erah loong thaang ah cham thuk rum ah!
“Tumthan echoojih ang ah sen Hootthe nyootte loong asuh ah! Sen ih thung atak kaasak laang theng chaabi ah sen lak ni thiinhan; erah di sen teeteewah uh tawangkan, eno mihoh taat wangkah bah uh sen ih tanghaam et han!”
Jisu erah dowa dokkhoom kata, Hootthe nyootte nyi Pharisi loong ih heh ah ethih ethih ih chikram rumta eno jaatrep jengkhaap cheng rumta,
heh jeng lasah moong jengla, mat et joh suh ih thun rum ano ah.
Bijaat haajaat mina loong lomthok rum taha eno, ejap nakmui nep ih rumta, eno Jisu ih jaakhoh heliphante loong asuh liita, “Naririh et ban sok an Pharisi loong to ih naktoom thet haat han—ngah ih neng lonoi asuh liitang.
Tumjaat hoppat cho ah erah daapcho ih hoon ah, erah damdoh jaatrep husah tiit loong ah dongjat et ah.
Erah raangtaan ih marah sen ih laamang ni baat han erah rangwuung nah japchaat ah, erah damdoh marah sen ih ngiija nokmong ni hubaat han erah nok rangkhoh nawa ih riingbaat ah.
Ngah ih baat rumhala, nga joonte loong, sen marah ih hansi laklak tek haatte ra lacho theng jaat hoh ethih tumjih takah jen etka.
Ngah ih noisok rumha o ra choojih rah ah: Rangte ra cho an, etek lini, Heh di juuba soolam nah haat wan suh chaan jeela. Nga jeng ah tuungmaang an, esiit heh juuba sen choojih ah!
Wosiksak banga rah phaanyi di tanih kasangka? Wosiksak esiit taan uh Rangte ih tabeehaatka.
Sen khoroon ah botseh rookwet cho. Erah raangtaan ih nakcho an; sen ah wosiksak hantek thaknang ih uh thaangchaan!
“Ngah ih amiisak ih baat rumhala, o mina ih noksong dung nah neng ah nga mina et dokbaat rum ah, Mina Sah eh uh Rangte rangsah loong ngathong nah neng suh emamah ih reekoh rum ah.
Enoothong o mina ih nokwah dung nah thaaju hang, Mina Sah eh uh emamah Rangte rangsah loong ngathong nah thaaju rum ah.
“O mina ih Mina Sah ah thetbaat abah ejen biin anaan et ah, enoothong marah ih Esa Chiiala tiit thetbaat ha abah biin anaan tachoka.
“Neng ih Jehudi rangsoomnok nah adoleh kobonor nyi hadaang pante loong ngathong nah phate suh siitwan hanbah, sen lapaatja theng senteewah ah mamet pangjih ah adoleh sen tumjih jengjih asuh ah.
Tumeah Esa Chiiala ih erah tokdoh an tumjih jengjih ah heh ih nyoot han.”
Midung ni mih wasiit ih Jisu suh baatta, “Nyootte, seng phoh suh baat uh seng wah ih thiinhaatta nyamka rah toom phe kohang.”
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Nga joonwah, ngah suh mih rikri nyia setnyi suh soophoh nyamka ah pheekot theng ih chaan o ih kot kotahang koh?”
Eno heh ih erah tiit ah loongtang suh wakbaat rumta, “Sen teeteewah ah naririh ih ban sok an sen ah jaatrep doh maamok nyamnyook jan oh; tumeah mina tumthan nyamte wah taat ang abah uh, ami roidong ah heh nyamka nawa ih tajen hoonka.”
Eno Jisu ih arah tiitthaak tiit ah baat rumta: “Ehak di changteng wah wasiit angta heh di cham seetheng phek hantek angta.
Heh ih thunta, ‘Ngah di cham lomthiin theng tajeeka. Ngah ih tumjih et ang doh se ah?
Ngah ih amet ang,’ heh teeteewah suh liita; ‘ngah ih nga pung ah thaak haat angno ena elong we et huk hoon ang, erah doh nga cham nyia jaat hoh hukkhaak loong anep jen lomthiin ang.
Eno ngah ih nga teewah suh li ang, Khangraangse wah! Andi jaatrep hukkhaak paang rookwih raangtaan ih jeela. Roidong amah ba hanih, jok oh, phak oh, eno roidong doh tenroon ih tong oh!’
Enoothong Rangte ih heh suh liita, ‘Thungko wah an! Niikja an roidong ah ethoon ete; eno nyamka nyi hukkhaak loong ah an raangtaan ih lomthiin hu loong ah o choh theng ah?”
Eno Jisu ih thoonbaatta, “Marah ih heh nyamka loong taat lomthiin ha rah Rangte jiinko ni heh changteng tah angka.”
Eno Jisu ih heliphante loong suh baatta, “Erah raangtaan ih ngah ih baat rumhala ethingtong raangtaan ih phaksat suh nak sootsaam an adoleh sen sak nah kap theng nyuh akhat suh nak sootsaam an.
Roidong ah phaksat nang ih uh elongthoon, erah damdi sak ah nyuh akhat nang ih uh elongthoon.
Wokhah loong ah sokthaak an: neng ih cham uh tawenka adoleh cham uh takhanka; nengdi cham lomthiin theng pung uh tajeeka; neng ah Rangte ih dung ha! Sen ah tang woh nang ih thaangchaan!
Erah suh sootsaam anno amasah taan roiloh ejen tong tam ih an?
Sen ih erah likhiik ehinsah ah lajen phanlan kanbah, jaat hoh raangtaan ih tang tume thaam sootsaam lan?
Sok an woma popoong loong hakla rah ah; neng moot ni uh takaka adoleh neng ih neng raangtaan ih nyuh uh tawaatka. Enoothong ngah ih baat rumhala Solomon luungwang di heh nyamka erah than ang adi botseh uh arah woma popoong loong jaaseela likhiik henyuh hekhat ah tajaaseeka.
Erah woma naam suh nyuh akhat kotte rah ah Rangte, naam loong ah chiinyah bah eje enoothong rangkhah emat eah, we nah matkhaam ah. Erah ang abah heh ih sen suh nyuh akhat tanih jen koran? Sen laalom abah amasah boh ah!
