Ngah ih baat rum taha ah samthun an; ‘dah ah mabah uh heh changte nang ih elong tah angka.’ Neng ih ngah siiwi ih rumtahang bah sen uh siiwi ehan; ngah ih nyootsoot rumtang ah kap rumta bah sen ih nyootsoot han ah uh kap etheng rumta.
Eno sen loong nga mina angkan no siiwi ih han ang ah. Erah damdi ngah o ih daapkaat tahang warah neng ih tajat rumka.
Neng reenah ngah lakaat dobah nyia laroongwaan kaat dobah neng loong ah rangdah nah tamoong theng rumta; aadowa ebah, neng rangdah ah biin anaan takah chorumka.
O mina ih ngah miksuk halang seng Wah uh miksuk eha.
Neng loong ah rangdah tah angtheng rumta ngah ih o uh lathaak reeka ah neng dung nah lamok reetang bah ah; tiimnge liidi, neng ih nga mamah reetang loong ah tup ih rumha, eno neng ih sek Soowah wanyiinyi miksuk hali tih.
Enoothong, erah elang jaatjaat etheng angta, neng Hootthe ni banraang thiinta ah amiisak doh ang etheng: ‘Ngah tiim lathih kangdi chiik haat rum halang.’
<<Chosokte ah kaat eha—erah langla Chiiala, Rangte tiit ami ah wuubaat suh seng Wah reenawa raaha. Ngah ih seng Wah reenawa daapkaat hang, eno heh ih nga tiit ah baat han.
Eno, sen loong ah jaakhoh dowa ih nga damdi ang thoidoh sen ih uh nga tiit tumbaat an.
<<Ngah ih arah jengkhaap ah baat rumhala, sen laalom ah naktoom toihaat an ngeh ah.
Sen loong ah Jehudi rangsoomnok nawa dokphanhaat ehan, eno sen tek haat saapoot uh thok eha, neng ih mok samthun ah sen tek haat ah suh Rangte mootkaat kalang ngeh ah.
Sek Soowah ah lajat thoidoh miloong ah emah reeraang rum ah.
Amadi sen loong asuh baat rumhala langla, emah ih siiwi handoh sen loong ah ih toom samthun an. <<Jaakhodi, ngah sen damdi ang thoidi arah tiit ah tabaat rum taha.
Ngah o ih daapkaat tahang, amadi heh taang ni ngaakwang lang, erabah uh sen ih ngasuh mani wanglu ngeh ih o ih uh tacheng ri.
Eno amadi sen suh emah baatrum kohaano, sen loong ah thungjoong elan.
Enoothong sen loong asuh amiisak tiit ah baat rumhala: Ngah wanglaan ih ang bah sen raang ih ese ang ah, tiimnge liidi ngah lamok wang kangbah sen Chosokte ah sen jiinnah taraara ang ah. Enoothong ngah dok soonwang tangno, sen Chosokte ah ekaat ih thuk hang.
Esa Chiiala ah ra haano, mongrep mina suh neng rangdah tiit ah jatthuk ah, kateng tiit ah jatthuk ah, erah damdoh Rangte ih dande tiit ah jatthuk ih ah.
Ngah lahanpi thoidoh, neng ih rangdah tiit ah tadanjat rumka ang ah;
neng ih kateng tiit ah tajat rumka, tiimnge liidi ngah seng Wah reeni wanglang eno ngah takah japtupri ang ah,
eno neng loong ah dande tiit ah tajat rumka, tiimnge liidi arah mongrep dowa neng pante ah jen dande eta.
<<Ngah ih sen suh baattheng ene tah angka, erabah uh amadoh baat rumha bah tajen naanchaat kan ang ah.
Enoothong, Rangte amiitiit jatthukte Chiiala raaha doh, heh ih amiisak lampo adoh siit han. Heh ih heh chaan nawa ih tajengka ang ah, enoothong heh ih tiimjih japchaat ah erah ba jeng ah nyia lakngah nawa tiit ah ba baat han.
Sen suh Chiiala ah ih nga jeng ah baatkaat hanno nga rangka thuk hang.
Seng Wah suh tiimjeela jirep ah nga raangtaan; erah thoidoi baat rumhala Chiiala ih nga jiin nawa tiim chaat ah erah ah baat han.
<<Chomroe doh sen ih ngah takah boot japtupri, eno chomroe lidoh ngah we japtup ehe.>>
Mararah heliphante loong ah nengneng chengmui rumta, <<Heh ih tiim asuh liiha, chomroe doh sen ih takah boot japtupri eno chomroe lidoh ngah we japtup ehe ngeh ah; eno heh ih emah uh eli eha, ‘tiimnge liidi ngah seng Wah jiinni wanglang.’
Chomroe ah tiim asuh liiha? Tiimjih suh li koja, erah seng ih tajatke!>>
Jisu ih jat eta, heliphante loong ih heh suh cheng ah ngeh ah, erah raangtaan ih Jisu ih baat rumta, <<Ngah ih liihang, ‘Chomroe sen ih takah boot japtupri, eno chomroe lidoh pootsiit we tup ehe.’ Erah li kangno tanih kah chengmui lan?
Ngah ih ami tiit ah baat rumhala: Seng loong ah nga raangtaan ih ehu ih an, enoothong mongrep dowa miloong ah eroon ih ah; sen loong abah thungthet ih an erabah uh erah lih adoh eroon ih an.
Minuh ah heh sah tup tok thok kohaano sootsaam ela, tiimnge liidi heh chamnaang tok ah thok ehala; enoothong heh sah dongtup ano heh chamchoh ah beehaat eha, tiimnge liidi heh arah mongrep adi heh sah tup kano eroon ela.
Erah likhiik sen loong asuh emamah ang ah: Amadi sen loong ah thungthet elan, enoothong ngah ih we japtup ih rumha, eno sen loong ah erah than ih roon an sen tenroon ah o ih uh tajen nge ran.
<<Sen loong asuh ami tiit ah baat rumhala, saapoot thok haadoh sen ih tiim uh tasuh ri ang ah. Sen suh amiisak tiit baat rumhala; nga mendoh seng Wah jiin nawa tiimsuh an, erah heh ih kot ih han.
Amadoh nga mendoh maang suh ang an bah; sen ih suk ih an, eno erah choh anno sen ten laanchem roh ih roon an.
<<Ngah ih arah jengkhaap loong ah tiitthaak toobaat damdi baat rumhala. Enoothong saapoot ah thok eha ngah ih tiitthaak lam ih takah baat rumra, enoothong seng Wah tiit ah saasa ih baat rumha.
Erah rangwu thok haadoh sen loong ah ih seng Wah jiin nawa nga mendoh suh an, sen mendoh nga ih suh ang ngeh ih taliikang,
Sengwah heteteewah ih sen loong ah minchan ih halan. Sen loong ah ih ngah nook kohe nyia Rangte reenawa ra hala ngeh ih hanpi thoidi seng Wah ih sen uh minchan ih halan.
Ngah arah mongrep adi seng Wah reenawa ra tahang, eno arah mongrep ah thiinhaat angno seng Wah jiinni ngaakwang lang.>>
Eno heliphante loong ah ih Jisu suh baatta, <<Amadi bah an ih saasa ih jenglu, tiitthaak lam ih labaat ah.
Amadi kokjat ehi an ih jirep ah jat ehu ngeh ah; an suh mih ih miicheng jih tajeeka. Erah thoidi Rangte reenawa raahalu ngeh ih seng ih jat ehi.>>
Jisu ih ngaakcheng rumta, <<Amadi hanpi tam ih han?
Saapoot ah amadi jen thok ehala, sen loong ah noongrep nah saapsoon an, nga luulu thiinhaat heeno sen nok nah saapsoon an. Enoothong emah ebah nga luulu tah angkang, tiimnge liidi seng Wah nga damdi eje.
Ngah ih arah tiit ah nga damdi anghanno semroongroong ih toomtong rum ah ngeh ih baat rumhala. Sen loong ah mongrep mih ih chamnaang ih thuk han. Enoothong sen lacho theng! Ngah ih mongrep ah jen etang!>>
Erah jeng ano Jisu rangko toonsokwan ano liita, <<Ewah, saapoot ah thok ehala, an Sah rangka thuk uh, heh ih an toom we choomjoot thuk ho.
Mina thoontang khothung ni an ih heh suh chaan aphaan kotu, an ih kotu mina loong asuh lathoon theng roidong jen kot suh ah.
Lathoon theng roidong ah langla, amiisak Rangte ah an luulu jat halu nyia an ih daapkaat taho Kristo jat ha asuh liiha.
Arah hah adi an rangka ah ngah ih noisok etang; an ih mootthuk tahang mootkaat ah ejen etang.
Ewah! Arah hah maangdong di, an damdi angtok doh nga rangka tahang ah likhiik an ngathong nah amadoh nga rangka hang.
<<Arah mongrep dowa mina kotahang loong asuh an ejat ih thuk taha. Erah koh halang mina loong ah an mina angta. Neng ih an jeng ah kap eta,
eno an ih koh halang jirep ah an jiin nawa ra hala ngeh ih amadi jat ih rumha.
Neng suh an tiitkhaap baat tahang tiit ah baat ih rumtang, eno neng ih erah tiitkhaap ah kap ih rumta; neng ih jat eha ngah amiisak an reenawa ra tahang, eno an ih daapkaat tahang ah neng ih hanpi ih rumha.
<<Ngah ih neng raang ih soomhang. Arah mongrep raangtaan ih tah soomkang, enoothong an ih kotahang loong raang ih soomhang, tiimnge liidi neng loong an mina.
Nga dam dowa loong ah an mina, an reedowa mina loong ah nga raangtaan; nga rangka ah neng jun ih noisok ha.
Eno, ngah amadi an taang ni wang halang; arah mongrep adi takah boottong kang, enoothong neng loong ah arah mongrep adi thiinhaat hang. Esa Rangte! An ih ngasuh kotahang men dowa chaan anphaan nawa ih puipang ih rum uh, sek esiit angli tih likhiik neng uh esiit toom angrum ah.
Ngah neng loong damdi angtang adoh an ih kotahang men dowa chaan aphaan nawa ih puipang ih rumtang, wasiit taan uh maat haat muh, marah emat jaatjaat ete angta ba mata—erabah Rangteele ni raangha jun ih ang etheng jaatjaat angta.
Amadi ngah an reeni wang halang, eno ngah arah mongrep ni angang di nga tenroon nah neng ten laanchem roh toomtong rum ah ngeh liihang.
Ngah ih an tiitkhaap ah baatrum kangno arah mongrep dowa miloong ah ih miksuk ih rumha, neng uh nga likhiikkhiik arah mongrep mih takah angrumka.
Ngah ih neng loong ah arah mongrep dowa toonsiit ih uh ngeh taliikang, neng loong ah Soitaan lak nawa puipang esuh baat we hala.
Nga likhiikkhiik neng uh arah mongrep mih takah angka.
Amiitiit jun ih neng loong ah anteewah lak nah look haat uh, tiimnge liidi an jengkhaap ah amiisak.
An ih ngah mamah ih daapkaat tahang, erah likhiik ngah ih uh neng loong ah mongrep ni daapkaat rumlang.
Neng raang ih nga teewah an suh look haat hala, tiimnge liidi neng ih uh neng teewah ah amiisak ih an lak nah toom look haat rumho.
<<Neng raang ih luulu tasoomkang, neng ih tiitkhaap baatkaat rum adoh nga hanpiite loong raang ih nep soomhang.
Neng loongtang esiit ih toom angrum ah. Ewah! Neng loong ah sek damdoh toom jen angha, an nga damdi adoleh ngah an damdi likhiik ah. Neng loong ah esiit toom angrum ah, arah mongrep dowa miloong ah ih ngah an ih daapkaat tahang ah toom hanpi rum ah.
An ih choomjoh tahang ah likhiik ih neng uh emamah ih rangka thuk rumhang, enooba neng esiit ih angrum ah, seknyi angli tih likhiik ah:
Ngah neng damdi eno an nga damdi, enooba neng loong ah esiit jaatjaat ih angrum ah, tiimnge liidi arah mongrep dowa miloong ah ih ngah an ih daapkaat tahang ah toomjat rum ah nyia an ih ngah minchan halang ah likhiik neng uh an ih emamah ih minchan hu.
<<Ewah! Neng loong ah an ih ngasuh kohalang, eno ngah manah angang neng uh nga damdam toom ang rumha, enooba neng ih nga rangka ah chotup rum ah, marah mongrep maanghoon di nga rangka tu nyia minchan ih tahang ah.
Ewah Katengthoon! Arah hah dowa miloong ah ih tajat ru ngah ih ba jat hala eno arah loong ah ih an ih daapkaat tahang ngeh ih jat rumha.
Neng suh an jen jat ih thukrum taha, eno erah jatroh ih thukrum ang, enooba an ih nga minchan halang ah neng ih uh choh toom ih rum ah, eno ngah uh neng damdoh eje toom ang ang.>>
Jisu ih rang ah jensoom ano, Kidron joisah saangko heliphante loong damdi daankata. Erah di pa esiit angta, eno Jisu nyia heliphante loong ah erah di nopwang rumta.
Jisu jootkotte Judas ih erah pa ah mani angta erah jat eta, tiimnge liidi heliphante loong ah damdi Jisu erah di hepoot hepoot pakchomui roh ka ih rumta.
Erah thoidi romwah phokhothoon nyia Pharisi nok hah loong ah ih Judas damdi Room nok hah sipaahi nyia Rangteenook bante loong ah langpi papi ih wangthuk rumta, eno neng loong ah weetook nyia phiitwe ah piirum ano erah pa adi nopwang rumta.
Jisu ih heh teeteewah ah mamah theng ah, erah banjat eta, eno neng taangko ih tiitkhoom kah ano cheng rumta, <<O jam han sen ih ah?>>
“Najaret dowa Jisu,” neng loong ah ih ngaakbaat rumta. “Erah liihan abah ngah,” Jisu ih baat rumta. Mih khumtante, Judaas, ah erah di roongchap wangta.
Jisu ih <<Erah liihan abah ngah ngeh ih liikano<< neng liko ih ngaakchap rum ano hah ni loongjup rumta.
Jisu ih weengaak cheng rumta, “O jam han sen ih ah?” “ Najaret dowa Jisu,” neng loong ah ih liita.
<<Ngah ih jen baat ih rum taha erabah ngah ngeh ah.>> Jisu ih baat rumta, <<Ngah jam hali bah wahoh loong ah ngaakkaat ih thuk an.’’ Jisu ih emah ih li rumta. (
Heh ih maangdi ban baatta ah amiisak ih angsuh neng loong asuh emah li rumta, Jisu ih Hewah rang ah emah ih soomta: <<Ewah! An ih kotahang miloong ah wasiit taan uh ngah ih mat haatmuh.>>)
Simon Pitar ih lang esiit huita, erah dokkhoom ano Romwah phokhothoon dah na ah dakmiiko ah dat dookta. Erah dah men ah langla Malkus ngeh angta.
Jisu ih Pitar suh liita, <<An lang ah hetoop adoh sak hui uh! Seng Wah ih kohalang chamnaang lookkep adoh tajokka nih thun hu?>>
Eno Room nawa sipaahi nyia neng saahaap, erah damdi Jehudi nok hah bante loong ah ih Jisu ah jorum ano kit rumta,
jaakhoh thoon ah Kaiphas hopwah Anna reeni siitwan rumta, erah paang adi Kaiphas ah Romwah Phokhothoon angta.
Jehudi ngoong awang loong asuh loongtang raang ih wasiit tek ah eseethoon ang ah ngeh ih hukbaatte ah Kaiphas angta.
Pitar nyia heliphante wahoh wasiit Jisu lilih ih phankhoom kanyuuta. Erah heliphante ah Romwah Phokhothoon damdi menjat ang thoidi, Romwah Phokhothoon nok taakkhu ni Jisu damdi waknop wangta,
eno Pitar ah paakaawan adi banchapta. Heliphante ah kaalu ko ngaak kah ano jaalasah nusiit chapta asuh baat ano Pitar ah waknopsiit wanta.
Enoothong jaalasah rah ih kaalu adi Pitar suh chengta, <<An uh Jisu liphante tanih angkoko?>> <<Ngah tah angkang,>> Pitar ih ngaakbaatta.
Song ang kano, laksuh nyia bante loong ah we ah takrum ano songlom suh weekaang ni kookchap rumta. Erah di Pitar ah wang ano weekaang ni roong lomchap wangta.
Romwah Phokhothoon ih Jisu suh heliphante loong tiit nyia heh ih nyootsootta ah chengta.
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, “Saarookwet ngah nokraat ni mirep suh saasa ih jenglang; Jehudi rangsoomnok ni nyia Rangteenok ni, maradi miloong ah kalomkhoon rum taha di ah. Mabah uh ngah husah ni jengmuh
An ih emah tiim esuh cheng halang? Nga jeng boichaatte loong asuh cheng uh. Ngah ih tiimjih baat rumtang neng ih chaat eta.>>
Jisu ih emah li kano, bante dowa wasiit ih hethe ni baangbuh ano liita, <<Romwah Phokhothoon suh an ih emah mamah naan liihu!>>
Jisu ih heh suh ngaak liitta, “Ngah tiim bah uh mokjeng etang bah, mirep suh adoh baat uh. Enoothong ngah tiim jengtang erah punjeng etang baleh tiim esuh buh halang?>>
Annas ih Jisu ah kitchoi Romwah Phokhothoon Kaiphas taang ni wangthukta.
Erah di Pitar ah weekaang ni chaproh eta. Erah thoidi miloong ah ih cheng rumta, <<An uh erah wah liphante taba ang koko?>> Pitar ih weeliita, <<Ngah ah tah angkang.>>
Romwah Phokhothoon dah wasiit, Pitar ih heh na datdook ta phoh awah erah di eje angta. Erah dah rah ih liita, <<Jisu damdi pa ni taba tup taha?>>
Eno Pitar we leekta, Tajatkang—erah damdam ih woh ah weeta.
Rangkhano ih Kaiphas nok nawa Jisu ah Kobono noklong ni siitwan rumta. Neng banlam di Khopi kuwaang miiphaksat suh neng ah esa ang theng, erah thoidi Jehudi ngoong awang loong ah kobono nokmong ni tanop wang rumta.
Erah thoidi Pilat ah dokkhoom kah ano chengkah rumta, <<Arah mih ah tiim thoidi jowan halan?>>
Neng ih ngaakbaatta, <<Lamoongre dobah an suh ju tajoot kot wantheng tahe.>>
<<Emah ang abah sen hootthe jun ih mat ah taat hoonkaat thaak an.>> Pilat ih baat rumta. Jehudi loong ah ih ngaakli rumta, <<Seng ih mih tami tek haatke.>> (
Erah langla Jisu ih heh mamah ih tektheng ah erah tiit ban baatta ah wuusa nah amiimi dong angsuh jeng rumta.)
Pilat ih Jisu nokmong ni poonwan ano cheng wanta, <<An Jehudi Luuwang nih ah?>>
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, <<Nga tiit ah an thung ih tamcheng halang tam aleh mih ih baat ho ih cheng halang?>>
Pilat ih ngaak liita, <<Ngah suh Jehudi nok hah nih li halang? An mina loong nyia romwah phokhoh loong ih ba jokoh wanrum halang. An tiimjih ih kotu?>>
Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, <<Nga hasong ah arah mongrep hasong tah angka; arah mongrep hasong angta bah nga lih phanjootte loong ah Jehudi ngoong awang suh lajoot thuksuh mui etheng rumta. Nga hasong bah mongrep hasong tah angka.>>
Eno Pilat ih Jisu suh chengta, <<Enoobah, an luuwang tam ah?>> Jisu ih ngaakbaatta, <<An ih liitu ngah luuwang ngeh ah. Ngabah dongtup hangno arah mongrep adi jisiit raangtaan ih ra tahang, erah langla amiitiit ah baat suh. O mina amiisak mih ang ah erah ih nga jeng ah boichaat hang .
“Enoobah amiitiit ah tiimah?” Pilat ih chengta. Eno Pilat ah weengaak dokkhoom kah ano miloong asuh liikah rumta, <<Heh tiim thoilam doh thet haat theng ah ngah ebah tah jatjoh kang.
Enoothong sen banlam di, Khopiikuh rookwet sen raangtaan ih phaatak nawa wasiit ah daap haat koroh erum hala. Sen loong raangtaan ih Jehudi luuwang ah daap haat kot ah tamjam han?”
Neng loong ah ih riiraak damdi ngaakbaat rumta, “Heh tah angka! Barabbas jamhi! (Barabbas ah miputte angta.)
Eno Pilat ih Jisu ah siitwan ano ruh ih bot thuk rumta.
Arami loong ah ih bangkaang hesupan nawa ih khopok ah hoon rum ano hekhoh ni pokthuk rumta; saangham nyuh ah hesak adi dekkoh rum eta
heh reeni raarum hano li rumta, “Roiloh toom angkah Jehudi luwang ah!” Eno neng ah wangrum ano paatbuh rumta.
Pilat ah jaasiit we ngaak dokkhoom kah ano miloong asuh baat rumta, “sok thaak an, nga ih sen reenah dongsiit kaat hang, enoothong heh tek haatjih bah ngah ih tachoh jokang.”
Erah di Jisu ah dokkhoom ra taha, sukhopok ah pok saangham nyuh ah kap ano dong ra taha. Pilat ih baat rumta, sok thaak an, mih abah arah!”
Heh ah kaptup rum ano romwah phokhoh loong nyia Rangteenok bante loong ah ri rumta, “Heh ah tekrapbot etheng! Heh ah tekrapbot etheng!” Pilat ih li rumta, “Siitkaat anno tekrapbot kaat an. Ngah ebah heh dut haat theng tajapjoh kang.”
Miloong ah ih ngaak riibaat rumta, seng hotthe ni eli eha heh ah tek haat etheng ngeh ah, tiimnge liidi heh ih ngah Rangte Sah ngeh chaangta.”
Erah chaat ano Pilat ah ehan han ih choota.
Pilat ah nopwang ano Jisu suh cheng wangta, <<An manawa ra halu?>> Enoothong Jisu tangaak jengta.
Pilat ih liita, <<Nga damdoh tanih waan ru?>> <<An ih tanih jatko nga jiinni chaan jeela ngeh ah, daap uh jen daap haat eha bangphak nah uh jen rapbot eha.>>
Jisu ih ngaak liita, An ih ngah tiim ehang bah uh erah chaan ah Rangte ih koh halu. Erah raangtaan ih an suh nga jootkotte ah rapne ih moong reela.>>
Jisu jeng ah chaat ano, Pilat ih daap haat taat chungta. Enoothong miloong ah weengaak ri rumta, <<An ih Jisu mok daap haat ubah, Luuwanglong joonte tah angko! O mina ih ngah Luuwang ngeh ih chaangha mih abah Luuwanglong piiara!>>
Pilat ih erah jeng ah chaat ano, mat hoonkotte “Jongtongtheng” ngeh ih menrumta adi Jisu ah doksiit kaat ano tong kata (erah suh Hebrew nok hah ih <<Gabbatha<< ngeh menta.)
Khopui Kuwaang phaksat khookhamja rangnithung di Pilat ih miloong asuh liita, <<Sen Luuwang ah arah!>>
Eno miloong ah ngaak ri rumta, <<Tek haat etheng! Tek haat etheng! Bangphak khona rapbot theng!>> Pilat ih cheng rumta, <<Sen Luuwang ah nih tek haatthuk he?>> Romwah phokhoh loong ih ngaakbaatta, <<Seng luuwang bah Luuwanglong luulu!>>
Eno Pilat ih Jehudi loong asuh Jisu ah bangphak khoni rapbotkaat thuk rumta. Miloong ah ih Jisu doksiit kaat rumta.
Jisu ih bangphak ah pi ano <<Mikhoraang hah<< adi kata. (Jehudi loong ih <<Golgotha<< ngeh menha.)
Jisu damdi mih wanyi ah uh erah di rapbot rumta, Jisu ah ehong adi mih wanyi ah haanghop ih rapbot rumta.
Pilat ih mih suh jatthuk suh raang ano bangphak adi chiita, erah di raangta, <<Najaret dowa Jisu, Jehudi Luuwang.>>
Erah le adi Hebrew, Latin nyia Grik jenglam ih raangta, eno samnuthung dowa ih Jisu rapbotta hah ah haloh lah angkokaano mirep ih erah raangta ah toonsokleh weh kah ih rumta.
Romwah phokhoh loong ah Pilat reeni wang ano liita, <<Jehudi Luuwang<< ngeh ih nak raang uh<< erah nang ih bah <<Arah mih ah ih liita, Ngah Jehudi Luuwang<< emah ih raang uh.
Pilat ih ngaak liita, <<Ngah ih tiimjih raangtang, emamah toom ang ah.>>
Sipaahi loong ah ih Jisu ah bangphak ni rapbot lini heh ih kapta nyuh ah khoobaji ih khoohoom rum ano phe rumta. Heh samsong ah uh wakpi ih rumta, erah samsong ah hewet muh khoolaan angta.
Sipaahi loong ah nengneng jaachi ni baatmui rumta, <<Seng ih lakhoohoom theng; eranang ebah o ih choh thaak asuh jong tetaak ah rang nah haat eno tootoon ih.>> Arah langla Rangteele ni amah raangthiinta ah amiisak ih dong angta: <<Neng loong ah ih nga nyuh ah phe ih rumta eno nga samsong ah rang ni haat rum ano tootoon rumta.>> Sipaahi loong ah emamah ih reeraang rumta.
Jisu bangphak re adi heh nuh nyia heh no Klopas minuh Meeri chapta, Meeri Magdalen uh erah di roongchapta.
Heh nuh nyia heliphante hemongnook warah japtup ano Jisu ih heh nuh suh liita, <<Heh an sah.>>
Erah lih adi heliphante asuh liita, <<Arah an nuh.>> Erah ja dowa ih heliphante ah ih erah nuh ah heh nok ni siitkaatta.
Jisu ih jat eta jirep ah thoon eta; eno Rangteele ni raangthiinta amiisak ih angsuh heh ih liita, <<Ngah joongle ih leelang.>>
Erah di thaangneethoon kham keethiin choi khaplang esiit angta, mih wasiit ih kham adi nyuchiin ah tem ano, hissop bangkaang adi khakta, eno toonpi ano Jisu tui ni mooksuta.
Jisu ih erah jok ano jengta, <<Thoon eta!>> Eno heh tok ah songhaat ano thaktiita.
Eno Jehudi ngoong awang loong ah ih Pilat suh bangphak khoni rapbot rumta loong lah ah thabuh rum ano datthiin esuh cheng rumta. Erah saalih adi Jehudi naangtongsa, hoondak rangwuuja angta, erah thoidi neng ih thunta Jehudi naangtongsa doh neng mang ah bangphak khonah naktoom thoktong ah ngeh ah.
Eno sipaahi loong ah ih jaakhoh ah Jisu reeni rapbotta mih lah thabuh ano wasiit lah ah we thabuh rumta.
Enoothong Jisu reeni wang rum adi jen tekchoi ang kano, heh lah ah tathabuh rumta.
Enoothong, sipaahi wasiit ih heh saam ni Pah ih sot kano joong nyi sih loong ah dokjanta. (
Erah angta rah mih ih heh mikmik ih japtup arah baat ha, erah raangtaan ih sen ih uh hanpi ih an. Erah baatte ah ih amiitiit ah jat eha, ngah ih amiitiit ah baat hang ngeh ah.)
Rangteele ni raangthiinta ah amiisak ih angla: Erah di amah raangha, <<heraang esiit taan uh tathaka.>>
Rangteele ehoh ni uh li eha <<Pah esuh arah miloong ah ih kooksok ah.>>
Erah lih adi, Aramia nok hah Josep ih Pilat suh Jisu mang ah jenpi nih ih kaat ang ngeh cheng wangta. (Josep ah husah di Jisu liphante angta, enoothong heh Jehudi ngoong awang ra choota.) Pilat ih jenpi ih kaat uh li kano Josep ih bangphak dowa heh mang ah datpi wangta.
Heh damdi Nikodimas roongwaangta, jaakhoh ni uh Jisu damdi heh rangphe di chomui choi angta. Nikodimas ih phontum jih miir nyia aloes ah woi ano took rookjom taan piikaatta.
Erah nyi ih Jisu mang ah datpi nyuh ano phontum ah ih hut nyuuta, eno nyuh ih thooploop nyu ano Jehudi banlam di ebeng ih kaat suh emah ih khookham rumta.
Jisu tek haat rumta pa adi mangbeng theng ena esiit angta erah di o mang uh beng muh angta.
Jehudi naangtongsa ah erah saalih adi angta eno erah mangbeng ah uh haniik ni ang thoidi Jisu mang ah erah di beng nyuuta.
Naangtongsa, Meeri Megdalen chichuuwi ih rang maang phaakwu kaadi mangbeng ah taatsok kah adi mangbeng kepta jong dokkongchoi angta.
Erah thoidi, Pitar nyia Jisu mongnook heliphante reeni soonkah ano baatkaat nyuuta, <<Teesu bah mangbeng nawa mih ih dokpi ih katta, mani thiinkaat koja tajatke!>>
Erah baatrum kano, heliphante hejoon wasiit siit ano Pitar nengnyi ih mangbeng ah sokkah nyuuta.
Nengnyi echaan ih taatsoon kanyuuta, erabah uh heliphante wasiit ah Pitar ah jiitsoon ano jaakhoh thok soonta.
Mang beng adi ngupbon ano taatsok adi hemong ni nyuh waariiri jangdat arah japtupta, enoothong hemong ni heh nopwang muh.
Heh lilih Simon Pitar ah thok haano, phangla ih nopwangta. Heh uh erah di nyuleep jangdat arah nyia
heh khoh dekta nyuh ah japtup wangta. Heh khodek nyuh ah hetuituidat eta nyuh ah damdi lah angthang ah.
Eno heliphante wasiit jaakhoh thokte warah uh roong nop ih wangta eno nyuh ah japtup ano heh ih hanpi eta. (
Erah pootdi neng ih Rangteele ni raangthiinta ah tajat rumta, tek nawa we ngaaksaat jaatjaat ih ah liiha rah ah.)
Eno heliphante wanyi ah nok ni ngaakwang nyuuta.
Meeri ah mangbeng kaang ni chap ano huuta. Hu damdi, mangbeng adi ngupbon sok adi
rangsah wanyi Jisu mang thiinta adi hekhoh helah ih nyupu ah kap nyu ano tongnyu arah japtupta.
Nengnyi ih cheng nyuuta, <<Minuh, tiimnge hu lu? Meeri ih baat nyuuta, <<Nga Teesu ah soonpi ih rumha, mani thiinkaat rum koja tajatkang!>>
Eno Meeri ah ngaakwang esuh lekchap adi Jisu japtupta; enoothong heh ih Jisu ngeh tajatta.
Jisu ih chengta, <<Minuh, tiimnge hu lu? O jamboi hu?>> Meeri ih pa ni motte heh angka ngeh samthun ano liita; Chuupha, <<An ih ma dokpi weeju oh? Enoobah heh mang ah mani thiinhu baat ih weehang, ngah ih toonpi kaat suh ah.>>
Jisu ih liita, <<Meeri!>> Meeri ah Jisu taangko lekchap ano Jehudi jenglam ih liita, <<Rabboni!>> (Erah langla Jehudi jenglam ih <<Leenyootte<< suh liiha)
Jisu ih liita, <<Ngah nak taajoh hang<< Ngah seng Wah jiinni maang ngaakwang kang. Ngaaphoh ngaano loong suh baatkaat uh, seng Wah nyia neng loong Wah, nga Rangte nyia neng loong Rangte jiinni ngaakwangla ngeh ah.>>
Erah raangtaan ih Meeri ah heliphante loong reeni kah ano Teesu japtup tiit nyia neng loong suh baatkaat tiit baatta ah baatkaat rumta.
Heliphante loong ah Jehudi ngoong awang loong raacho ih kaalu ah tangsak rum ano Naangtongsa rangja di nokmong ni khoontong rumta. Erah di Jisu ah neng laktung ni dongchap hano jengta, <<Semroongroong ih tong an.>>
Erah jeng ano heh lakma nyi heh saam ah noisok rumta. Eno heliphante loong ah neng Teesu ah tup rum ano rapne ih roon rumta.
Eno Jisu ih we liita, <<Semroongroong ih tong an.>> Seng Wah ih ngah kaat thuk halang ah likhiik, sen uh emamah ih kaat thukrum hala.>>
Erah baatrum ano neng khoni heh tak ih mot rum ano li rumta, << Esa Chiiala ah thaang an.>>
Sen ih wahoh rangdah ah biin anaan hoon anbah, neng rangdah ah biin anaan hoon ih ah; sen ih biin anaan lahoon kanbah, neng rangdah ah uh biin anaan tahoonka.>>
Asih wanyi heliphante loong dowa, Thomas (Twin ngeh poon rumta) ah Jisu dongkhoomta adi amuh angta.
Erah thoidi heliphante wahoh loong ah ih Thomas suh baat rumta, <<Seng ih Jisu japtup eti!>> Eno Thomas ih li rumta, <<heh lak ni jaanwot ih po botta ah latup kangbah nyia heh lakpo adoleh heh saampo adoh nga laktiik maang thaak laanglaang tahanpi kang.>>
Saasinet lidi heliphante loong ah nokmong ni we khoontong rumta doh, Thomas uh neng damdi eje angta. Nok kaalu ah tangsak choi ang adi Jisu neng laktung ni we dongchap wang ano jengta, <<Semroongroong ih tong an.>>
Eno Jisu ih Thomas suh liita, <<An laktiik ih tasuh uno nga lakma ah Taat sok thaak uh adoleh nga saam ma ah an lak ih taajoh thaak uh. Tenchi nak ang uh hanpi ih hang!>>
Thomas ngaakjengta, <<Nga Teesu nyia nga Rangte!>>
Jisu ih Thomas suh liita, <<Ngah ah tup hangno tam hanpi halang? Ngah latup rangdi hanpiiha loong ah tiimthan tenroon ah!>>
Heliphante loong miksok di Jisu mih paatjaajih rapne ih mokata, erah loong ah arah Leedap ni raangthiin muh.
Arah sen ih hanpi toom ih an ngeh ih raangthiin ha, Jisu ah Rangte Sah Kristo eno heh hanpi jun ih sen ih roidong ah choh an.
Erah lini, Taiberia juusitum adi heliphante loong ah damdi Jisu emah we dongkhoomta.
Erah di Simon Pitar, Thomas (Khaangpeh ngeh ih poon rumta ah), Nathanel (Galili kooni Kana dowa), Jebedi sah nyia Jisu liphante wanyi loongtang eroom ang rumta.
Eno Simon Pitar ih heh joonte loong asuh baat rumta, <<Ngah bah chaak ha kah ang.>> Eno heh joon loong ah ih li rumta, “Seng uh wakkaat ehe,” eno neng loong khoonkhu ni karumta. Erah rangpheeja pheetang ih chaak ah taat ha rum adi tiim uh takap rumta.
Rangsa dong damdam di, Jisu juukaang ni banchapta, eno heliphante loong ah ih Jisu ngeh ih tajat rumta.
Eno Jisu ih cheng rumta, <<Jaaro loong, tiim uh tanih kap kan?>> <<Tiim uh takapke,” Jaaro loong ih baat rumta.
Eno Jisu ih baat rumta, khoonkhu chap thuk lan dakmiiko adoh chaak ah haat an, nyah erah doh kap ih an.>> Erah raangtaan ih neng chaak ah haat rum ano tajen ngaak hom rumta, chaak adi nyah hantek nyaanta.
Eno heliphante Jisu moongnook warah ih Pitar suh liita, <<Teesu bo ah!>> Pitar ih Teesu ngeh ih japchaat ano heh nyuh ah toonkap ano (heh nyuh ah khookpi eta) juukhoh ni datpit kata.
Heliphante wahoh loong ah chaak adi nyah hesiit ih hoom rum ano juukaang ko ih wang rumta. Saanghook dowa ih ju ah haloh tah angta, ngookchaajom taan haloot angta.
Neng loong ah juukaang adi thok rum adi, we khoni nyah nyia baanlo tupwang rumta.
Eno Jisu ih li rumta, <<Sen ih kaptan nyah dowa esiitnyi than piiwan han.>>
Simon Pitar ah khoonkhu ko ngaak kah ano chaak adi nyah elonglongwah juukaang ko ih toonhoom kata, erah di elonglong ah chaasiit rookbanga ejom angta; nyah hantek ang ah bah uh chaak ah tah randatta.
Jisu ih poon rumta, <<Phaksah wanghan.>> Eno heliphante loong ah ih o ih uh tanaan cheng rumta, <<An o anglu ngeh ah?>> Neng loong ah ih jat ih rumta heh Teesu ngeh ah.
Eno Jisu ah toonchapkah ano baanlo nyia nyah ah pheekoh rumta.
Jisu tek nawa ngaaksaat lidi erah ih takjom chomui rumta.
Jen phaksah rum ano, Jisu ih Simon Pitar suh liita, <<Joon sah Simon, wahoh loong ih minchan halang nang ih an ih ehan tam minchan halang?>> <<Minchan ih hala, Teesu,>> Pitar ih ngaak liita, <<an ih jat ih hu ngah ih an minchan ih hala<< ngeh ah. Jisu ih Pitar suh baatta, <<Nga saapsah loong ah sokboi uh.>>
Jisu ih Pitar suh taknyi chengta, <<Joon sah Simon, <<ngah an ih minchan nih ehalang?>> “Em Teesu,” “an ih jat ih hu ngah ih an minchan ih hala<< ngeh ah. Jisu ih baatta, <<Nga saapsah loong ah sokboi uh.>>
Jisu ih takjom chengta, <<Joon sah Simon, an ih ngah minchan nih ih halang?>> Jisu ih takjom cheng kano Pitar ah thungjoong eta, <<ngah an ih minchan nih ih halang?>> ngeh ih cheng kano ah. Erah raangtaan ih Pitar ih Jisu suh liita, <<Teesu an ih jirep ah jat ih hu; an ih jat ih hu ngah ih an minchan ih hala ngeh ah!” Jisu ih Pitar suh baatta, <<Nga saap ah sokboi uh.
Ngah ih amiitiit baat hala; an jaaro tokdi mani kaat thung ah erah di katu; enoothong teekaang ang udoh, an lak jaanghaat kuno wahoh ih an thung lahaan ko adoh siitkaat ho.>>
(Arah liiha langla, Jisu ih Pitar ah mamah ti ano Rangte rangka thuk ah erah tiit ah baat ha.) Eno Jisu ih baatta, <<Nga lilih eho!>>
Pitar lengsok adi heh liko ni heh mongnook warah, japtupta—heh ih phaksat tokdi Jisu reeni tiittong ano chengta warah ah, <<Teesu an mokwaante ah o ang ah?>>
Pitar ih heh ah japtup ano Jisu suh chengta, <<Teesu, erah mih ah mamah ang ah?>>
Jisu ih Pitar suh liita, <<Erah mih ah ngah maang ngaak raara ething tongthuk ang bah, an raangtaan ih tiimjih ang ah? Nga lilih ih ho!>>
Erah raangtaan ih kristaan loong laktung ni tiit hu moong ruurangta heliphante erah tatiika tih ngeh ah. Enoothong Jisu ih liimuh; erah mih ah tatiika ngeh ah; Jisu ih amah ba liita, <<Erah mih ah ngah maang ngaak raara ething mok tongthuk ang bah, an raangtaan ih tiimjih ang ah?>>
Erah jengkhaap jengte ah heliphante dowa wasiit angta, erah raangthiinte ah uh heh angta; eno seng ih jat ehi heh ih baat ha ah amiitiit ah baat ha.
Amadi uh, Jisu mokah arah jihoh tiit uh rapne ih je ah. Erah loong ah esiit esiit ih mok raangthiinta bah, ngah ih thaakthun angdi erah leedap ah mongrep mina loongtang ih tajen toonpi thengta.
Nga mongnook Thiophilas: Nga leedap phangkhoh adi Jisu phang mokata dowa ih rangmong ni maang toonsiit wandi tiimjih reeraangta nyia tiimjih nyootsootta
erah ah raangtang. Jisu rangmong ni maang toonsiit wanka di, heh ih danjeeta heliphante loong asuh Esa Chiiala chaan tiit ah renbaat rumta.
Heh tiita dowa ih sa rookbaji lini ething toomjat rum hang ngeh ih hedop hedop heliphante loong suh noisokta. Heliphante loong ih uh tup ih rumta, eno Rangte hasong tiit ah roongwaan rumta.
Neng loong ah eroom ih khoontong rum adi arah jengdang ah baat rumta: “Jerusalem ah nak thiinhaat an, erah nang ebah ngah ih baat rum taha ranglakkot ah bansoktheng, seng Wah ih kot etheng ngeh ih kakhatta rah ah.
Joon ih juutem ah ju nawa ih tem tahan, enoothong rekam lidoh sen loong ah Esa Chiiala nawa ih tem han.”
Kaamwah loong ah Jisu damdi eroom ih chomui rumta doh, neng ih heh suh cheng rumta, “Teesu, hasong ah amadoh Ijirel suh ngaakkot nih uh?”
Jisu ih baat rumta, “Saapoot nyia rangwu ah seng Wah luulu ih jat ah erah mabah ang ah sen ih jatjih tah angka, hechaan hephaan khui ni thiinha.
Enoothong sen taangnah Esa Chiiala raaha doh, sen loong ah chaan aphaan pan ang an, eno sen loong ah Jerusalem nah, Judia nah, Samaria nah nyia hakong rookwet nah nga haaki ang an.”
Erah baat rumta lilih, heh rang ni toonsiit wan arah phansok rumta, eno neng miksoksok di jiimu ih loop wanta.
Toon soonwang kano neng mik ah rangko sokwan roh ih rumta, eno nyuh epu ah kap ano mih wanyi neng reeni dongchap haano
baat rumta, “Galiliite oh, rangko tiimjih sokwan lan? Jisu, sen re nawa rang ni toonsiit wanta, erah likhiikkhiik ih rang nawa ngaak raaha rah japtup an.”
Erah lih adi heliphante loong ah Olip Kong dowa Jerusalem ni ngaakwang rumta, erah hah dowa meesiit chang angta.
Erah hah adi thokrum ano neng tongta nok rangkhoh ko nokkhok adi duuwang rumta: Erah di langla, Pitar, Joon, Jeems nyia Andriu, Philip nyia Thomas, Bartholomi nyia Mathiu, Alphias sah Jeems, Deek akaan raangtaan laatte Simoon, nyia Jeems sah Judaas loong angta.
Neng loong ah rangsoom raangtaan ih minuh loong nyia Jisu nuh Meeri erah damdi heh phoh nyia heh no loong damdi hepoot hepoot khoontong rumta.
Saajombaji lidi chaasit rooknyi mih rangsoomte loong khoontong rum adi, Pitar toonchap ano jengta.
Pitar ih liita, “Nga joonte loong, Esa Chiiala ih Dewid jeng thukta erah Rangteele ni raangha ah amiimi ih thok ha, Judaas ah Jisu jootkhak doh lamsiitte ang ah ngeh ih ah.
Judaas ah sengdung dowa wasiit heh mootkaatte taat danjeeta.” (
Judaas ih marah lalangka lampo nawa biita ngun ih reta phek adi tiita, heh wok ah raapphok ano heh leh loong ah nuudat eta.
Jerusalem ni songtongte loong ah ih erah japchaat rum ano, neng jenglam ih erah phek asuh Akeldama ngeh ih men rumta, erah langla “Sih Phek ngeh ah”)
“Rangsoom boong leedap ni raangha, ‘Heh nok ah ehu ih toom hoon ah; erah doh o uh naktoom tong ah.’ Amah uh raang eha, ‘Heh mootkaat ah o bah uh reeraang pakna toom ih ah.’
“Erah thoidoh, seng damdoh o bah uh weeje etheng seng Teesu Jisu Kristo ngaaksaat tiit toombaatte ah. Enoothong erah mih ah langla sengdung dowa ang theng. Seng Teesu Jisu seng damdi saarookwet roongkhoom taha di roong mootkaatte dowa mih ang theng, Joon ih juutem Ruurang tumbaatta dowa ih Jisu rang ni toonsiit wanta di o thok roong khoomta erah mih ah ang theng.”
<range>
Erah thoidi mih wanyi danje rumta: Josep, Barsabbas ngeh ih poon rumta ah (Justas ngeh ih uh li ih rumta), nyia Mathias ah.
Eno rangsoom koh rumta, “Teesu, an ih warep tenthun ah jat ehu, erah wanyi tung dowa o ah danje hu erah seng suh jatthuk he
Judaas maako kaat theng angta kaat eta erah saklek ah an liphante raangtaan ih jatthuk he”
Eno nengnyi men o danje theng ah erah tootoon rumta, eno Mathias ah danje rumta, asih wasiit kaamwah loong damdi roong angtheng ngeh ah.
Pentikos rangwu sa, Jisu hanpiite mina loong ah noksiit ni lomkhoon rumta.
Dotdi rang ni pong huuk ah likhiik, neng khoontong rumta nok dowa ih chaat rumta.
Eno tuihih likhiik weelu phaak arah japtup rumta ah neng sak ni ra taha.
Neng sak ni Esa Chiiala ah ra haano, chiiala ah ih wahoh wahoh jeng miijeng thuk rumta.
Deekrep dowa Rangte ra choote Jehudi nok hah loong ah Jerusalem ni songtong rumta.
Neng hoopti ah japchaat rum ano, miloong ah lomkhoon rumta. Jisu hanpiite loong ah maama jengjeng ih jeng rumta asuh miloong ah paatja ih rumta.
Neng loong ah paatja rum ano li rumta, “Arah jengla mina loong ah Galili nok hah!
Eno, nengjeng nengkong ah seng nok hah jeng jeng arah mamah ih chaat hi?
Seng loong ah Parthia, Media nyia Elam nawa; Mesopotamia, Judia, nyi Kappadosia nawa; Poontas nyia Esia nawa,
Phrigia nyia Pamphilia nawa, Ijip nyia Sirene reenawa Libia hah ko nawa. Seng loong mararah ah Room nawa,
Ranglajatte loong ah seng Jehudi damdi Judaisim ih roonghoon haano Judaisim angli, seng loong ah mararah langli Kritte nyia Arab nawa—rabah uh neng jeng ah seng jenglam ih Rangte mootkaat elong jen mokah arah tiit roongwaan rum arah chaat hi!”
Neng loong ah paattek nyia tanyah damdi, neng jaachi ni chengmui rumta, “Erah tiim suh liiha?”
Eno rukho loong ah Jisu hanpiite loong ah damdi doondaak siitkook ih rumta, Neng ih liita, “Arah miloong ah kham ih mok rumla!”
Pitar ah heliphante asih wasiit damdi roong toonchap ano miloong ah damdi erongwah phang jengmui rumta: Jehudi joon awan loong nyi Jerusalem ni songtongte loong, boichaat thaak he erah tiim asuh liiha erah toombaat rumha.
Arah mina loong ah kham ih tamokka, sen ih mokthun ehan; amadi rangkhah phek kaattok angla.
Arah bah khowah Joel ban jengta ah angla:
‘Rangte ih liita, rangthoon doh Ngah ih amah re ang; Ngaachi ngaala warep khoh nah ang ah. Sen sah minuh miwah loong ih nga tiitkhaap baatrum ah; sen jaaro loong ah ih motmang tup rum ah, sen teekaang loong ih mangphe mang ah.
Minuh miwah, nga jeng chaatte loong suh, Erah tokdoh ngah ih chiiala koh rum ang, Eno neng ih nga tiitkhaap baatrum ah.
Ngah ih paatjaajih rangkhothung nah noisok ang Nyia hah khui nah uh paatjaajih ang ah. Erah doh sih, we nyia weekhot ang ah;
elongthoon Teesu rangka Rangwu thok ha doh, rangsa ah nakdat ih ah, nyia laphui ah sih likhiik ih saangdat ah.
Eno, o ih Teesu men poon ah erah mina ah epui ih ah.’
“Jerusalem dowa mina loong, arah jengkhaap ah boichaat an! Najaret dowa Jisu taang ni chaan aphaan jeela, mih paatjaajih loong ah Rangte ih Jisu jun ih noisok tahan. Sen miksok ni mamah angta, loongtang ih jat ehan.
Heh kaankoong jun ih Rangte ih Jisu ah rangdah mina sen loong asuh bangphak khoni tekrapbot thuk tahan.
Enoothong Rangte ih heh chaan nawa ih saatsiit ano ngaakthing ih thukta, timnge liidi etek ih heh tajenta.
Dewid ih heh suh liita, ‘Saapoot rookwet nga Teesu ah nga ngathong ni tup hang; heh reenah ngah tasootsaam kang.
Erah raangtaan ih ngah tenroon ih tonglang, nga jengkhaap adi tenroon jeela. Ngah, tekte ang ang bah uh, nga laalom theng adoh naangtong ang,
timnge liidi an ih tek lampo nah ngah tathiinhaat rang; adoleh an jeng chaatchaatte loong ah mangbeng nah tah chaam thukko.
Roidong lam ah an ih noisok ih halang, nga reenah ang uno tenroon ih tongthuk hang.’
“Nga joonte loong, sengte sengwah Dewid Luuwang khiikkhi ah sen suh baat jaatjaat ejih. Heh ti ano bengta, heh mangbeng ah amadi uh eje.
Heh khowah angta, Rangte ih baatta ah heh ih jat eta: Rangte ih kakhamta Dewid sutom dowa wasiit heh teewah likhiik Luuwang dongthuk ah.
Rangthoon doh Rangte tiimjih re ah erah Dewid ih bantup eta, erah thoidi Kristo ngaaksaat tiit ah baatta, ‘Heh tek lampo mongrep ni tathiin haatta, Heh sak ah mangbeng ni tachaamta.’
Jisu ah Rangte ih tek nawa ngaaksaat ih thukta, seng loong ah ih jat ehi.
Jisu ah ngaaksaat thuk ano heh Wah Rangte ih jaawah ko tong thukla, eno Heh kakham jun ih Esa Chiiala ah choh eha. Amadi sen ih tiimjih tup han nyia tiimjih chaat han ah langla seng raangtaan ih ranglakkot.
Tiimnge liidi Dewid ah rangmong ni tawangta; erah nang ebah Dewid ih liita, ‘Teesu ih nga Teesu suh liita: Anpi anra loong ah ngah ih an lathong nah maang thiinthiin
nga reenah jaawah ko tong uh.’
“Jerusalem dowa miloong ah ih jat ejih, Jisu ah sen ih bangphak ni tek haat tan ah Rangte ih Teesu nyia Kristo ang thukla!”
Miloong ah ih jeng ah chaat rum ano, rapne sootsaam rumta Pitar nyia kaamwah loong suh li rumta, “Phoh ano loong seng ih tiimjih etheng ah?”
Pitar ih baat rumta, “Sen loong ah rangdah nawa sa ejih eno Jisu Kristo mendoh sen rangdah biin anaan suh juutem theng; eno Rangte lakkot Esa Chiiala ah choh an.
Rangte ih kakhamta ah sen raangtaan ih nyia sen sah loong raangtaan ih, adoleh o mina heh re nawa haloot ni angla erah loong raang ih—erah langla o mina seng Teesu Rangte ih heh jiinni poon rumha erah loong raangtaan ih.”
Pitar ih neng suh jengthoon ah jirep jenglam ih jatthuk ano li rumta, “Lajak miloong ah raangtaan ih chamnaang rangwu thok hala erah dowa maama teenuh teewah puipang an!”
Pitar jengkhaap ah hanpi rum ano miloong ah juutem rumta, erah sa dowa ih hajaat jom mina ih jaatjaang rumta.
Kaamwah loong taangnawa nyootsoot rumta di, rangsoom suh lomtong rum adi nyia phaksat room phaksah rum adi neng saapoot ah liin eta.
Kaamwah loong asuh mih paatjaajih loong reethuk kano, warep paatjaata.
Kristaan loong ah rangsoom rangtu eroomroom ih tongtha rum ano neng huikhaak uh eroomroom ih maak rumta.
Neng hah ah sangleh, o tiimjih jamha erah jun ih ngun ah phe phaksah ih rumta.
Rangwu rookwet Rangteenok ni eroomroom ih chomui rumta, neng nok ni phaksat ah roongngit roongkhu nyia tenroon woksoon, ih room phaksah rumta,
enooleh tenroon woksoon ih rangphoong rangsoom tongtha rumta. Eno rangwu rookwet khopiiroidong chote loong ah Teesu ih neng damdi weewe thok ih thukrum taha.
Saasiit Pitar nyia Joon rangsoom saapoot chang kano rangnithung lih saasong saapootjom di rangsoomnok ni wang nyuuta.
Paakaalu jaase, ih men rumta adi, heh roi roitang ih ekoong ang arah wasiit katongta. Saarookwet, erah paakaalu adi ekoong ah piikaat leh Rangteenok nah wangte loong jiin nawa ngun thaang suh katongthiin kaat rumta.
Erah mih ah ih Joon nyia Pitar khoom ah japtup ano tiim ah tiim koh weehe tih ngeh ih suh nyuuta.
Nengnyi ih ekoong ah taangko soknyu ano, Pitar ih liita, “Sek taangko sok thaak ho!”
Eno, ekoong ah ih tiim bah uh kot ih nyu hang ngeh ih laalom ano leksokta.
Enoothong Pitar ih liita, “Nga jiinni ngun bah tajeeka, enoothong nga jiinni tiim jeela erah koha: Najaret dowa Jisu Kristo mendoh toonchap uh!”
Eno Pitar ih jaawah ko lak ih joh ano toonchap thukta. Erah damdam heh lah ah rongtangtang ih nak ano;
toonpitta, heh lalah ni toonchap ano lengkhoomta. Erah lih adi toonpit ano, Rangte rang ah phoong ano Pitar nyia Joon damdi Rangteenok ni roongwangta.
Miloong ah ih ekoong angta ah ih Rangte rangphoong rangsoom ih lengkhoom arah japtup rumta,
eno neng ih arah mih abah Paakaalu Ese ni tongte kunma ah ngeh ih jatjoh rum ano, neng uh rapne ih paatja rumta.
Kunma ah Pitar nyia Joon ih Solomon nok ngeh ih men rumta di, siit nyu arah tuprum ano miloong ah neng reeni soonwang rum taha.
Miloong ah tup ano, Pitar ih li rumta, “Ijirel ni, songtongte joon awaan loong, arah suh tiimnge paatja lan, tiim esuh sok hali? Arah mih ah Rangte likhiik hoon eno seng chaan nawa ih khoom thukli nih mokthun han?
Sengte sengwah Abraham, Isak, nyia Jaakob Rangte ih heh Laksuh Jisu suh rangka thuk suh chaan koha. Enoothong sen loong ah ih ngoong awang loong suh jokoh anno Pilat ngathong ni dut haattan, lang abah Pilat ih edaap etheng taat liita.
Heh toongtang nyia ese angta, enoothong sen loong ih dut haat ih tan, eno Pilat suh mih tek haatte li thuk tan.
Roidong lamsiitte ah sen ih tek haat tan, enoothong Rangte ih sen miksok di tek nawa ngaaksaat ih thukta—eno erah haaki kotte ah seng loong ah.
Jisu mendi chaan aphaan je tungkangdi ekoong ah jen khoom thukta. Sen ih tiim tup han nyia jat han ah langla heh mendi tuumaang thoidi deesiitta ah tup han: Jisu hanpi thoidi deela ah sen ih amadoh jensok ih an.
“Amadi ngah ih jat ehang, ngaaphoh ngaano loong, sen mihak phokhoh loong ih Jisu ah lajat thoidi siiwi tan.
Teewadi Rangte ih khowah suh banbaat thukta Kristo ah cham ih ah ngeh ah, erah likhiik amiimi ih angla.
Erah raangtaan ih, sekthun ih an, eno Rangte reenah thok han, sen rangdah ah biin anaan ehan. Emah re anbah,
Teesu jiin nawa Esa chaan aphaan kaat suh saapoot thok eha, eno Jisu kaat thuk ha, Kristo ah sen raangtaan ih jen danje eta.
Jirep ah ena ih maanghoon hoon, heh rangmong nah tong ah, erah tiit teewah di Rangte ih toongtang khowah loong suh banbaat ih thukta.
Erah thoidi Moses ih liita, ‘Ngah kaat thuk halang likhiik, sen Teesu Rangte ih khowah kaat thuk ha, eno erah mih ah sen mina dung nawa ang ah. Eno heh ih sen suh tiim baat han erah sen ih kap etheng ang ah.
Erah khowah jeng lah boichaatte ah Rangte mina re nawa maama ih hiik hoom ano thet haat ah.’
Amadi mamah angla, erah loong ah, Samuel nyia heh lih ni kaatte khowah loong ih banbaat choi.
Sen raangtaan suh Rangte ih khowah loong damdi kakhamta, eno sente senwah damdi nuumi jengdang hoonta jun ih pan halan. Rangte ih Abraham suh liita, ‘Arah hah dowa mina loong ah an sutom satoom jun ih pan ang adoleh minchan ang.’
Erah raangtaan ih Rangte ih Heh Laksuh ah danje ano seng reeni phangkaat thuk taha, seng loong lamthih nawa pui thuk suh ah.”
Romwah loong nyia rangsoomnok sokboite dowa mihak phokhoh, erah damdi mararah Sadusi mina thok rum ha di Pitar nyia Joon miloong ah damdi roongwaan roh ih nyuuta.
Heliphante wanyi ah ih miloong asuh Jisu tek nawa ngaaksaat tiit ah nyootsoot nyu kano neng loong ah rapne ih chiiru rumta.
Erah thoidi Pitar nyia Joon phaatak ni joh sakwan rumta, eno rangja ang thoidi wanyi ah erah saalih adi daap haat rumta.
Enoothong Jisu ngaaksaat tiit japchaatte loong ah ih hanpi ih rumta, miwah loong ah rooproop ih haajaat bangnga ang rumta.
Erah saalih adi Jehudi nok hah dowa mihak phokhoh loong nyia hootthe nyootsootte loong ah Jerusalem ni lomkhoon rumta.
Neng loong ah Romwah phokhothoon Annas damdi nyia heh jaatang Kaaiphaas, Joon, Alekjendar loong damdi chomui rumta.
Neng loong ah ih Heliphante anyi neng ngathong ni chap thuk rum ano cheng rumta, “Set mamah ih re lan sih? Tiim chaan kap han sih adoleh o men kap han sih?”
Pitar sak ni, Esa Chiiala pah ano ngaakbaat rumta, “Mihak phokhoh loong;
chiinnyah sek suh ekoong ah mamah ih deeta ngeh ih cheng hali tih bah,
sen ih jat ejih ang tan, seng ngathong ni chapla ekoong ah langla, sen ih tek haat anno we ngaaksaatta Najaret dowa Jisu Kristo mendi deeta.
Jisu Kristo ah langla Rangteele ni maangdi dook ban baatta, ‘Nok hoonte ih jong taaseeka ngeh ih daanta erah thoontang nang ih eseethoon ih hoonla.’
Khopiiroidong ah Jisu luulu jiin nawa ba choh ih; arah hah adi seng jen puipang suh o suh uh Rangte ih chaan kotmuh”
Pitar nyia Joon lacho laphaan ih ang kano Ngoong awang loong ah paatja ih rumta, neng ih jat eta wanyi ah le wette tah angka ngeh ih ah. Neng ih erah uh jat eta wanyi ah Jisu damdi ang dowa ngeh ah.
Ekoong deeta ah nengnyi damdi tup rum ano, tiim uh tami jeng rumta.
Erah thoidi Ngoongthum theng nokkhok dowa doksoon thuk rum ano, neng jaachi di roongwaan rumta.
“Arah mih anyi mamah ih ih?” “Jerusalem dowa miloong ah ih jat eha, arah mih anyi ih mih paatjaajih noisok ha ngeh ah, eno seng ih tami daanke.
Enoothong arah tiit ah Jisu mendoh nak toom kah tumbaat nyu asuh choophaan etheng.”
Erah thoidi wanyi ah ngaakpoon rum ano baat rumta, mamah ang ah bah uh set ih Jisu mendoh o suh uh labaat theng adoleh lanyootsoot theng.
Enoothong Pitar nyia Joon ih amah ih ngaakbaat rumta, “Sen teeteewah ih thaak thun thaak an Rangte mik sokdoh marah pun ah—sen jeng chaat theng tam Rangte jeng chaat theng ah.
Seng mik ih tup hi nyia seng na ih chaat hi ah labaat bah seng bah tami tongke.”
Nengnyi jeng ah chaat rum ano, Ngoongthumte loong ah ih ehanhan ih choophaan rum ano daap haat nyuuta. Wanyi asuh tiim uh tami li rumta ekoong ah de kano miloong ah ih Rangte rangphoong rum kano ah.
Ekoong ang arah deeta mih ah paang rookbaji nang ih ehan angta.
Pitar nyia Joon daap haat damdam ih nengnyi joon loong ah taang ni ngaak wang nyuuta, eno Romwah phokhoh nyia mihak phokhoh loong ih liita jengkhaap ah baat nyuuta.
Erah chaat rum ano, Kristaan loong eroom ih lomtong rum ano neng Rangte rangsoom rumta: “O Elongthoon Teesu, an juuba rangmong nyia juukhu hakong dongsiitte, juusih nyia hemong ni tongla loong Dongsiitte, Changte wah!
Sengte sengwah an laksuh Dewid suh Esa Chiiala nawa ih jeng thuk kuno jengta, ‘Ranglajatte loong ah tiimnge ih khah rumla; miloong ah ih lalangka ah tiim kaankoong rumta?
Arah hah dowa Luuwang loong ah ih neng teeteewah ih khookhamta, nokpan tangpante loong ah eroom ih lomkhoon rumta Teesu Kristo miksuk kaanju suh ah.’
Hirod nyia Poontias, Pilat loong ah arah samnuthung dowa Ranglajatte loong nyia Ijirel noksong damdi an Laksuh Jisu tiit jen roongwaan ih rumla.
Anchaan anphaan nawa ih mamah angtheng ngeh ih thiin tu ah erah angthuk suh chothum rumla.
Teesu, amadoh, seng choophaan hali ah sokkaat weeho, eno lacho laphaan ih baattaan suh chaan aphaan kokaat he.
Khoisatte deesiit theng chaan aphaan raangtaan ih an lak janghaat kaat ho, toongtang Jisu mendoh paatjaajih loong jen noisok theng ah.”
Neng rangsoom lilih, erah khoontong rumta di hah ah moh eta. Neng loong sak ni Esa moong achaang ah ra haano Rangte jengkhaap ah lacho laphaan ih baat rumta.
Jisu liphante loong ah tenthun siit ang rumta. Neng huikhaak ang ah bah uh arah nga lakbui angta ngeh ih tali rumta.
Rangte chaan aphaan ah kap rum ano Heliphante loong ah ih Jisu ngaaksaat tiit ah lacho laphaan ih baat rumta, erah thoidi Rangte ih neng loong asuh romseetam koh rumta.
Neng dung dowa o uh bootbe thoomramte tajeeta. O jiinni phek nyia nok jeeta, neng loong ah ih erah sangleh,
ngun ah heliphante loong suh koh rumta; enooleh o ih tiimthan thaangta erah than ru ih pheekoh rumta.
Erah likhiik ih kotte wasiit, Josep ngeh ih angta, heh Kaipras ni tup arah Lewi nok hah angta, eno heliphante loong ah ih heh men ah Barnabas ngeh ih poon rumta (Erah men ah langla “Mih suh chaan kotte),
eno heh phek ah sang ano, ngun ah heliphante danjeeta loong asuh kota.
Enoothong Ananias ngeh ih mih wasiit angta, nengnyi heh minuh Sapphira ih nyamka jaasiit sang nyuuta.
Eno nengnyi heh minuh roongwaan nyu ano ngun khooko ah tangthiin nyu ano heliphante loong asuh koh nyuuta.
Pitar ih Annania suh liita, “Esa Chiiala ngathong ni Soitaan ih tiim esuh tiit hu baat thuk halu ngun rukho ah tangthiin ansih no ah?
Maangsang di, nyaamka ah an lakbui angta; esang lih di ngun ah an lakbui angta. Eno, erah likhiik an tiimnge ih reelu? An ih mina tamokwaan hu—Rangte mokwaan hu!”
Chaat damdam ih, Annania ah loongtiita; erah Ruurang chaatte loong ah rapne ih choota.
Jaaro loong ah wangrum ano, heh mang ah thooploop rumta, eno bengkaat rumta.
Koonta jom lidi, heh minuh ah tiim uh lajat thang ih nop wangta.
Pitar ih erah nuh asuh we banchengta, “Baat thaak hang, set soomiwah ih hah sang tansih thaang ah erah than ju nih angta?” “Em,” “thoontang erah thanju angta” Erah nuh rah ih ngaak baatta.
Erah thoidi Pitar ih erah nuh asuh liita, “Set soomiwah ih Teesu Chiiala ah tiim esuh thaak taari hansih? An miwah mang bengkaatte loong ah kaalu thong ni chapla, neng ih an uh dokpi ih kaat ho!”
Lakdamdam di Sapphira ah Pitar lak khoni loongtiita. Jaaro loong ah nopwang rum adi, heh mang ah japtup rum ano heh miwah reeni bengkaat suh dokpi kaat rumta.
Arah Ruurang chaatte nyia Kristaan loong ah rapne ih cho rumta.
Kaamwah loong ah mih dung ni paatjaajih loong ah rapne ih mokah rumta. Kristaan loong Solomon nokka ngeh men rumta adi khoontong rumta.
Neng damdi wahote o uh tanaan roongtong rumta, erabah uh miloong ah ih neng tiit rapne ih seebaat rumta.
Enoothong minuh miwah, ehanhan ih jaat rum ano Teesu rangsoomte ih hoon rumta.
Kaamwah loong ah ih paatjaajih loong noisok rum kano, khoisatte loong ah lam ni piikaat rumta, rukho ah juptheng ni rukho ah dam ni jupthiin wan rumta, erah langla lam nah Pitar daankhoom adoh heh laaphaang ih toom wiithuk ah ngeh ih thiinwan rumta.
Jerusalem ko nawa miloong ah ih, khoisatte loong nyia chiithih laakhah ih paklakta loong ah deesiit suh siitwan rum taha.
Enoothong Romwah phokhothoon nyia heh joon loong, neng damdi Sadusi nok hah roop rum ano kaamwah loong ah rapne ih miksuk rumta.
Eno kaamwah loong ah phaatak ni josak rumta.
Erah rangphe adi Teesu rangsah ih paakaalu ah daap kah ano kaamwah loong ah dokkhoom kaat thuk rum ano phanbaat rumta,
“Rangteenok nah kah anno miloong asuh roidong tiit ah baatkaat an”
Heh jeng ah kap rum ano kaamwah loong ah ih rangkhano di Rangteenok ni phang nyootsoot karumta. Romwah Phokhothoon nyia heh joon loong ah ih Jehudi nok hah dowa mihak phokhoh loong ah Nokwah ngoongthum theng ni thumpoon rumta; eno kaamwah loong ah phaatak nawa poonwang thuk rumta.
Enoothong neng toonsiitte loong ah taatkah rum ano, kaamwah loong ah phaatak ni amuh ang rumta, erah thoidi Nokwah ngoongthum theng ni ngaak baatkaat rumta.
“Phaataak ni thok eno, kaasak ah rapniine ih sak arah angta, bante loong ah uh paakaalu ni chap rumta; eno kaalu ah daapsok eno nokmong ni o uh tajeeta!”
Erah ruurang ah chaat rum ano Romwah phokhoh nyia rangsoomnok dowa saahaap loong ah kaamwah loong ah tiim angla ngeh ih paatja rumta.
Erah di mih wasiit wang ano baat rumta, “Boichaat thaak an! Phaataak ni sak tan loong ah ih bah Rangteenok ni nyootsoot rumha!”
Erah raangtaan ih saahaap wasiit ih heh mina loong ah siit ano kaamwah loong ah ngaak toonsiit kata. Mih ih jong ih pat ra cho ih, kaamwah loong ah labuthom thang ih siitwan rumta.
Kaamwah loong ah Nokwah reeni siitwan rum ano, neng ngathong ni toonchap thuk rumta, eno Romwah Phokhoh ih cheng rumta.
“Sen suh heh mendoh nakkah nyootsoot an ngeh ih baat choi,” eno we dopjengta; “sokthaaak an sen loong ah ih tiimjih hoon han! Sen ih nyootsoot han ah Jerusalem hah noongrep ni puupa thuk lan, eno Jisu tek haat ah seng mat ih joot thuk suh liihan!”
Pitar nyia heh kaamwah loong ah ih ngaakli rumta, “Seng ih Rangte jengkhaap kap theng, mina jengkhaap tah angka.
Jisu bangphak khoni tekrapbot tan lini, sengte sengwah Rangte ih tek nawa ngaakthing ih thukta.
Rangte ih ngaak saatsiit ano Lamsiitte nyia mina Pangte toom ang ah ngeh ih jaawah ko ih tong thukla, eno Jerusalem mina loong suh neng rangdah sekthun thuksuh nyia biin anaan chosuh saapootse koh rumha.
Esa Chiiala nyia seng loong ah arah tiit haaki kotte—Esa Chiiala ah heh jeng boichaatte loong raangtaan ih Rangte lakkot.”
Ngoongthumte loong ah erah jeng ah chaat rum ano rapne ih khadah rumta, kaamwah loong ah tek haat etheng ngeh ih li rumta.
Enoothong neng dung ni, Pharisi nok hah Gamaliel ngeh ih wasiit angta, erah wah ah Hootthe nyootsootte, nyia warep ih phoongpha arah mih angta, eno Nokwah dung dowa heh toonchapta. Heh ih baat rumta, kaamwah loong ah pootsiit than doksiit kaat thaak an,
erah lih adi Nokwah suh li rumta, “Ijirel phoh ano loong, arah miloong ah damdoh sokthun samthun ih re theng.
Taat samthun thaak an ehakdi Theudas ah ngah thoonrak lang liite dongta eno chaabaji mih heliphante uh wakdong eta. Eno heh teewah ah tek haat kano, heliphante loong ah saapsoon e rumta, heh ruurang ah uh tikmat eta.
Erah lih adi, mih khoh rookwet tokdi, Galili nok hah Judas dongkhoom taha, heh mih hantek siitta, erah uh tek haat eta eno heliphante loong uh saapsoon e rumta.
Erah likhiik doh, ngah ih baat rumhala, arah miloong asuh tiim uh lali theng. Neng tongtong toom ih rum ah! Tiim re rumla, tiim thun rum ha mina mongtham ang ah bah hetik matmat ih ah,
enoothong Rangte mongtham ang abah sen ih tiim uh tajen ekan, senteewah Rangte damdoh rookmui anrah ba tup an!” Gamaliel ih renbaat rumta jengkhaap ah Nokwah ih kap erumta.
Kaamwah loong ah noppoon wanrum ano, ruh ih buh rumta, arah dowa ih Jisu mendoh mabah uh nakkah baattaan an ngeh ih baat rum ano daap haat rumta.
Kaamwah loong ah Ngoongthum theng nawa tenroon woksoon ih doksoon karumta, tiimnge liidi, Jisu thoilam doh neng loong ah ih cham anaang ah jen naan ih rum ah ngeh ih Rangte ih danje arah ang rumta.
Eno Rangteenok ni nyia nok rookweh ni neng loong ah ih Ruurang Ese tiit nyia Jisu Kristo tiit ah nyootsoot roh ih rumta.
Erah lih ang ano, heliphante loong ah jaatjaang ih wang rumta, Grik jengjengte Jehudi loong nyia hanok dowa Jehudi loong ah nengneng laktung ni changrook waangti ang rumta. Grik jengjengte Jehudi loong ih liita jootiinuh adoleh thaknuh loong ah ih saarep chotheng phaksat ah rapniine ih tachoh rumka.
Erah thoidi asih wanyi kaamwah loong ah ih hanpiite loong ah lompoon rum ano baat rumta, “Ngun thiin raangtaan ih Rangte jengkhaap nyootsoot ah seng loong ah tami phaangdat ke.
Phoh ano loong, erah raangtaan ih, seng loongdung dowa o sak ni Esa Chiiala adoleh mongtham ese jeela erah likhiik mih ah ngun thiinte danje theng.
Eno juuba Rangte tiit ah rangsoom rangphoong ih jen nyootsoot ih.”
Heliphante loong ih renbaat rumta mongtham ah kap ih rum ano, mina loong ah ih, kamkam tuumaangte nyia moongte chaangte Stephen, Philip, Prokoras, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, nyia Entiok nawa Nikolas maangdi Jehudi angta loong ah danje rumta.
Arah miloong asuh heliphante loong ah ih neng khoh nah taajoh rum ano rang toom soomkoh rum ah ngeh ih neng reeni wangthuk rumta.
Erah thoidi Rangte jengkhaap ah noongrep ni ruurang roh eta. Heliphante loong ah Jerusalem ni weewe jaatjaat eta, erah damdi romwah hantek ih Jisu laalom tiit ah hanpi rumta.
Stephen suh Rangte ih chaan aphaan ah koh ano, miloong dung dowa mih paatjaajih loong ah noisok ih thukta.
Enoothong Jehudi rangsoomnok nawa Dalang saachoi (ngeh ih men rumta), mararah mina loong ah Stephen damdi daanmui e rumta, erah di Kiren nyia Alekjendria nawa Jehudi nok hah nep angta. Silisia nyia Esia hah nawa Jehudi loong ah nep ih Stephen damdi jengmui rumta.
Enoothong moong achaang ih Stephen suh erah likhiik chaan kota, heh jeng kano o uh tami daanjeng rumta.
Erah raangtaan ih mararah mih asuh tiit hu baatthuk rumta, “Seng ih bah Moses nyia Rangte kaanju arah chaat hi!”
Emah ih diip mokwaan rum ano, noksong nyia mihak phokhoh loong, hootthe nyootsootte loong ah khat thuk rumta. Neng loong ah ih Stephen ah jorum ano Ngoongthum theng ni siitwan rumta.
Eno mih wajombaji ih tiit hu baat thuk suh ngeh ih waksiit rumta. “Arah mih,” ah ih “saarookwet seng Rangteenok nyia Moses Hootthe tiit ah pak thetbaat ha.
Seng ih emah jeng arah chaat hi, Najaret dowa Jisu ih Rangteenok ah thaak haat ih ah eno Moses jiin nawa neem arang loong ah elek et ah!”
Ngoongthum theng ni tongte loong ah ih Stephen taangko sok rum adi, hethe hekhoh ah rangsah the akhoh likhiik ih japtup rumta.
Romwah phokhothoon ah ih Stephen suh chengta, “Amiisak nih angkah?”
Stephen ih ngaak baatta, “Ngaaphoh ngaawah loong nga jeng ah boichaat an! Sengte sengwah Abraham Haraan hah ni maang song kah kaadi, Mesopotomia hah ni
Rangte dongkhoom kah ano baatta, ‘An hadaang nyia an jaatang ah thiinhaat uno ngah ih marah hah doh kaat baat ha erah doh kah uh.’
Erah raangtaan Abraham ih heh hadaang ah thiinhaat ano Haraan hah ni song kata. Heh wah tek lidi, Rangte ih sen amadi song lan hah adi kaat thuk taha.
Rangte ih Abraham suh arah an hah ngeh ih baatkot muh, amasah chepsiit taan uh kotmuh, enoothong Rangte ih Abraham suh kot eha ngeh ih ba kakhamta adoleh ansuh ansah lakbui ang ah ngeh ih thoomhoon kakhat ah ba hoon eta, erah kakham ah Abraham heh sah maang jeeka tokdi hoonta.
Rangte ih Abraham suh baatta: ‘An sutoom satoom loong ah minok mihah nah song rum ah, erah doh neng loong ah chaabaji paang raangtaan ih dah ih siiwi rum ah.
Enoothong an sutoom satoom loong ih soomtu rum ah mina loong ah ngah ih dande kah rum ang, erah lidoh erah hah dowa doksoon rum ano arah hah adoh ngaak song rum haano nga somtu rum hang.’
Eno Abraham damdi thoomhoon kakhat thiinta ngeh ih jat suh Rangte ih heh khoopkhan banlam ah hoonthuk rumta. Erah thoidi Esak ah tup ano saasinat lidi heh khoopkhan ano men hoonta; Esak ih heh sah Jaakob khoopkhanta, eno Jaakob ih heh sah asih wanyi ah khoopkhan banlam hoonta.
“Jaakob sah loong ih neng no Josep ah miksuh ih rum ano Ijip hah ni dah raangtaan ih sang rumta. Enoothong Rangte ah heh damdam eta,
erah thoidi Josep ah mathan laang chamta bah uh Rangte ih puipang eta. Ijip Luuwang damdi Josep chomuita di, Rangte ih Josep suh mih tenroon thuk theng nyia mongtham ese ah kota, eno erah hadaang adi Luuwang ih Josep ah kobono nyia henok hetap jaatrep sokboite ang thukta.
Erah lidi, Ijip nyia Kanaan hah noongrep ni ram ang ano rapne ih cham rumta. Sengte sengwah loong ih phak asat ju choh jam muh,
eno Jaakob ih Ijip hah ni ji acham eje ngeh ih japchaat ano, sengte sengwah, heh sah loong ah phangkaat thukta.
Dopnyi kah rum adi, Josep ih hephoh loong suh heh teewah tiit ah jatthuk rumta, eno Ijip Luuwang ih uh Josep jaatang tiit ah jat eta.
Josep ih heh wah suh maatbaatta, neng jaatang rooksinet wabangnga ah loongtang Ijip hah nah kaat theng ngeh ah.
Jaakob nyia heh sah loongtang Ijip hah ni song karum ano erah ni matti karumta.
Neng mang ah Sekem hah ni huikaat ano, Abraham ih Haamor jaatang jiin nawa ngun ih reta di bengkaat rumta.
“Rangte ih Abraham damdi thoomhoon kakhatta saapoot ah chang kano, Ijip hah ni seng mina hasong ah jaat eti.
Erah lih adi, Josep men lajatte mih Ijip Luuwang we angta.
Eno Luuwang ah sengte sengwah loong damdi rapne ih thikhah ano, neng sah khobaang loong ah tektoom ih ah ngeh ih li ano, thoikatkat ih neng nok nawa ehoh ni tum thiin thuk rumta.
Erah tokdi, Moses ah jaaseemoong sah ih dongtupta. Moses ah nok ni laajom sokboita,
eno heh nok nawa thiinhaat kaat kano, wangcha nah rah ih heh raangtaan suh hakpanta.
Moses suh Ijip nok hah tiit jirep ah nyootsoot kano jatwah jeewah eh hoonta.
“Moses paang rookbaji ang ano, hejaat hepaat ah mamah ih siiwi rumta erah ah jat suh ngeh ih jam thoithakta.
Heh mina wasiit Ijip mih ih siiwi ah japtup ano, Moses ih erah mih ah etek haat eta. (
Moses ih thunta, heh mina loong ah ih baata jatrum hangnih, ngah Rangte ih neng doksiit suh daapkaat halang ngeh ah, eno heh mina loong ah ih tajat rumta).
Erah saalih adi Ijirel nok hah wanyi botmui arah japtup ano paakpang damdi taat renbaat nyuuta. ‘Boichaat thaak ansih,’ jaaroh nyi, ‘set Ijirel mina tanih ang kansih; tiimte botmui lansih?’
Eno o ih wasiit ah siiwiita erah mih ah ih Moses ah haangko pitthengta. ‘Sek laktung nah an ih dande theng ngeh ih o ih poon halu?’
‘Miinnyah Ijip nok hah tekbuh tang ah likhiik tekbuh ang ngeh ih nih li halang?’
Moses ih erah jeng ah japchaat ano, Ijip hah nawa Midian hah ni soonkah ano moong songtong kata. Erah ni heh sah miwasah wanyi tupta.
“Paang rookbaji lini, Moses ngathong ni Rangte kaamwah ah Sinai Kong ni phisaang hah ni weelu damdi dongjengta.
Erah japtup ano, Moses ah rapne ih paatjaata, eno rapniine ih sok suh weeluuta adi tiitkhoom kata. Eno Teesu jengta ah japchaatta;
‘Ngah ante anwah Rangte, Abraham Rangte, Esak nyia Jaakob Rangte.’ Moses ih lanaan sok thang ih mochoota.
Teesu ih Moses suh liita, ‘An lasong ah khook haat uh an chaplu ah Esa hah.
Ijip ni nga mina loong rapne ih cham arah japtup hang. Nenghu nengri chaat hang, Ngah neng doksiit puipang suh ra halang. Amadoh raaho; Ngah ih an Ijip hah nah kaat thuk ha.’
“Moses ah Ijirel mina ih thaangju et arah mina angta. ‘Seng pante nyia maat hoonte angtheng ngeh ih o ih thiik halu?’ Miloong ah ih emah kali rumta. Enoothong weeluuta adi Rangte dongjengta, Moses ah noksong pante nyia doksiitte, heh damdoh rangsah roong mokah ah ngeh ah.
Moses ih, Ijip hah ni nyia Juusisaang (Juusih esiit je ah, erah amadi uh erah suh juusih essang ngeh ih menha) adi nyia phisaang hah ni mih paatjaajih loong ah noisok ano heh mina loong ah Ijip hah nawa doksiit dowa.
Moses ih Ijirel noksong suh baatta, ‘Rangte ih, ngah kaat thuk halang ah likhiik khowah kaat thuk ha, eno erah mina ah sen mina dowa ang ah.’
Moses ah Ijirel mina loong damdi phisaang hah ni tum roongtong rumta; sente senwah loong nyia rangsah damdi Sinai Kong ni kah chowaanta, enooleh Rangte khothing jengkhaap ah seng suh toombaat tahe.
“Enoothong sengte sengwah loong ah ih Moses jeng ah taboichaat rumta; heh jeng lalek boichaat thang ih Ijip hah ko we ngaakwang thung ang rumta.
Erah thoidi neng ih Aroon suh li rumta, ‘Seng lamsiitte Rangte hoon kohe. Ijip hah nawa seng doksiitte, Moses bah tajatke tiim ang koja.’
Erah lilih, maan laaphaang tongmih hoon rum ano, roomsoom rumta, erah lih adi neng ih hoonta tongmih phoongpha mendi phaksat ah room phaksah ih rumta.
Erah thoidi neng Rangte ah neng dam dowa doksoon ano rang dowa ritsih nyia rang ni tiimjih jeela erah loong ah soomtu thuk rumta, erah tiit ah khowah loong leedap ni raangthiin choi: ‘Ijirel noksong loong! Phisaang hah ni paang rookbaji angtan adoh luiamaan ah nga soomtu suh tadook tan.
Erah tumhui tan abah, Molek Rangte raangtaan ih angta; adoleh ritsih rangte, Rephan laaphaang raangtaan ih; erah loong abah sen ih soomtu theng tongmih angta. Erah raangtaan ih sen loong ah Bebiloon jiit nah phanhaat kaat rumha.’
“Sengte sengwah loong ih bah phisaang hah ni Rangte waktong theng Nyutaap ah neng damdam ih tumhui rumta. Erah mamah ih hoon theng ah, Rangte ih Moses suh noisokta ah likhiik ih hoon rumta.
Lini, sengte sengwah loong ih neng wah jiin nawa thaangta Nyutaap ah Josua damdi wakkah rumta di neng damdam ih tumhui rumta. Eno Rangte ih mathan deek akaan angta loong ah nengngah nengngah ih tum phanjoh haatta. Erah Nyutaap ah Dewid, Luuwang maang langlang ih erah hadaang adi thok tongta.
Rangte ih Dewid suh ese choh kano Dewid ih Jaakob Rangte nok hoon thuk weehang ngeh ih suta.
Enoothong erah rangsoomnok ah Solomon Luuwang ih liwang ni thoon tom hoonta.
“Enoothong Echoong thoon ni tongte Rangte ah mina ih hoon hi nok ni tatongta; khowah ih liiha likhiik ah,
‘Rangmong ah nga tongtheng, nyia hah ah nga lah naktheng, Teesu ih liiha, Nga raangtaan ih sen ih tiim nok ma hoon an? Nga tongtheng nok ah mani ah?
Arah loong ah nga lak ih tanih hoontang?’
“Senten senmong ah jong ajaan likhiik mamah angtan!” Stephen ih arah tiit ah jangbaat roh ih kaatta. “Sen thung ah mamah sengseng angtan, Rangte tiitkhaap chaat suh sen na ah mamah sengseng ih baang tan! Seng loong ah sente senwah likhiik; sen ih uh Esa Chiiala ah saarookwet takap kan!
Sente senwah ih khowah lasiiwiite eje nih ah? Teewadi Laksuh kateng ah erak eha ngeh ih Rangte tiit baat kaatte ah uh neng ih tek haatta. Eno sen ih erah mih ah mokwaan anno tek haat han.
Rangte hootthe ah rangsah jiin nawa choh thaangte sen loong ah —erabah uh heh jeng ah taboichaat kan!”
Ngoongthumte loong ah Stephen jeng ah chaat rum ano, neng pha ah phak ah ih khadah rumta.
Stephen ah Esa Chiiala pan angte angta, rangko toon sokwan adi Rangte chaan aphaan nyia Jisu jaawah ko ih chap arah tupwanta.
“Sok thaak an!” Stephen ih baat rumta. “Rangmong ah daapchoi tupwan lang, erah di Mina Sah Rangte damdi jaawah ko chap arah tupwan lang!”
Ngoongthumte loong ah riiraak rum ano neng na ah neng lak ih kepjoh rumta. Miloong ah Stephen taangko ih tuutmui karum ano,
erah samnuthung dowa dokphan haatkaat rumta, eno Jong ih patkaat rumta. Erah tupte haaki loong ah ih neng nyuh nengkhat ah jaaro wasiit Sool ngeh ih angta, reeni thiinhaat rumta.
Jong ih patrum ah damdi Stephen ih Teesu men ah poon ano rangsoomta, “Teesu ngaachi ngaala ah thaang hang!”
Stephen ah heh lakuh ni chooktong ano eroongwah ih riihuuta, “Teesu! Neng rangdah ah nak samthun weeuh!” Emah ih jeng ano thaktiita.
Stephen tek haat thukte ah Sool angta. Erah sa adi Jerusalem hah ni kristaan loong ah rapne ih siiwi rumta. Samaria nyia Judia hah noongrep ni Kristaan loong ah tiisoon rumta, Heliphante loong ah ba soon muh.
Rangte jatte mina loong ah ih Stephen mang ah rongrongwah ih hu ari damdi bengkaat rumta.
Sool ih chaas jeeje ah thet haat taat chungta; nokrookwet ni tumkhoom ano, minuh miwah Jisu suh hanpiite loong ah thoontang dok hoom kaat ano phaatak ni sakkaat rumta.
Noongrep ni tiisoonta hanpiite loong ah ih Rangte tiit ah tumbaat rumta.
Samaria hah ko samnuthung longthoon ni tongte miloong asuh Philip ih Kristo tiit ah baat kaatta.
Philip ih baat rumta tiitkhaap ah mih lomkhoonta loong ah ih rapniine ih thaangchaat rumta, heh jeng boichaat rum adi Philip ih paatjaajih loong ah reeraang nyia noisok rumta.
Chiithih laakhah ah mina loong sak nawa riihu leh doksoon eta, erah damdi huimu nyia ekoong loong ah de ih rumta.
Erah thoidi erah hadaang adi rapne tenroon woksoon ih tong rumta.
Erah samnuh hah adi Simoon ngeh ih mih wasiit angta, heh ih Samaria dowa mina loong asuh pootsiit maantaan kanoisok rumta. Heh ih liita ngah mina elong esiit,
eno erah samnuthung dowa, kurep wangrep ih, heh jeng ah naaririh ih boichaat rumta. Miloong ah ih liita, heh jiinni juuba “Rangte chaan aphaan “Eloongthoon Chaan aphaan” ah jeela.
Miloong asuh maantaan ah rekamdook ih noisok rum kano heh jeng boichaatte totoh ang rumta.
Enoothong Philip ih Rangmong Hasong nyia Jisu Kristo ruurang ese tiit ah baat rum kano, hanpi ih rumta, eno minuh miwah loong ah juutem rumta.
Simon ih nep hanpiita; eno heh uh juutemta, erah lih adi Philip damdam tong ano paatjaajih ah noisok kano Simon ah rapne ih paatjaata.
Kamwah loong ah Jerusalem ni angrum adi Samaria nok hah ih Rangte jengkhaap kap eha ngeh ih japchaat rum ano, neng reeni Pitar nyia Joon kaat thuk rumta.
Erah ni thoknyu ano, Kristaan loong sak nah Esa Chiiala toom pah ah ngeh ih rang ah soomkoh ih nyuuta.
Esa Chiiala ah o sak ni uh maangpat angra taha; Teesu mendi juutem luulu phang kap rumta.
Pitar nyia Joon ih neng khoh ni nengnyi lak ih tajoh nyu ano rangsoom kot kano ba Esa Chiiala ah pah ra taha.
Kamwah loong ah ih Kristaan loong khoni joh ano rangsoom kot kano Chiiala pah arah Simon ih japtupta. Erah thoidi Simon ih Pitar nyia Joon suh ngun ah konyu ano
baat nyuuta, “Arah chaan ah ngasuh nep koh weehe tih, mikhoh nah taajoh angdoh Esa Chiiala toom pah raaha suh ah.”
Eno Pitar ih ngaak liita, “Rangte lakkot ah ngun ih reh ang ngeh ih thun hu bah, an ngun ah hui uno soolam nah toom wang uh!
Rangte mootkaat nah seng damdoh an tami room ru, timnge liidoh Rangte miksok di an tenthun ah kaateng tah angko.
Erah raangtaan, an ih sekthun ih uh, an tenthun mongtham ethih thunhu, eno erah likhiik ethih thunhu ah biin anaan toom eh ho asuh Teesu rangsoom uh.
An thidokdok mih siikhaamte nyia rangdah khui ni ang uh rah tup hala.”
Simon ih Pitar nyia Joon suh li nyuuta, set ih Teesu suh rangsoom koh weehe tih, erah li hansih ah likhiik nga taangnah nak toom thok weethuk ha.”
Nengnyi khiikkhi nyia Teesu jengkhaap ah baat nyu ano, Jerusalem ni ngaakwang nyuuta. Samaria ni hadaang hantek ni Ruurang Ese tiit ah lam jangtang ih baatwan nyuuta.
Teesu rangsah ih Philip suh liita, “Jerusalem dowa ih Gaja ko kala lam adoh juumeh ko ih kaat suh khookhaam uh” (Arah lam adi mih amadi tah khoomka.)
Erah baat kano, Philip ah khookhaam ano dokkhom kata. Eno Ethopia wangcha nuh ngun thiinte, daamhun wasiit, heh nok ni ngaakwangte chomuita. Erah warah Jerusalem ni Rangte rangsoom kah ano mokkaari ni nok ni ngaak wangte angta. Heh lamni soon adi, Isaia khowah ih raang arah leedap weta.
<range>
Esa Chiiala ih Philip suh baatta, “Mokkaari ko kah uno heh re tiittiit ih chap kah uh.”
Philip soon kata adi khowah Isaia leedap banweh arah japchaat kata. Eno Philip ih chengta, “An ih wehu adi tiimjih liiha jat nih hu?”
Saahaap ah ih ngaakbaatta, “O ih uh lahuk sekbaat rangbah mamah ma jat ang?” Eno Philip ah mokkaari adi heh damdi roongtong suh duupoonta.
Rangteele erah weta adi amah raangta: Saap ah dook esuh siitkaat ah likhiik, saapsah heh roon sui adi lahu lari thang kah ang ah likhiik, heh khaapsiit taan uh jengmuh.
Heh kaanju ih rumta, tiim lathika di thetbaat rumta. Heh sutoom satoom loong tiit ah o ih uh tajen baatka, timnge liidi arah hah adi heh roidong ah thoon ih kata.”
Saahaap ah ih Philip suh chengta, “Baat thaak hang, khowah ih liiha ah o suh liiha? Heh teewah tiit tam wahoh tiit baat ha?”
Eno Philip ih phangbaatta; Rangteele erah dowa phangbaat ano, Jisu Ruurang Ese tiit ah baatta.
Philip nyia saahaap ah lamdat ko ih daatsoon kanyu adi, joisah esiit japtup nyuuta, eno saahaap ah ih liita, “Arah di ju cheesah je ah. Ngah laang ah juutem suh tanih nook kang?”
Philip ih liita, “An ten nawa ih jen hanpi ubah juutem ah ejen tem ih uh.” “Hanpi ih hang,” heh ih ngaak baatta; “Nga ih Jisu Kristo ah Rangte Sah ngeh ih hanpi ehang.”
Saahaap ah ih mokkaari ah tangchap thukta, eno nengnyi Philip ju ko ih daatkhoom kanyu ano, Philip ih heh ju ah temta.
Ju nawa dokkhoom nyuuha di, Teesu Chiiala ih Philip ah soonsiitta. Saahaap ah ih Philip ah takah chotupta, eno tenroon woksoon heh lamko ih wangta.
Philip heh teewah Ajotaas ni ang arah japtupta; eno Ruurang Ese tiit ah hadaang rep ni lam jangtang ih Kaisiria maang thokthok ih baat wanta.
Erah tokdi Sool ih Teesu liphante loong ah tek haat etheng ngeh ih tum choophaan rumta. Romwah phokhothoon taang ni heh wang
ano Damaskas dowa Jehudi rangsoomnok ni tongte damdoh menjat hoonkaat suh le raangkoh hang ngeh ih suh wangta, tiimnge liidi erah nah o bah uh Teesu Lamphante mok japtup abah, minuh miwah joh ano, Jerusalem nah ngaak siitwan suh ngeh ah.
Eno Sool Damaskas hah reeni thokkhoom adi, rang nawa baaphuk ih weephaak ano heh teewah ah kookrak ih kaangtookta.
Sool ah hah ni loongdat adi heh suh li arah japchaatta, “Sool, Sool! An ih ngah tiim esuh siiwi halang?”
Teesu an o ang weelu?” Sool ih ngaak chengta. “Jisu, an ih siiwi halang ah” Mih root ah ngaak jengta.
“Eno saatchap uno samnuthung adoh kah uh, an tiim reetheng ah erah nah baat ho eno an re jaatjaat etheng ang ah.”
Sool damdi roong kaatte miloong ah, khaapsiit taan uh lajeng ih tangchap rumta; mijeng abah chaat ih rumta enoothong neng mik ih tatup rumta.
Sool ah hah nawa saatchap ano heh mik taat kaasokta, eno tiim uh tatupta. Erah thoidi heh lak ni siit rum ano Damaskas ko karumta.
Sool sa jom edook angta di, tiim uh taajok phaksata.
Damaskas hah ni mih wasiit Ananias ngeh ih Kristaan mina angta. Erah mih ah ih motmang ni tupta, Jisu ih poonta, “Ananias!” “Ani, Teesu” Ananias ngaak jengta.
Teesu Jisu ih hesuh baatta, “An Lamjang lamjang ih kah uh, Judas nok ni Tarsas nawa raaha rah heh men ah Sool ngeh ih cheng kah uh. Heh ih amadi rangsoomha,
eno heh motmang ni mih wasiit heh men ah Ananias ah nopwang ano heh mik ah we ngaakka thuk suh heh khoh ni taajoh arah japtup ha.”
Ananias ih ngaakbaatta, “Teesu, arah mih ah tiit ah warep ih chobaat halang an mina loong ah Jerusalem ni mamah ih siiwi rumha erah ah.
Eno Romwah phokhoh loong ah ih Damaskas dowa an rangphoongte loong ah jootkhak thuk suh chaan ah korum ano kaat thuk rumhala.”
Teesu ih Ananias suh baatta, “Kah uh, erah mih ah ngah mootkaatte danje hang, Ranglajatte nyia neng luuwang, adoleh Ijirel dowa miloong asuh nga men jatthukte angthuk ang.
Eno nga raangtaan ih heh mathan cham theng ah erah ah thoontang noisok ang.”
Erah raangtaan ih, Sool tongta nok adi nop kah ano, Ananias ih heh khoh ni taajoh kata. “Ephoh Sool,” Ananias ih liita, “Teesu Jisu—heh teewah ih kaat thuk halang, an ani ra taho di lam ni an suh tup ih thuk taho. Ngah heh ih kaat thuk halang, an ih we tup toom ih uh nyia an sak nah Esa Chiiala toom raaha ngeh ah.”
Erah damdam ih, heh mik nawa nyah khoopchep likhiik datti ano Sool mik ah we ngaakka. Sool saatchap ano juutemta;
eno phaksat ah sah ano, hetah hepah ah we ngaakrongta. Sool Damaskaas hah ni Kristaan loong damdi sa hantek tongthiinta.
Jehudi rangsoomnok ni Sool phangla ih kah ano Jisu juuba Rangte Sah ngeh ih phangbaat kaatta.
Heh jeng japchaatte loong ah paatti rum ano cheng rumta, “Jerusalem ni Jisu rangsoomte loong tek haatte ah tanih angka? Jisu rangsoomte loong ah Romwah phokhoh loong reenah jootkhak wan suh tanih ra hala?”
Enoothong Sool chaan aphaan pan ih tiit baat kano, Damaskas dowa Jehudi loong tiim uh mi ngaakjeng muh, heh ih Jisu juuba Kristo ngeh ih baat rumta.
Sa hantek lidi, Jehudi loong ah khoontong rum ano Sool khumtan suh roongwaan rumta,
enoothong, heh ih neng kaankoong ah japchaat eta. Rangwu rangphe samnuthung paakaalu adi tek haat esuh taat bansok rumta.
Enoothong pheesiit Sool liphante loong ah ih hong ni paakaalu lam ih daatpi kaat rumta.
Sool Jerusalem ni kah ano Jisu liphante loong damdi chomui taat chungta. Enoothong neng ih Jisu liphante ngeh ih tahanpi rumta, neng loong ah echo ih rumta.
Erah di Barnabas ah ra haano kaamwah loong damdi Sool ah chosiitta. Neng loong asuh lam ni Teesu damdi Sool mamah chomuita nyia roongwangta erah tiit ah jangbaat rumta. Damaskas ni Sool lacho laphaan ih Jisu tiit baatta loong ah nep deenbaat rumta.
Eno neng damdi Sool ah tong ano, Jerusalem hadaang noongrep ni tumkhoomta, Jisu mendi lacho laphaan eh tiitbaatta.
Sool Grik jengjengte Jehudi loong damdi nep daanmuita, eno erah loong ah ih Sool tek haat esuh chung rumta.
Kristaan loong ah ih erah japchaat rum ano, Sool ah Kaisiria ko siitkaat rumta, eno heh hadaang Tarsas ni kaat thuk rumta.
Eno, Judia, Galili nyia Samaria chaas loong adi semroongroong tong rumta, Esa Chiiala nawa ih mina loong ah rongtangtang angthuk rumta, eno neng loong ah Teesu ah samthun rum ah ih rangphoong rangsoom ih songtong rumta.
Pitar noongrep ni khoomta, Lidda ni tongte Rangte miloong damdi chomui suh jaasiit dongkata.
Erah hah adi mih wasiit heh men ah Aenias, paang asat heh juptheng ni huimu ih khui arah jinni chomui kata.
“Aenias” Pitar ih poonta, “Jisu ih deesiit ih halu. Saat uh, an dam ah tuithiin uh” erah damdam ih Aenias ah saatta.
Lidda nyia Sharon hah ni tongte loong ah erah tuprum ano, Teesu liphante ih hoon rumta.
Joppa hah ni Tabitha ngeh ih minuh wasiit, Jisu rangsoomte angta. (Grik jenglam ih heh men ah Dorkas angta, erah langla, “Sehui, men angta). Heh roi roitang mootse kaatse kah ano changthih noodek loong ah chosok eta.
Erah tokdi erah nuh ah khoisat ih tiita. Heh mang ah chotchaat rum ano lamtok nokkhok ni thiinwan rumta.
Joppa hah ah Lidda dowa ih haloh tah angta, Joppa hah dowa hanpiite loong ah ih Pitar Lidda ni ngeh ih japchaat rum ano, mih wanyi wangthuk rum ano erah ruurang tiit ah baatwan thuk rumta, “Seng jiinnah kharok ih ra weeho.”
Erah raangtaan ih Pitar ah nengnyi damdi wakkata. Pitar ah thok ano, lamtok nokkhok adi siitwan rumta, Erah di jootiinuh loong ah kookchap ano hu rumta, maangti di waatta samsong nyia nyuh akhat ah bannoi ih rumta.
Pitar ih erah nokkhok dowa loongtang doksoon thuk rumta, eno heh lakuh ni tong ano rangsoomta; mang ko ih lektong ano Pitar ih liita, “Tabitha, saat uh” Eno heh mik ah kaasok eta, Pitar ah japtup ano saat tongta.
Pitar ih heh lak ih joh ano toonchap thukta. Pitar ih Kristaan loong nyia jootiinuh loong ah poon ano Tabitha ah ething ngaak korumta.
Erah ruurang ah Joppa hah noongrep ni japchaat rumta, eno mih hantek ih Teesu tiit ah kap ih rumta.
Pitar ah Joppa hah ni siikhoop pheehoonte Simoon damdi sa hantek waktong thiinta.
Kaisiria ni mih wasiit heh men ah Kornelias ngeh ih angta, heh Room nok hah Sipaahi “Itali Sipaahi” ngeh ih men rumta adi sipaahi Saahaap angta.
Kornelias ah tongtang mina angta, erah damdi neng jaatang Rangte ra choote ang rumta. Jehudi mina changthih noodek loong ah chosok eta eno saarookwet rangsoom rangtu ih tongta.
Jaasiit, saasong saapootjom di, Kornelias ih motmang tupta, Rangte rangsah ah ra haano liita, “Kornelias!”
Heh ih Rangte rangsah ah cho damdi ramram ih sok ano chengta, “Erah tiimjih ah, chuupha?” Rangsah ih ngaak baatta, “Rangte ih an rangsoom nyia an lakkot suh eroon ela, erah thoidi Rangte in an rangsoom ah chaat eha.
Mih wasiit je ah heh men ah Simon Pitar ngeh ih kali rum ah erah mih ah amadoh wajombaji suh Joppa nawa poonkaat thuk uh.
Siikhoop pheehoonte Simoon ngeh ih mih wasiit je ah erah nok adi heh wenwah, heh nok ah juusih kaang ni.”
Erah lih adi rangsah ah maatsoon eta, eno Kornelias ih heh nok ni mootkaatte dah wanyi nyia toongtang thoon heh sipaahi ah poonta.
Heh ih tiimjih tupta, erah loong ah baat ano Joppa ni kaat thuk jomrumta.
Erah saalih adi, nengjom Joppa ni wangte lam ni khoom jomrum adi, Pitar ah rangnithung di rangsoom suh nokkhoh ni duuwangta.
Heh ram ih ti ano tiim atiim phaksat thung angta; eno changsong tokdi, heh ih motmang tupta.
Heh ih rangmong kaasak daap dat arah japtupta eno dam elongwah likhiik heh kaang rongbajiiji tamhoom choi datti ra taha.
Erah di luiamaan, siiawi jeeje arah, pu ajuk nyia woma woh loong angta.
Pitar ih miroot esiit japchaatta, “Toonchap uh, Pitar; arah loong ah tekbuh phak uh!”
Eno Pitar ih liita, “Teesu ngah ih taphak kang! Ngah ih esot eruh maang taat phakkang.”
Eno miroot ah ih heh suh we ngaak liita, “Rangte ih esa ngeh ih liiha suh esot ngeh ih lali theng.”
Emah mah ih jaajom noisok ano, lakdamdam ih rang ni ngaaktoon wanta.
Erah motmang ah tiimjih noisok halang ngeh ih samthun adi, Kornelias ih kaat thuk jomrumta, loong ah ih Simoon nok ah jatjoh rum ano, paakaalu reeni chap kah jomrumta.
Neng loong ah ih jaamcheng rumta, “Adi wenwah Simoon Pitar ngeh ih eje nih ang weela?”
Pitar ih motmang dowa tiimjih suh liiha ngeh ih samthun roh ih adi, Chiiala rah ih baatta, “Boichaat thaak uh! Mih wajom ih jam halu.
Erah raangtaan ih datkhoom kah uh, neng damdoh chomui suh nak tanyah uh, neng jom ngah ih kaat thuk halang.”
Eno Pitar ah datkhoom kah ano baat kaat rumta, “Sen ih jam han abah ngah hanih. Tiimjam ra tahan?”
“Kornelias saahaap ih kaat thuk hali,” erah jom ah ih ngaakbaat rumta. Kornelias ah Rangte rangsoomte nyia Jehudi mina thoontang ih choomjoha nyia soongraang rumha. Rangsah ih heh nok nah an poonkaat thuk suh baatta, an ih tiimjih baat uh erah japchaat suh ah.”
Pitar ih erah jom nok ni noppoon wanrum ano niikja anah jamthiin theng ngeh ih baat rumta. Erah saalih adi neng damdi wakwangta, eno Joppa dowa Kristaan mararah uh neng damdi wakwang ih rumta.
Eno Pitar ah saasiit adi thok khoomta, erah di Kornelias ih hephoh hewah nyia heh joonte sano loong ah lompoon ano, Pitar ah bansok rumta.
Pitar ah nokmong ni nopwang damdam, Kornelias ah chomuita, heh lakuh ni chooktong ano, heh ngathong ni chuubonta.
Eno Pitar ih chapsiit ano liita, “Toonchap uh,” “Ngah bah hansi mina.”
Nokmong ni nopkhoom damdi, Pitar nyia Kornelias roongwaan nyuuta ah di, miloong ban tongta ah japtup wangta.
