Pitar ih baatta, “An ih jat ehu Jehudi mih heh hootthe jun ih Ranglajatte damdi tachomui thukka. Erabah Rangte ih o uh esot ngeh ih lasamthun theng ngeh ih noisok halang.
Erah thoidi, an ih poon hangno jengdaan laje thang ih wang halang. Enoothong, ngah ih cheng hala, tiim esuh maatpoon halang?”
Kornelias ih baatta, “Sa jom ngani, amah tokdi, saasong saapootjom di nga nok ni rangsoomtang. Dotdi mih wasiit nyuh phaakjaaja ih kap ano nga ngathong ni chap ano
baat tahang: ‘Kornelias! Rangte ih an rangsoom nyia mih moot chosok ho ah chaat eha.
Joppa ni Simon Pitar ngeh ih je ah o subah uh poonkaat thuk uh. Erah ni siikhoop pheehoonte Simoon ngeh ih wasiit je ah eno heh nok ni heh wenwah, heh nok ah juusih kaang ni ngeh ih baat tahang.’
Erah thoidi an kharok ih poonkaat thuk hala, an ese ih wang halu. Rangte ngathong ni, seng loong ah ih adi bansok hi Teesu ih tiimbaat thuk ho erah boichaat suh ah.”
Pitar phang jengta: “Amadi ngah ih samthun hang amiisak Rangte ih loongtang phoosiit ih sok ha.
O mina ih heh rangsoomha nyia kateng ah erah mih ah kap ha, ojaat opaat ang abah uh ah.
Sen loong ah ih jat ih han heh ih Ijirel mina loong asuh Jisu mendi Ruurang Ese baatkaat taha ah, heh Teesu khotok di Teesu.
Joon ih juutem tiit Galili ni phangbaatta lih dowa ih Ijirel hah ni mamah angta erah sen ih jat ehan.
Najaret dowa Jisu ah uh sen ih jat ehan, Rangte ih heh suh Esa Chiiala nyia chaan aphaan mamah ih kota loong ah uh jat ehan. Jisu noongrep ni tumkhoomta adi, Rangte ah heh damdam angta, eno mootse kaatse loong ah reeta nyia Hakhoh luuwang chaan aphaan lakkhui ni chamnaangta loong ah deesiit eta.
Ijirel nyia Jerusalem hah ni heh mamah ih reeraangta erah jatte ah seng loong ah. Erah lih adi mina loong ah ih bangphak khoni tekrapbot rumta.
Ang abah uh Rangte ih sa jom lidi tek nawa ngaaksaat ih thukta, eno mih miksok ni dong taha,
loongtang miksok di lah angka bah uh, Rangte ih o danjeeta erah mina, seng loong likhiik o heh damdi ngaaksaat lidi room phaksatte loong ah ih japtupti.
Eno seng loong asuh ruurang Ese tiit ah baat etheng ngeh ih nyia rangkhothung ni ething, tekmang danjeete eje ngeh ih mina loong asuh baat an ngeh ih jengdang kohali.
Khowah loongtang ih heh tiit ah baatta, neng ih liita o mina ih heh suh tuumaang ih tong ah neng rangdah ah heh men nyia chaan aphaan nawa ih biin anaan choh ah.”
Pitar ih tiitkhaap baatta adi, Esa Chiiala ah boichaatte loong sak ni ra taha.
Ranglajatte sak ni nep Esa Chiiala pakaat kano, Pitar damdi Joppa nawa ra taha Jehudi rangsoomte loong ah paatjaata.
Tiimnge liidi, Ranglajatte loong ah jengkhaap ena ena jeng ano Rangte phoongpha rumta. Pitar ih liita:
“Seng ih chohi ah likhiik arah mina loong ah ih uh Esa Chiiala choh rumha. O ih bah uh neng juutem ah jen daan tam ih ah?”
Erah lih adi Jisu mendi juutem baat rumta. Eno neng dam doh sajombaji than waktong thiin suh Pitar suh baat rumta.
Kamwah nyia Kristaan wahoh loong ah ih Ranglajatte loong ih nep Rangte jengkhaap ah ekap ih rumha ngeh ih Judia hah noongrep ni japchaat rumta.
Pitar Jerusalem ni kata doh, khoopkhan choi Jehudi loong ah ih lenmak adoleh kaanju rum ano, Pitar suh li rumta.
“An Ranglajatte nyia neng khoopkhan muh nok ni phaksat nep room phaksatu, erah di an neng wenwah angtu!”
Erah thoidi Pitar ih mamah angta erah jaakhoh dowa ih dook rapniine ih baattaan rumta:
“Ngah ih Joppa hah ni rangsoomtang adoh, motmang ni tuptang. Rangmong nawa damnuh elongwah likhiik ih datti haano nga reeni thaam ra taha.
Erah dam adi ramram ih jamsok angno jik ehi luiamaan, woma siiawi, pu ajuk nyia woma woh loong japtuptang.
Eno ngasuh baat hang rah miroot japchaat tang, ‘Toonchap uh, Pitar; tekbuh phak uh!’
Eno ngah ih liitang’ Teesu ngah ih taphak kang! Laphaksat jih nyia esot eruh jih nga tui ni ju maang taatthaak mooksuh kang.’
Rang ni jeng arah miroot ah we japchaat tang, ‘Rangte ih Esa ngeh ih liiha suh esot ngeh ih nakli uh.’
Emamah jaajom jeng arah japchaat tang, eno thoontang rang ni ngaaktoon wanta.
Erah pootdi ngah tongtang nok adi Kaisiria nawa nga poonte wajom thokkhoom rum taha.
Chiiala ih ngasuh latanyah thang ih neng damdoh wakwang baat tahang. Nga damdi Joppa nawa wah arok Kaisiria ni wakwang rum taha, eno Kornelias nok ni loongtang wangti.
Kornelias ih rangsah heh nok ni chap arah japtup arah baat tahe, heh suh baatta tih, ‘Joppa ni Simoon Pitar ngeh ih mih wasiit je ah erah o subah uh poonkaat thuk uh.
Sen jaatang puipang tiit ah erah mih ah ih baat han.’
Eno ngah phangjeng angdi, Esa Chiiala ah ehakdi seng sak ni ra taha ah likhiik neng sak ni uh emah para taha.
Eno ngah ih Teesu jeng ah samthun tang: ‘Joon ih ju nawa ih juutemta, enoothong sen loong ah Esa Chiiala nawa ih juutem an.’
Rangte ih heh lakkot ah rangwuuthak ni tupthuk hali, Ranglajatte loong suh koha heh lakkot ah, seng suh uh phang hanpi tokdoh emah ju koh tahe; emah ang abah, Rangte jengdaante ngah o ah!”
Erah chaat rum ano, lakah kaanju mui thang ih Rangte rangphoong rumta, neng ih liita, “Eno Rangte ih Ranglajatte loong suh nep khopiiroidong ah koh ano songtong thuk rumta!”
Stephen tek haatta tak adi siiwi rumta Kristaan loong ah marah marah ah Phonesia, Sipras nyia Entiok ni thoksoon rumta, eno Rangte tiitkhaap ah Jehudi luulu suh baat rumta.
Enoothong Sipras nyia Siren nawa Entiok ni kata Kristaan loong ah ih Teesu Jisu ruurang Ese tiit ah Ranglajatte suh nep baattaan rumta.
Teesu chaan aphaan neng damdi ang kano, mina hantek ih hanpi rumta nyia thok rum taha.
Erah ruurang ah Jerusalem ni japchaat rum ano Entiok ni Barnabaas wangthuk rumta.
Barnabaas ah Jerusalem ni thok ano miloong ah Rangte minchan ni tong rum arah tup ano, rapne ih roonta, neng suh maama ten nawa ih jam anno laalom ih tong ah ngeh ih baat rumta.
Barnabaas ah wase mina angta, Esa Chiiala nyia heh tuumaang jeethoi di, mina hantek Teesu reeni thoksiit rumtaha.
Eno Barnabaas ah Tarsas ni Sool tumjam wangta.
Sool ah chojam ano, Entiok ni siit kaatta, nengnyi erah paang ah Entiok ni tongnyu ano Kristaan loong asuh nyootsoot nyuuta. Entiok hah dowa Jisu menjatte loong ah Kristaan ngeh ih phangmen dowa.
Erah tokdi Jerusalem dowa khowah loong ah Entiok ni kata.
Neng dung dowa wasiit, heh men ah Agabus ngeh ih angta ah toonchap ano Chiiala chaan nawa ih ban baatta harep haraang nah ram ang ah ngeh ih ah. (Erah Kludias Luuwanglong angta doh angta).
Heliphante loong ah ih Judia hah dowa Kristaan loong ah chosok suh o ih mathan jen maatkaat ah erah than ih maatkaat theng ngeh ih roongwaan rumta.
Emah ih lomse rum ano, ngun ah chaas phansiitte mihak phokhoh loong asuh Sool nyia Barnabaas lakdi maatkaat rumta.
Erah tokdi Hirod Luuwang ih marah marah kristaan loong ah phang siiwi rumta.
Joon phoh, Jeems ah lang ih tekdok thuk rumta.
Erah tekdookta asuh Jehudi loong ah roon kano, Pitar nep jootkhak thuk rumta. (Erah chamwi kuh ja angta).
Pitar joot lini phaatak ni sak ano, asih wah arok sipaahi suh ban thuk rumta. Hirod ih Khopi Romhoon lidoh Pitar suh noksong ngathong nah thaakcheng theng ngeh ih chungta.
Erah thoidi phaatak ni sakta, enoothong Kristaan mina loong ah ih neng ten nawa ih Pitar raangtaan ih Rangte rangsoom rumta.
Hirod ih Pitar ah nokwah reenah doksiit kaat theng ngeh ih chungta rangphe adi, Pitar ah sipaahi wanyi laktung ni jaanruh ih kit rum ano jupthuk rumta. Eno sipaahi loong ah ih phaatak kaalu adi ban rumta.
Baphuk ih Teesu rangsah ah dongchap haano, erah nokkhok adi we ah phaakjaaja ih phaak thukta. Teesu rangsah ih heh sookkaang ni joh ano moot nyoongta, Pitar ah saatsiit ano baatta, “Kharok! Chap uh!” Erah damdam ih Pitar lak dowa jaanruh ah jaadat eta.
Eno rangsah ih baatta, “An roomkhe nyia an lasong ah jamkap uh.” Pitar ih laan jamkap roh eta, eno rangsah ah ih baatta, “An nyuh ah wok uno nga damdam ih wakra ho.”
Pitar ah phaatak nawa, tiim uh lajat, helih helih ih dokkhoom kata, enoothong rangsah ah ih tiim esuh liita erah tajatta; Pitar ih mangphe hemang hang ngeh ih thunta.
Nengnyi ngathong ni chapta sipaahi ah jiitkhoom nyu ano heh lih dowa chapte ah taangko ih daankhoom kanyuuta, eno samnuthung ni nopwang theng jaankaalu ko ih khoomwang nyuuta. Kaalu ah hedaap daapdat ih kano dokkhoom kanyuuta. Lam adi datkhoom kanyu adi, rangsah ih Pitar luulu thiinhaatta.
Eno Pitar ih mamah angta erah samthun ano, liita, “Ngah ih jat ehang arah amiisak ih angla! Hirod lak nawa nyia Jehudi loong ih mamah angthaak ah ngeh ih bansok rum ha raangtaan ih nga Teesu ih heh rangsah ah nga puipang suh daapkaat hala.”
Ruurang ethih jatririh di, Pitar ah Joon Maak ngeh ih men rumta nuh nok adi kata, erah di miloong ah hantek ih khoon rum ano rangsoom rumta.
Pitar ih kaasak ah rengkok kano, Rhoda ngeh ih men rumta laksuh, minusah angta ah kata.
Pitar jengla ngeh ih heh root ah jatjoh ano kaasak uh ladaap kothang ih eroon damdi ngaaksoon wangta, eno Pitar kaasak thong ni chapla ngeh ih baatwan rumta.
“Emok anglu!” Miloong ah ih banli rumta. Erabah uh minusah rah ih amiisak ngeh ih hedop hedop baat rumta. Erah thoidi miloong ah ih liita, “Heh rangsah ang ah!”
Erah pootdi uh Pitar ih kaasak ah rengkok roh eta. Lini kaasak daaprum adi Pitar ah japtup rum ano paatti rumta.
Pitar ih nak hoopti an ngeh ih heh lak ah jap eta, eno heh Teesu ih phaatak nawa mamah ih doksiitta erah ah baat rumta. “Arah tiit ah Jeems nyia kristaan wahoh loong suh nep chobaat an ngeh ih baat rumta,” erah baatthiin rum ano; ehoh ni husoonta.
Rangkhano ang kano, sipaahi loong ah rapne ih phaangdat rumta—Pitar aju tiimjih angta ngeh ih ah?
Hirod ih taat jam thuk rum ano, mani uh tachoh jam rumta. Erah thoidi Pitar bante sipaahi loong ah tek haat ih thuk rumta. Erah lih adi, Herod Judia dowa kah ano Kaisiria ni tongkata.
Hirod ah Tairi nyia Sidoon nok hah suh rapne ih khata, erah thoidi miloong ah heh damdi chomui wang rumta. Jaakhoh thoon ah, Luuwang nok sokboite Blastus suh chomui ih weethuk he ngeh ih laatbaat rumta. Erah lih adi Luuwang reeni wangrum ano nuumi angwe ih ngeh ih li rumta, timnge liidoh nengdeek nengkaan ih phak asat ah Luuwang deek akaan nawa chophaksah rumta.
Rangwuuse ja hechoom heraang ah dok kapleh, Hirod ah heh noksong pangmeh damdi Luuwang tongtheng adi katong kata, enooleh jengse ah ra kah ih rumta.
Enooleh noksong loong ah riiraak ih rumta, “Arah mina tajengla, Rangte jengla!”
Rangte laphoongpha koka no rangsah ih lakdamdam di khoisat satthuk ano, soot suh teksat thukta.
Erah tokdi Rangte jengkhaap ah noongrep ni ruurangta.
Barnabaas nyia Sool ih Rangte mootkaat ah toom mokah roh ih nyu ano, Joon Maak ah siit nyu ano Jerusalem nawa ngaak wang ih jom rumta.
Entiok chaas ni khowah nyia nyootsootte eje angta: Erah loong ah langla Barnabaas, Simoon (mimak ih men rumta), Lusius (Siren nawa angta), Manaen (Kobono Herod ih haakpanta), nyia Sool loong ah ang rumta.
Erah loong ah ih samurangsoom tong rumta doh, Esa Chiiala ih baat rumta, “Barnabaas nyia Sool ngah ih tiim raangtaan ih poon nyuutang, erah moot ah moot suh danje an.”
Neng loong ah samurangsoom ah tong rum ano rang ah soom ih rumta, eno nengnyi khoh ni taajoh rum ano daapkaat rumta.
Esa Chiiala ih kaat thuk nyu ano, Barnabaas nyia Sool Seleukia ni kanyu ano Juuloot ni Sipras hah ni daansoon kanyuuta.
Salamis ni thoknyu ano, Jehudi rangsoomnok ni Rangte jengkhaap baatkaat nyuuta. Nengnyi damdi Joon Maak ah nengnyi roong chosok suh waksiit nyuuta.
Paphos maang thokthok juuloot ni hah maathan angta erah di tumkhoom jomrumta, erah di Jehudi nok hah maantaan wasiit heh men ah Bar-Jesus, ngeh ih men rumta warah chomui jomrumta, erah mina rah ih ngah khowah ngeh ih kachaangta.
Eno erah mih ah langla juuloot dowa kobono joonte angta, kobono ah men Sergias Paulus ngeh ih angta eno erah mina ah rapne ejat mih angta. Erah warah ih Pool nyia Barnabaas ah heh reeni Rangte jengkhaap boichaat suh poon nyuuta.
Enoothong maantaan Elimas (Erah men ah Grik jengkhaap lam ih menha) ah ih tanghaam ih nyuuta, timnge liidoh, kobono ih nengnyi jengkhaap ah phomok hanpi ah ngeh ih samthunta.
Eno Sool, Pool ngeh ih uh poon kah ih rumta warah Esa Chiiala te angta; Sool ih maantaan taangko ramram ih sok
ano liita, “An Hakhoh luuwang sah! Mootse kaatse mathan ah erah an raangtaan ih piiara tola. An tenthun mongtham ni ethih totoh thun hu, erah thoidi Teesu tiit ami ah eki eki ih deenbaat hu!
Amamah doh Teesu ih, edook ih hoon thuk ho eno rangwu latup thang ih pootsiit ang uh.” Lakdamdam di Elimas mik ah nakdat eta, eno heh lak nah joh ano diisiitte taat tum taajota.
Erah tup ano kobono ih ehanhan ih hanpiita; Teesu tiit nyootsoot nyuuta suh rapne ih paatjaata.
Sool nyia heh joonte loong ah Paphos nawa Pamphilia ko Perga ngeh ih samnuthung esiit angta di juulam ih daansoon wang rumta, Joon Maak ah erah hah dowa neng ah thiinhaat rum ano Jerusalem ni ngaak wangta.
Neng loong ah Perga nawa Pisidia hadaang Entiok ni thok rum ano, Jehudi naangtongsa ja Jehudi rangsoomnok ni tong karumta.
Moses Hootthe nyia Khowah loong ih raangthiinta ah weh rum ano, Jehudi rangsoomnok dowa saahaap loong ah ih neng suh maatbaat rumta: “Nga phono loong, noksong paangmeh suh chaankot jengkhaap je abah jeng an.”
Pool ah toonchap ano, heh lak ah jap damdi jengta: “Ani songtongte Ijirel nok hah nyia Ranglajatte joon awaan loong; nga jeng ah boichaat thaak an!
Ijirel mina loong Rangte ih sengte sengwah loong ah Ijip ni nokmah wensang eh songtong kaat suh danje rumta eno erah ni songtong tokdi rapne eh jaat thuk rumta. Rangte ih Ijip hah nawa hechaan hephaan nawa ih doksiit rumta,
eno paang rookbaji heh ih phisaang hah ni rapne ih naan rum ano sokboi riikoi rumta.
Rangte ih hah sinat ah jenthuk rum ano Kanaan hah ni hah changte eh hoonthuk rumta.
Chaabaji rookbangnga paang lidi kok semsong rumta. Erah lih adi, Samuel khowah maang dongka di neng mat hoonte nyia tiit hoonte ah dong thukta.
Eno Luuwang suk rum kano, Rangte ih Benjamin kuh awang dowa Kis sah Sool ah neng Luuwang paang rookbaji raangtaan ih ang thukta.
Sool ah dokphan ano, Rangte ih Dewid ah Luuwang ang thukta. Rangte ih amah liita: ‘Ngah ih ese chohang mina ah langla Jese sah Dewid, ngah ih tiim li ang erah mootkaat ah heh kah ah.’
Dewid sutom Jisu ah, Rangte ih heh kakham jun ih Ijirel mina puipangte ang thukta.
Jisu maang raara di, Joon ih Ijirel mina loong asuh baat rumta, maama rangdah ah sekthun ano juutem theng.
Eno Joon ih juutem rum ano miloong asuh cheng rumta, ‘Sen ih ngasuh o ngeh ih thun hali? Sen ih bansok han ah ngah tah angkang. Boichaat an! Nga lidoh Heh raaha, ngah bah heh lasong khook haattha uh tah angkang.’
“Abraham sutom satoom, Ijirel phoh ano loong, nyia aadi Ranglajatte o mina Rangte rangsoomte eh hoon lan loong asuh jenglang: Khopiiroidong tiit ah seng raangtaan ih kaat thuk hala!
Jerusalem ni songte loong nyia neng mihak phokhoh loong ebah neng Pangte ah tajatka, adoleh khowah loong ih raangthiinta le ah naangtongsa rookweh weh rumha ah tajat rumka. Erabah uh khowah jengkhaap ah amiisak ih angla, neng ih Jisu ah kaanju ih rumha.
Jisu ah tiim thoilam doh tek haat theng ah lajat rumkaano, Pilat suh tek haat etheng ngeh ih baat rumta.
Erah lih adi jirep ah Rangteele ni ban raangthiinta likhiik Jisu ah bangphak dowa datthiin rum ano beng rumta.
Eno Rangte ih Jisu ah tek nawa ngaaksaat ih thukta,
eno Galili nawa Jerusalem ni heh damdi roong kaatte loong ah reeni hedop hedop dongkhoomta. Amadi neng loong ah Ijirel mina raangtaan ih heh tiit baatte angla.
Eno aadi sen suh Ruurang Ese ah thok hui hali; sengte sengwah loong asuh Rangte ih kakhamta jun ih kot ih hali; amadi hesuh hesah loong ah raangtaan ih Jisu ah tek nawa ngaakthing ih thukta. Dewid Bong leedap enyi ni raangha, ‘An nga Sah; chiinnyah ngah an Wah eh hoon lang.’
<range>
Eno Rangte ih tek nawa ngaaksaat tiit ah baatta, mangbeng nah mabah uh tachaamka; ‘Ngah ih Dewid damdi kakham tang ah, Ngah ih romseetam kot ih rumha.’
Eho ni uh heh ih li eha, ‘An ih toongtang laksuh ah mabah uh beng nah tachaam thukko,’
Heh roidong di Dewid ah Rangte tenthun jun ih heh moot ah mokah ano tiita, erah lih adi hete hewah damdi bengkaat ano heh sak ah chaam eta.
Enoothong tek nawa ngaaksaat thukta warah bah Rangte ih emah chaam thukmuh.
Ijirel phoh ano loong, Jisu mendoh ba sen rangdah ah biin anaan choh an ngeh ih baat hi; erah raangtaan ih Moses Hootthe jun di biin anaan lachote loong asuh Jisu suh laalom ano biin anaan choh ah ngeh ih baattaan hi.
<range>
Erah raangtaan ih, maama teewah ih jat etheng, khowah loong ih baatta ah likhiik sen loong ah emah naktoom ang an:
Sok thaak an teemaang mangda loong! Paatja anno ti an! Chiinnyah ngah reelang ah erah sen ih tabaam hanpi kan, o mina ih taat deen jaangbaat han bah uh ah!”
Pool nyia Barnabaas Jehudi rangsoomnok nawa dokkhoom kanyuuta adi, naangtongsa ja boot nyootsoot esuh we ngaakwang ih hansih ngeh ih miloong ah ih phanbaat rumta.
Loongkhoon theng nawa miloong ah tiisoon kano, Jehudi mih nyia Ranglajatte hantek mina Rangte rangsoomte eh hoon rumta eno Pool nyia Barnabaas lilih ih khoom rumta. Pool nyia Barnabaas ih Rangte minchan doh songtong an ngeh ih chaankot jengkhaap ah renbaat ih nyuuta.
Jehudi naangtongsa saalih adi samnuh dowa miloong ah Teesu tiitkhaap tiit boichaat ra rumtaha.
Mih khoonthokta loong ah tup rum ano Jehudi nok hah loong ah ih miksuk ih rumta, Pool jengkhaap thoidi rookmui rum ano kaanju ih rumta.
Erabah uh Pool nyia Barnabaas ih ehanhan ih lacho laphaan ih baattaan nyu ano li rumta: “Rangte jengkhaap ah sen suh phangbaatjih angta. Enoothong sen ih lakap thoidi nyia khopiiroidong choh theethe tah angke li phiino, Ranglajatte jiinko kati.
Seng Teesu ih kotahe jengdang ah langla amah: ‘Ranglajatte loong raangtaan ih sen loong ah weephaak hoon rum taha, timnge liidi arah mongrep dowa loong ah toom puipang rum asuh ah.’”
Ranglajatte loong ah erah japchaat rum ano, rapne ih tenroon rumta eno Teesu jengkhaap ah phoongpha ih rumta; o mina latek roidong chote ah erah loong ah Kristaan eh hoon rumta.
Erah hah adi Teesu Jengkhaap ah noongrep ni ruurangta.
Enoothong Jehudi loong ah ih samnuthung dowa Rangte rangsoomte mihak phokhoh nyia Ranglajatte minuh ejat eje loong ah rapne ih dantak rumta. Pool nyia Barnabaas ah miksuk siikhaam ih rum ano erah hah dowa phanjoot haat ih rumta.
Kaamwah wanyi ah ih neng jeng phaaki nengnyi lah dowa botla ah jaanak nyu ano Ikoniam ko ih kanyuuta.
Entiok dowa kristaan loong ah sak ni Esa Chiiala kaat kohaano tenroon ih tong rumta.
Ikoniam ni uh phoosiitsiit ih angta: Pool nyia Barnabaas Jehudi rangsoomnok ni kanyu ano rapniine baattaan nyu kano Jehudi nok hah nyia Ranglajatte loong ah rapne ih kristaan eh hoon rumta.
Enoothong Jehudi mina o ih lahanpi rumta loong ah ih Ranglajatte loong asuh roonphak rum ano hanpiite loong damdi thet chomui thuk rumta.
Heliphante loong ah rekamdook ih sentong thiin rumta, Teesu tiit ah lacho laphaan ih baattaan rumta, heh tiitkhaap nyia minchan ah amiisak ngeh ih paatjaajih loong ah reeraang rum ano noisok rumta.
Samnuthung dowa mina loong ah phaaknyi eh hoon rumta: Mararah ah Jehudi damdi, rukho ah Heliphante loong damdi.
Eno marah Ranglajatte nyia Jehudi loong ah, neng mihak phokhoh damdi Heliphante loong ah joonnaam eno jong ih pat theng ngeh ih roongwaan rumta.
Heliphante loong ah erah japchaat rum ano, Likonia ko Listra nyia Derbe samnuthung hah ni nyia nokphoh nokno hah ni husoon rumta.
Erah di uh Ruurang Ese tiit ah baat roh ih rumta.
Dongtupta dowa ih mabah uh lataat khoomka rah ekoong mina Listra hah ni mih wasiit angta.
Erah di tong ano Pool jengkhaap ah thaam boichaatta. Pool ih ekoong tuumaang ah tup ano nyia ede ih ah ngeh ih jat ano ramram ih sok
ano erongwah ih jengta, “An lah nah toonchap uh!” Ekoong ah toonpit ano leng khoomta.
Mih khoonthok rumta loong ah Pool reeta ah tuprum ano, neng jeng Likonia jengkhaap lam ih riiraak rumta, “Rangte ah mih likhiik eh hoon ano seng reeni ra hala!”
Neng ih Barnabaas men ah Jeus ngeh ih men rumta, Pool men ah Hermes ngeh ih men rumta timnge liidoh heh tiitwah long angta.
Jeus rangte romwah angta rangsoomnok ah langla, samnuh paakaalu reeni angta, eno romwah nyia miloong ah ih Pool nyia Barnabaas khojoop suh maan nyia popoong loong ah paakaalu adi piikaat rum taha.
Pool nyia Barnabaas ih erah japchaat nyu ano miloong dung adi soonkah nyuuta eno nengnyi nyuh akhat ah khoohoom nyu ano riiraak nyuuta.
“Emah tiimte reeraang lan? Sek bah sen likhiikkhiik mina! Sek bah sen suh Ruurang Ese tiit baatte bo ah, hansi roidong dowa juukhu hakong adoleh erah di songtongte dongsiitte Rangte reenah toomthok rum ah ngeh ih bo tum baattaan hi tih.
Teewadi miloong ah maama pongwan ih songtong thukta.
Enoothong amadi hemoot hekaat ese lam ah noisok heeno ngah eje ngeh ih jatthuk hali; rang nawa heh ih rangphaat thukla nyia ji acham ah heh rangwu di jaase thukla; phak asat ah koh hanno tenroon ih tongthuk halan.”
Erah jengkhaap ah baat nyu ano Pool nyia Barnabaas ih nengnyi khojoop siik hoon ah kanak ih jen tanghaam nyuuta.
Marah marah Jehudi loong ah Entiok nyia Ikoniam nawa Pisidia ni ra rum taha; neng loong ah ih miloong ah mokwaan ra rum haano neng damdi roongroop rumta, Pool ah jong ih patrum ano tek ela ngeh ih samthun rumta eno erah hah dowa dok hoom kaat rumta.
Enoothong hanpiite loong ah kookchap rum kano, Pool ah samnuthung ko ngaak soonwangta. Erah saalih adi Pool nyia Barnabaas Derbe ni wang nyuuta.
Pool nyia Barnabaas Ruurang Ese tiit baat nyu kano Derbe dowa miloong ah heliphante nang jaat thuk nyuuta. Eno Listra dowa Ikoniam ni, erah lih adi Entiok hah Pisidia ni ngaak wang rumta.
Nengnyi ih Kristaan loong asuh amiisak tiit ah kap anno kamkam ih laalom anno tong an ngeh ih chaankot jengkhaap ah baatthiin ih nyuuta. “Rangte hasong mong nah jennop suh seng ih jirep cham anaang ah jen hui etheng,” ngeh ih nyootsoot nyuuta.
Chaas rookwet ni nengnyi ih mihak phokhoh long ah danje ih thiin nyuuta, eno samurangsoom ah tongleh Teesu lakni lookleh rang ah soomkoh, eno mihak phokhoh loong asuh nengnyi rapne laaloom nyuuta.
Pisidia hah adi daan kah nyu ano, Pamphilia ni thok nyuuta.
Perga hah adi Rangte tiitkhaap ah baatnyu ano Attalia ko wang nyuuta, eno
erah dowa Entiok ni ju lam ih daansoon wang nyuuta, erah hah adi nengnyi suh Rangte minchan doh jen mootkaat etheng ngeh ih rangsoom koh rumta jun ih jenthoon mokah ih nyuuta.
Entiok ni thoknyu ano, Rangte ih mamah mootkaat thuk nyuuta nyia Ranglajatte loong asuh laalom lampo laangsiit kota erah tiit baat suh miloong ah khoonpoon ih nyuuta.
Eno kristaan loong damdi erah ni rekamdook ih roong tongthiin nyuuta.
Mararah mina loong ah Judia nawa Entiok ni wang rum haano hanpiite loong asuh phang nyootsoot rumta, “Moses Hootthe jun ih khoopkhan banlam lahoon kanbah sen ih khopiiroidong ah tachoh kan.”
Erah jengkhaap ah thoidi Pool nyia Barnabaas ah neng damdi rapne ih daanmui nyuuta, erah raangtaan Entiok nawa wasiitnyi Pool nyia Barnabaas damdoh Jerusalem nah wakkah ano kamwah nyia mihak phokhoh loong asuh erah tiit ah chengkaat theng ngeh ih roongwaan rumta.
Erah thoidi neng loong ah chaaste ih wangthuk rumta; eno Phoenesia nyia Samaria lam ih kah rum adi, Ranglajatte loong ah Rangte mendi mamah lek rumta tiit ah banbaat rumta; erah chaat rum ano hanpiite loong ah rapne ih roon rumta.
Jerusalem ni thokrum kano, kamwah loong, chaas nawa te nyia mihak phokhoh loong ih rapniine ih bantho rumta, neng suh Rangte ih mamah ih maak rumta erah tiit ah baat ih rumta.
Enoothong mararah hanpiite Pharisis nawa angta loong ah toonchap rum ano jeng rumta, “Ranglajatte loong ah ih khoopkhan banlam ah hoon jaatjaat etheng eno Moses Hootthe kap ah baat etheng.”
Kamwah nyia mihak phokhoh loong ah erah tiit ah phanwaan suh lomtong rumta.
Rekam daanmui rum ah lilih Pitar ah toonchap ano jengta, “Phoh ano loong, sen ih jat ehan, ngah jaakhoh di Rangte ih Ranglajatte suh Ruurang Ese tiit baat suh danje tahang, timnge liidi neng ih erah japchaat ano toom hanpi rum ah ngeh ah.
Eno mirep thung atak jatte Rangte ih, seng suh kohali ah likhiik Esa Chiiala ah koh rum ano heh ih Ranglajatte loong ah uh kap etheng ngeh ih noisok ha.
Rangte ih seng loong asuh phoosiit siit li hali; neng loong ah ih hanpi ih kano neng rangdah uh biin anaan eha.
Emah ang abah, sengte sengwah ih lajen huika nyia seng ih lajen huike huijih ah neng tam ni toonhui thuk eno, Rangte ah tiim esuh thaak phate hi?
Emah tah angka! Teesu Jisu minchan ih seng puipang ih tahe ah likhiik neng uh hanpi ih rum kano puipang ih rumha.”
Pool nyia Barnabaas ah Rangte ih Ranglajatte damdi mih paatjaajih mamah ih re thuk nyuuta, erah baatnyu kano mih loong ah tikpakpak ih tong rumta.
Pool nyia Barnabaas ah thoonjeng nyu kano, Jeems we jengta: “Nga phono loong chaat thaak he!
Jaakhoh di Rangte ih Ranglajatte dung dowa heh mih raangtaan ih poon ano neng mamah ih riikoi sokboita erah ah Simoon ih baat ih tahan.
Khowah loong ih baatta jengkhaap ah pun ela, Rangteele ni liiha,
‘Teesu jengta, arah lidoh Ngah ngaak hangno, Dewid hasong ah ngaak seesiit ih raahang. Thet eta ah rongtangtang ih we seesiit angno ese we angthuk ang.
Eno loongtang mina nga taangnah thok ha, Ranglajatte loongtang nga noksong raangtaan ih poonhang loong ra ah.
Arah jengkhaap ah Teesu ih, ehakdi dook jatthukta.’
“Nga thung ni bah amah,” ngeh ih li ano Jeems ah jangjeng kata, “Marah Rangte reeni thok hala Ranglajatte loong ah seng ih laphaang phaktheng.
Erah nang ebah, khojoop phaksat nyia esot loong ah laphaksat theng ngeh ih le thong raangmaat ih; adoleh mih damdoh roomjup roomtong lah ang theng, khoisat luiamaan nyia hesipan laphak theng ngeh ah.
Tiimnge liidi, Moses Hootthe ah Jehudi rangsoomnok ni naangtongsa rookwet jaakhoh dowa ih weh koha, enooleh noongrep ni samnuh ko ih tumbaat rumha.”
Eno kaamwah loong nyia chaas phokhoh loongtang roongwaan rum ano, neng dung dowa mina danje rumta eno Pool nyia Barnabaas damdi Entiok ni wakkaat thuk rumta. Hanpiite loong ih rapne ih choomjoh arah mina wanyi danje rumta, Judas Barsabbas ngeh ih men rumta nyia Silas ah;
eno neng ih arah le ah raangmaat rumta: “Senphoh senno seng loong ah, kaamwah nyia mihak phokhoh loong ah ih, Entiok, Sairia nyia Silisika dowa Ranglajatte phoh ano loong suh jengkhaapse ra hi.
Sengdung nawa ra taha loong ah ih sen loong ah neng jengkhaap nawa ih phaangphak ra halan ngeh ih chaat ehi; neng suh, seng ih, renbaat muh.
Eno khoontong eno kongphaak kotte sen reenah kaat thuk suh kheemui li. Seng moongnook joonte Barnabaas nyia Pool damdoh wakra rumha,
neng loong ah ih Teesu Jisu Kristo raangtaan ih ba seng roidong ah mamah ang abah uh toomang ah ngeh ih jaan jen chaang rumha.
Erah raangtaan ih Judas nyia Silas kaat thuk hali, seng ih tiimjih raang hi nengnyi tui ih uh erah ah baat ehan.
Arah banlam tiit khotok doh sen laphaangphak theng ngeh ih Esa Chiiala nyia seng loong ah ih tiit thiin hi:
Khojoop phaksat laphaksat theng; hesih laphak theng; khoisat luiamaan laphak theng; eno mih damdoh roomjup roomtong laje theng. Ethih ekhah lare kanbah senmoot senkaat jirep ah ese ang ah. Eno sen suh jengseera hi.”
Kongphaak kotte ah Entiok ni wang thuk rumta, eno miloong thutpoon rum ano hanpiite loong asuh le ah chokoh ih rumta.
Mina loong ah ih le ah weh rum ano, chaankot jengkhaap asuh rapne ih roon rumta.
Judas nyia Silas, nengnyi uh khowah angta, nengnyi miloong ah damdi rekamdook ih chaankot jengkhaap jeng koh nyuuta.
Erah ni cheesah tongnyu adi, miloong ah ih romseetam jengkhaap ah jeng koh rum ano o ih kaat thuk nyuuta erah loong ah reeni ngaak wang thuk rumta.
Enoothong Silas ah erah ni tangtong suh liita.
Pool nyia Barnabaas Entiok ni cheesah tongthiin nyuuta, nengnyi damdi wahoh loong ah nep ih Rangte Jengkhaap nyootsoot thiin rumta.
Rekam tongnyu ano Pool ih Barnabaas suh liita; “Sek ih Teesu tiit nyootsootti tih hanpiite loong ah samnuh harep nah ngaak kah tiino sokkah thaak tih mamah ih tongtha rumla.”
Eno Barnabaas ih Joon Maak ah nengnyi damdi waksiit thung,
Pool langkoleh heh waksiit ah tapunka ngeh ih thunta, timnge liidoh, Joon Maak ah nengnyi damdi thoon moot kaatmuh, heh Pamphilia nawa ngaak soonta.
Nengnyi rapne daanmui nyu ano pheesoon nyuuta: Barnabaas ah Maak ah siit ano Sipras ko juulam ih daansoonta,
Pool ih Silas ah siit ano kata, hanpiite loong ah ih nengnyi ah phoongpha rum ano Teesu lak ni look haatkoh rumta.
Pool ah Siria nyia Silisia lam ih kah ano chaas rookweh ni chaan tum kota.
Timothi ngeh ih kristaan mina wasiit Derbe nyia Listra hadaang ni tongta, erah di Pool tumkhoom kata. Heh nuh ah langla Jehudi nok hah ang ano Kristaan eh hoon arah angta, heh wah ah ba Grik nok hah angta.
Listra nyia Ikonium dowa hanpiite loong ah ih Timothi ah rapne ih seebaat rumta.
Pool ih Timothi waksiit suh chung ano, heh suh khoopkhan banlam ah hoon eh thukta. Pool ih tiim esuh hoon thukta liidi, erah hah adi songtongte loong ah ih jat eta Timothi wah ah Grik nok hah ngeh ah.
Nengnyi samnuh ni tumkhoom kanyuuta adoh, kamwah nyia mihak phokhoh loong ah ih Jerusalem ni tiit thiin rumta neem arang ah kap etheng ngeh ih hanpiite loong suh tumbaat nyuuta.
Erah raangtaan ih chaas mina loong laalom ah rongtangtang ang kano rangwu rookwet miloong ah jaat eh rumta.
Esa Chiiala ih Esia hah ni rangte tiit labaat thuknyu koka no Phrigia nyia Galatia hah ni tumkhoom kanyuuta.
Nengnyi Maisia jatlih rit ah thokkhoom nyu ano, Bithinia hah ni nopwang chung nyuuta, enoothong Jisu Chiiala ih tawang thuk nyuuta.
Erah thoidi Maisia hah lam ih daankhoom nyu ano Troos ni wang nyuuta.
Erah rangphe ja Pool ih heh mangphe di Mesidoniate wasiit heh lasih jowang arah japtupta, “Mesidonia hah nah seng chosok ra weeho!” ngeh ah.
Pool ih heh mangphe mangta damdam eh, seng Mesidonia ni dokchap kati, tiimnge liidi, Mesidonia ni ruurang jaase tiit miloong asuh baatkaat suh poon hali ngeh ih roongwaanti.
Troos nawa seng loong ah Samothras lam ih juukaari ni phangla ih daansoon kati, eno erah saalih adi Neopolis ni wangti.
Erah dowa Philippi hani saanghook lam ih wangti, erah langla Mesidonia distrik ni phangdong eta samnuthung ah ang dowa; Room hah ngeh ih uh li eta. Erah di seng rekamdook tong thiinti.
Naangtongsa seng loong ah juure ko samnuthung adi kati, seng ih mok thunti erah nah Jehudi loong rangsoom khoontong theng eje ang ah ngeh ah. Erah di chooktong kah eno minuh loong ah khoontong rumta damdi roongwaan kati.
Neng dung ni seng jeng chaat arah Thaitria hah nawa Lidia ngeh ih nusiit angta, erah nuh ah saanghaam nyuh sangte angta. Heh Rangte rangsoomte ang kano, Pool jengkhaap thaangchaat suh Teesu ih hethung hetak seklilih ang thukta.
Neng jaatang juutem lidi, erah nuh ah ih poon tahe, “Amiisak Teesu suh laalomte ngeh ih thun hali bah nga nok nah jamra han.” Erah nuh ah ih ekaat ih weetheng ngeh ih laat poon tahe.
Saasiit rangsoom thengni kati di, milaksuh jaalasah nusiit chomuiti, erah sah ah chiithih laakhah pan angta eno liwang nah tiimjih angtheng ah erah banbaatte angta. Erah likhiik mi banbaat thoidi heh changte wah asuh ngun rapne ih bi kota.
Eno erah jaalasah ah seng Pool loong ah lilih ih phankhoom haano erongwah ih riiraakta, “Arah wah loong ah bah thoontang nang ih Elong Rangte jeng chaatte! Neng ih sen khopi tiit ah baat halan!”
Erah sah ah saarookwet emamah wootjeng kano Pool ah thungthita, eno lekchap ano chiiala asuh liita, “Jisu Kristo mendoh arah sah sak dowa doksoon ho!” Lakdamdam ih chiiala ah heh sak dowa doksoonta.
Heh changte warah ih bolam bah ngunbi lampo takah jeeka ngeh ih samthun ano, Pool nyia Silas ah joh nyu ano nokwah dung ni thaangsang theng ko elong elang loong reeni hoom kaat nyuuta.
Room nok hah saahaap loong reeni siitkaat nyu ano baat rumta, “Arah mih anyi Jehudi nok hah, eno anyi ih arah samnuthung adi hah phaangphak nyuuha.
Arah nyi ih seng Hootthe lah angka rah nyootsoot nyuuha; seng bah Room mina, erah raangtaan ih erah nyootsoot nyuuha Hootthe ah tami kapke.”
Eno mih lomkhoon rumta loong ah nep ih Pool nyia Silas ah roong buh rumta. Saahaap loong ah ih Pool nyia Silas ah nyuh akhat nep ih khoohoom rum ano bot thuk rumta.
Rapne ih bot lidi, Pool nyia Silas ah phaatak ni sak nyuuta, eno saahaap ah ih kit eh tangsak thuk rumta.
Erah baat kano, phaatak bante ah ih nokmong khok ni siitwan nyu ano, nengnyi lah ah bangtan laktung ni roopkit wan nyuuta.
Pheethungkham di Pool nyia Silas ah Rangte seehoon boongkaat lam ih rangsoom nyuuta, eno phaatak ni sakta wahoh loong ah ih nengnyi seehoon boongkaat ah boichaat ih rumta.
Baphuk ih hah ah choophaan phaan ih moh ano phaatak nok ah thetnyoongta. Kaasak loong ah laakdat, eno phaatak dowa miloong khakta janruh loong ah jaadat eta.
Phaatak bante ah paatsaat ano kaasak loong ah laakdat choi tupta, heh ih thunta phaatak dowa miloong ah hotsoon ela ngeh ah; eno heh lang ah dok hoom ano heh teeteewah taat tek haatta.
Enoothong Pool erongwah ih tangriita, “An teewah nak tek haat uh! Seng loongtang eje!”
Phaatak bante ah ih weephaak took kot taat jam poonta, noppit ano, heh lakuh rungrung ih moh ano Pool nyia Silas lasih jowangta.
Eno wanyi ah dokkhoom thuknyu ano chengta, “Chuupha nyi, nga khopi suh tiim ih we ang?”
Wanyi ah ih baatta, “An khopi suh Teesu Jisu suh laalom uh an jaatang loongtang epui e an.”
Eno wanyi ah ih neng changtom suh Teesu tiit ah nyootsoot ih nyuuta.
Erah rangphe adi phaatak bante ah ih doksiit nyu ano nengnyi sok ama loong ah chotchaat eta; lakdamdam di neng jaatang changtom juutem rumta.
Erah lih adi Pool nyia Silas ah heh nok ni siitkaat nyu ano phaksat ah kokaang nyuuta. Neng jaatang changtom Rangte hanpi hi ngeh ih roon rumta.
Erah saalih rangkhah di Room hate ngoong awang loong ah ih phaatak bante saahaap loong reeni pulit suh baatwan thuk rumta, “Wanyi ah dokkhoom toom ih nyu ah ngeh ah.”
Eno phaatak bante ah ih Pool suh baatta, “Saahaap loong ah ih set Silas suh dok etheng ngeh ih maaatbaat rumhala. Set jen kaat ih ansih, ese thamtham ih kah ansih.”
Enoothong Pool ih saahaap asuh liita, “Seknyi Room nok hah, tiim uh laathih keetih di, nokwah dung ni buh tahe tih! Erah lih adi phaatak ni sak tahe tih. Eno amadi ah hotsu ih kaat thuk hali tih. Enoothong emah tah angka! Room hate saahaap loong ah ih nengneng wang haano toom kaat thuk he tih.”
Phaatak bante loong ah ih erah jengkhaap ah Room hate saahaap loong asuh baat kaat rumta; eno Pool nyia Silas ah Room nok ha ngeh ih japchaat rum ano, neng loong ah echo ih rumta.
Erah thoidi neng loong ah kah ano seng mok re ah enaan ih weehe ngeh ih roongwaan karumta; eno phaatak nawa doksiit rum ano samnuthung dowa doksoon ih ansih ngeh ih baat rumta.
Pool nyia Silas ah phaatak dowa doksoon nyu ano Lidia nok ni kanyuuta. Erah ni Teesu liphante loong ah chomui kanyuuta, eno neng loong asuh chaankot jengkhaap ah jengthiin nyu ano doksoon nyuuta.
Pool nyia Silas Thesalonika ni Amphipolis nyia Apollonia lam ih kanyuuta, erah hah adi Jehudi rangsoomnok eje angta.
Saahoh di kakah ah likhiik Pool ah Jehudi rangsoomnok ni kata. Jehudi Naangtongsa rangwu di sa jom kah ano miloong ah damdi roongwaan kata,
eno Rangteele tiitkhaap ah baattaan rumta, Kristo ah cham jaatjaat etheng angta eno tek nawa we ngaaksaat ih ah. Pool ih baat rumta, “Erah Jisu tiit ah baat rumhala,” eno “erah juuba Kristo ang ah.”
Mararah loong ah ih erah tiit ah kap ih rum ano Pool nyia Silas damdi roongroop rumta; minuh ejat esam loong nyia Grik nok hah Rangte ra choote loong ah nep roongroop rumta.
Enoothong Jehudi loong ah ih miksuk ih rum ano pheehoon thaangsang theng dowa mih lajak loong khoonpoon rumta. Erah miloong ah ih samnuthung ah rapne ih phaanghoom rumta, eno Pool nyia Silas ah nokwah dungni siitkaat suh li rum ano Jaasoon nok ah kooknak ih rumta.
Pool nyia Silas laje kokaano, Jaasoon nyia Teesu liphante wahoh loong ah samnuthung dowa saahaap loong reeni dok hoom kaat rum ano riiraak rumta, “Arah miloong ah ih seng hadaang noongrep ni haphaang hoom rumha! Haphaang hoomte loong ah seng hah ni thok rumhala,
eno Jaasoon ih heh nok ni jamthuk nyuula. Luuwanglong Hootthe ah arah loong ah ih thet hoom rumha, neng ih liiha bolam Luuwang wahoh eje, heh men ah angkoleh Jisu ngeh ih poon rumha.”
Erah jeng ah chaat rum ano, samnuthung dowa miloong ah nyia saahaap loong ah neng thung rapne phaangdat rumta.
Saahaap loong ah ih Jaasoon nyia heh joon loong ah chang rum ano daap haat rumta.
Rang ah nak kano, Teesu liphante loong ah ih Pool nyia Silas ah Beria ni kaat thuk rumta. Erah ni thoknyu ano, Jehudi rangsoomnok ni kanyuuta.
Erah hah dowa miloong ah Thesalonika mih thaknang ih roongwaan roongtiit ang rumta. Neng loong ah ih rangte tiit ah tenroon woksoon ih boichaat rumta, eno Pool nyia Silas ih baat nyuuta Rangteele ah ami aha jat suh ngeh ih saarookwet ih weh rumta.
Mih hantek ih hanpi rumta, Grik nok hah minuh ejat esam loong ih nyia miwah loong ih uh hanpi ih rumta.
Enoothong Thesalonika dowa Jehudi loong ah ih Pool ih Beria ni Rangte tiit baat japchaat rum ano Beria ni miloong ah roonphak ra rum haano daanmui thuk rumta.
Rangte ra choote loong ah ih Pool ah juukaang ko ih hotsoon kaat thuk rumta; enoothong Silas nyia Timothi ah Beria ni tangtong nyuuta.
Pool siitkaatte miloong ah Ethen ni maang thokthok ih siitkaat rumta eno Beria ni maang ngaakwang rumka di Pool ih Silas nyia Timothi ah kharok ih toom chokhoom nyuuha ngeh ih maatbaat rumta.
Pool ih Silas nyia Timothi Ethen ni ban nyu adi, erah samnuthung dowa miloong ah sok ano rapne ih thungthita.
Erah raangtaan ih Pool ah Jehudi rangsoomnok ni Jehudi nyia Ranglajatte Rangte rangsoomte eh hoon rumta loong ah damdi roongwangta, eno erah di o mina thaangsangte daankhoomta loong ah damdi nep roong waanta.
Epikuria nok hah nyia Stoik nyootsootte nep ih Pool damdi daanmui rumta. Mararah ih cheng rumta, “Arah ih tiim uh lajat kaadi tiim jengte jengla?” Wahoh loong ah ih ngaak baatta, “Mideek mikaan Rangte tiit ta baat ha nih.” Arah jengkhaap ah Pool ih Jisu nyia ngaaksaat tiit baat kano li rumta.
Erah thoidi Pool ah samnuthung ni Ariopagus Ngoongthum thengni siitkaat rum ano cheng rumta, “An ih ena ena nyootsoot hu ah tiimjih suh liihu.
Mararah ah seng ih dookdah ih chaat hi, erah ah ju tiimsuh liiha ngeh ih jat suh liihi.”
(Ethen nok hah nyia mideek nawa thok songtongta loong ah ena ena tiitwaan chaat suh nyia jat suh karam rumta.)
Pool samnuthung dowa Ngoongthumte ngathong ni toonchap ano jengta, “Sen Ethen nok hah loong ah thooroom mina.
Tiimnge liidi sen hadaang ni tumkhoom lang adi sen rangsoom theng ni, thong ni raanghan ah emah raang arah japtuptang, ‘Lajatke Rangte suh.’ Heh men lajat kan ah soomtu han, ngah ih erah laangbo nyootsoot rumhala.
Mongrep nyia erah khui ni tongtongla hoonte Rangte ah juuba rang nyia hah raangtaan ih Teesu eno heh mabah uh mina ih hoon hi rangsoomnok nah tatongka.
Adoleh seng jiin nawa tiim uh tasuh ri, seng roidong, sengtak senglak jaatrep heh teeteewah ih koh hali.
Mina wasiit dowa warep waraang loong jaat thuk ano mongrep noongrep ni songtong thukla. Rangte heh teeteewah ih maang edook mathan saajang nyia marah hah adoh songtong theng ah erah thiin choi.
Erah ah tiim esuh liita, mina ih Rangte ah jam ih ah, adoleh erah jam rum adoh mok chojam ih rum ah. Ang ah bah uh Rangte ah seng loong taangnawa haloot ni bah tah angka;
o ih bah uh li eta, ‘Heh damdi tongli, heh damdi khoomli, heh dam di hak li.’ Boongkaat seehoon leedap raangte sengdung dowa ih liita, ‘Seng loong ah uh hesuh hesah.’
Seng Rangte suh hesuh hesah lek angleh, lamok thun theng hebanlam ih hun adoleh kom nyia jong, mina lak ih miihoon ha likhiik ang ah ngeh ah.
Maangdoh bah jirep ah Rangte ih heh men maang jat doh tasam sokta, enoothong amadi mirep suh sekthun etheng ngeh ih baat ha.
Tiimnge liidi, heh ih danjeeta loong asuh arah hah ah dande thuk suh rangwu saakaan thiin eha. Tek nawa saatsiitta warah jun ih mirep suh heh ih jat ih thuk hali!”
Pool ih tek nawa ngaaksaat tiit baat kano mararah ah doondaak siitkook ih rumta, eno mararah ih liita, “Seng suh arah jengkhaap ah we bootbaat ih weehe.”
Erah lomkhoon rumta dowa Pool ah doksoon ih kata.
Miwah mararah ih hanpi ih rum ano roongroop rumta, neng damdi Dionisius nep roong roopta, minuh nusiit Damaris nyia, mih wahoh loong ah uh eje angta.
Erah lih dophi, Pool Ethen nawa Korin ni wangta.
Erah ni Jehudiite wasiit Akuila ngeh ih chomuita, heh Poontus ni tup arah angta, nengnyi heh minuh Prisilla ah langla, Luuwanglong Kladius ih Room hah nawa Jehudi loong ah dokphan rum kano erah ngangah ih Itali nawa ra nyuutaha. Eno Pool ah erah nyi damdi,
ngunbi suh nok roonghoon waktong wangta, tiimnge liidi Pool uh nengnyi likhiikkhiik ih hetui hewok raang ih nok hoon nawa ngun kabiita.
Pool Jehudi rangsoomnok ni Naangtongsa rookweh Jehudi nyia Grik damdi roongwaan leh kataat nuune rumta.
Mesidonia nawa Silas nyia Timothi ah thoknyu kano, Pool ih saapoot ah saarookwet Rangte tiit baat suh kota, Jehudi loong suh Jisu juuba Kristo ngeh ih baat rumta.
Mina loong ah ih ethih ethih jeng rum ano Pool suh liirum kano, neng jeng daan lakbi ah heh nyuh dowa botla ah jaabuh ano li rumta, “Sen mat e an bah sen teeteewah suh joong an! Nga mat tah angka, Arah dophi bah ngah Ranglajatte taangko ih kah ang.”
Erah lih adi neng re dowa doksoon kah ano, Ranglajatte mina Rangte rangsoomte ih hoon arah, heh men Taitias Justus kapoon rumta nok ni tong kata; heh nok ah Jehudi rangsoomnok reeni angta.
Kispus ah Jehudi rangsoomnok ni mihak phokhoh angta, heh teewah nyia heh jaatang loongtang Teesu hanpiite ang rumta; Korin ni uh Rangte jengkhaap ah chaat rum ano hanpiite rapne ih dong ano ju ah tem ih rumta.
Pheesiit Pool suh motmang ni heh Teesu ih baatta, “An nakcho uh, erah nang ebah larit haat thang ih baat ba jangbaat theng,
timnge liidi an damdi ngah eje. O ih uh tajen thet haatru; samnuthung adi nga mih rapne ih je ah.”
Erah raangtaan ih Pool paangsiit paangthom tongthiin ano, mina loong asuh Rangte Jengkhaap ah nyootsoot thiin rumta.
Akaia hah ni Gallio ah, Room nawa kobono angta doh, Jehudi loong lomkhoon rum ano, Pool ah joh ih rumta; eno mat hoon thengni siitkaat rumta.
“Arah mih” rah ih seng “Hootthe ni lajeeka rah Rangte rangsoom thuk suh miloong asuh laatbaat rumha!”
Pool ah jeng ih ang ngeh taat thun adi Gallio ih Jehudi loong asuh liita, “Arah matthih changkhah tiit ang dobah, Ngah ih mat ah hoon etheng tang Jehudi noksong loong.”
Enoothong, sen loong ah jengkhaap thoidi nyia sen Hootthe tungdi ba daanmui lan, erah tiit abah sensen ih hoonjih. Arah likhiik ah ngah ih tapaat korumra!”
Eno matpaat theng nawa phanhaat rumta.
Erah lih adi Jehudi rangsoomnok dowa mihak phokhoh, Sosthens ah joh rum ano mat hoon theng nokka adi nobuh rumta. Enoothong tiim ih rum abah uh Gallio ah tasoot saamta.
Hanpiite loong damdi Pool Korin hani rekamdook tongthiinta, eno Prisilla nyia Akuila damdi Siria ni juulam ih daan soon wangta. Seneria ni maang daansoon kaadi, heh ih thoomhoon thoidi heh khoh ah suihaat eta.
Ephesas ni thokrum ano, Pool ih Prisilla nyi Akuila ah thiinhaat ih nyuuta. Pool Jehudi rangsoomnok ni kah ano, Jehudi loong damdi roongwaan kata.
Miloong ah ih rekam tongthiin taatbaat rumta, eno Pool tanookta.
Erah nang ebah Pool ih kaat elang ngeh ih baatthiin rum ano amah jeng thiinta, “Rangte tenthun mongtham ang abah sen jiinnah we ngaakwang ehang.” Erah baat rum ano Ephesas nawa juulam ih daansoon kata.
Pool Kaisiria ni thok ano, Jerusalem chaas ni kata, eno jengseera ano, Entiok ni wangta.
Erah ni chomroe tongthiin ano, Galitia nyia Phrigia hah lam ih wang ano chaankot jengkhaap ah hanpiite loong asuh jeng koh thiinta.
Erah tokdi Korin Jehudi mih wasiit, heh men ah Apollos, erah warah Alejandria ni tup dowa, eno Ephesas ni ra taha. Heh tiitwah loong angta eno Rangte Jengkhaap uh jat eta.
Teesu lampo ni khoom suh heh renbaat choi nyia nyootsoot choi angta, erah thoidi Jisu thoilam ah naririh ih nyootsootta. Erabah uh, heh ih Joon Juutem luulu ba jatta.
Heh Jehudi rangsoomnok ni lacho laphaan ih phang jengkongta. Prisilla nyia Akuilla ih heh jeng ah chaat nyu ano, nengnyi damdi nok ni siitwan nyuuta, eno Rangte lampo ah rapniine ih hukbaat nyuuta.
Erah lih adi Apollos Akaia ni kaat chungta, erah raangtaan ih Ephesas dowa hanpiite loong ah ih Akaia nok hah suh rapniine ih sokboi an ngeh ih le ah raangmaat ih rumta. Apollos thokkhoom ano, Rangte minchan di kristaan loong ah raangtaan ih neng moot chosok suh rapne ese angta.
Tiimnge liidi, Apollos ah Jehudi loong damdi rapne daanmui ano Rangteele nawa ih Jisu ah Kristo ngeh ih jatthuk rumta.
Apollos Korin ni angta doh, Pool Ephesas hah noongrep ni tumkhoomta. Erah ni heliphante wasiit wanyi chomui ano
cheng rumta, “Kristaan eh hoontan adoh Esa Chiiala chotam etan?” Eno neng ih ngaakbaat rumta, “Esa Chiiala eje ngeh ih taan boseh tajatke.”
“Ese no bah ah, tiimjaat juutem tan?” Pool ih weecheng rumta. “Neng ih ngaak baatta” Joon juutem temti.
Pool ih baat rumta, “Joon juutem ah langla o mina rangdah sekthunta erah mina ah raangtaan eh, eno Joon ih Ijirel mina loong asuh baatta nga lih ni kaatte tiit ah hanpi an—erah langla, Jisu.”
Erah chaat rum ano Teesu Jisu mendi juutem rumta.
Pool ih heh lak ih taajoot rum kano neng sak ni Esa Chiiala ah ra ih taha; eno erah miloong ah jengkhaap ena ena dongjeng rum ano Rangte tiitwaan ah baat ih rumta.
Neng loong ah rooproop eh asih wanyi taan miwah ang rumta.
Laajom mongdi Pool Jehudi rangsoomnok ni kah ano miloong ah damdi lacho laphaan ih roongwaan kata, eno Rangmong tiit ah baat rum ano nuune rumta.
Mararah tenthun ah jong ajaan likhiik ang ano tahanpi rumta, eno nokwah dungni Teesu tiit ah ethih ethih ih jeng rumta. Eno Pool ih hanpiite loong ah siit ano doksoon kata, erah ni saarookwet ih Tirannas tiitwaan roongwaan nok adi roongwaan rumta.
Emamah paangnyi tongtha rumta, erah thoidi Esia hah ni tongte, Jehudi nyia Ranglajatte loong ah ih Teesu tiitkhaap ah japchaat rumta.
Rangte ih Pool suh mabah uh lataat jat rumka paatjaajih loong ah reeraang thukta.
Theehut theng nyusah ah khoisatte reeni maatkaat koleh nyia huikaat koleh, maasat uh ede eta eno chiithih laakhah uh doksoon eta.
Mararah Jehudi loong ah ih chiithih laakhah dokphan suh tum khoomte loong ah ih uh erah likhiik Jisu mendi taatthaak dokphan ih rumta. Erah loong ah ih chiithih laakhah asuh liita, “Pool ih baatta Jisu tiit ah mendi phan hala.”
Jehudi nok hah Romwah phokhothoon Sewa sah loong, wasinet ah ih emah taatthaak dokphan rumta.
Enoothong chiithih laakhah ah ih neng suh liita, “Ngah ih Jisu jat ih ang, Pool uh jat ih ang; enoothong sen—o ah?”
Chiithih laakhah pan warah doonpit ano neng loong ah nobuh rumta. Erah nok dowa, sokkhook maalook nyia nengnyuh nengkhat chiinhoom choi tiisoon rumta.
Ephisus ni tongte Jehudi nyia Ranglajatte loong ah ih erah japchaat rum ano; rapne ih cho rumta eno Jisu men ah rapne ih raksiit rumta.
Hanpiite loong ah ih nokwah dungni neng rangdah maangdi mokre rumta loong ah dokbaat ih rumta.
Maantaan loong ah ih neng leedap ah piikaat rum ano nokwah dungni mattak rumta. Leedap thaang ah thaak weh rum ano, rooproop ih haajaat rookbangnga ngunkholok angta.
Erah likhiik Teesu tiitkhaap ah ehanhan ih ruurangta.
Erah lih adi, Mesidonia nyia Akaia ni tumkhoom ano Jerusalem ni wang suh Pool ih samthunta. Pool ih liita, “Erah hah nah wang lidoh,” “Room hah nah ngah wang jaatjaat etheng.”
Erah thoidi heh damdi roong mootkaatte Timothi nyia Erastas ah, Mesidonia ni wangthuk nyuuta, eno Esia hah ni Pool ah rekam tongthiinta.
Erah tokdi Ephesas ni Jisu lamphan thoidi rookmui jengmui rapne ih angta.
Tongmih mi hoonte, Demetrias ngeh ih angta ah ih Artemis Rangte nok laaphaang ah hoon ano, heh damdi reeraang paknaate loong asuh ngun rapne ih bi thuk rumta.
Erah thoidi heh pheehoon mootkaat likhiik o ih hoonta erah miloong ah khoonpoon ano baat rumta. “Jaaroh loong, sen ih jat ehan seng chang ah arah dowa ih tanih tengli.
Eno sen ih taatsok thaak an nyia sen na ih taat chaat thaak an Pool ih tiimjih hoon wan hala. Pool ih baat rumha lak ih hoonha ah mabah uh rangte tah angka, eno Ephesas nyia Esia hah re dowa miloong ah rapne ih roonphak rumha.
Seng pheehoon mootkaat ah rakmu riike nyia cho etheng ih hoonla. Erah luulu lah angthang eh, Artemis men arang ju maat ih baat ah, erah thoidi cho etheng ih hoonla—heh rang ah Esia nyia hakong rookwet ni tanih soomha!”
Erah jengkhaap ah chaat rum ano mih lomkhoon rumta loong ah rapne ih khah rum ano riiraak rumta, “Ephesas dowa Artemis ah rakla!”
Erah chikrok tiit ah samnuthung noongrep ni ruurangta. Mesidoniate wanyi Gaius nyia Aristarkos, Pool damdi roong tum khoomte anyi, miloong ah ih seehoon boongkaat nok adi hoom kaat rumta.
Pool heh teeteewah midung ni kaat suh taat liita, eno hanpiite loong ah ih takaat thuk rumta.
Erah hah dowa, marah marah ngoong awang Pool joonte loong ah ih uh, seehoon boongkaat nok adoh nak toom tupkhoom kawe ah ngeh ih jengkhaap maatbaat rumta.
Erah pootdi ngoongthumte loong ah rapne ih phaangdat rumta; miloong ah jihoh jihoh riiraak rumta, mamah liidi neng dung ni mih ehanko ah ih tiim thoidi lomkhoon wang rumta erah tajat rumta.
Jehudi mihak phokhoh loong ah ih Alekjendar ah tiim jeng theng ang abah uh an jeng theng li rum ano ngakhoh ko tut haatkaat rumta. Eno Alejander ih nak hoopti an ngeh ih heh lak ah tangjap ano neng teewah pangjeng jeng suh taat chungta.
Eno neng ih Jehudi ngeh ih jatrum ano phoosiitsiit tiit ah koonta nyi riiraak rumta: Ephesas dowa Artemis ah rakla!”
Lithoon ni samnuh dowa apit ni mootte warah ih miloong ah kok manghoop rumta. “Ephisas phoh ano loong!” “Warep ih jat eha Ephesas samnuthung ah Artimis rangsoomnok nyia esa jong thiinte, eno erah jong ah rang nawa dat taha ngeh ah.
O ih uh tajen daanka. Erah raangtaan eh, sen lahoopti theng, lalangka ah lareeraang theng.
Arah mih anyi ih seng rangsoomnok uh tathet haatka adoleh rangte tiit uh labaat nyuuka di siitkaat halan.
Demetrius nyia heh mootkaatte loong ah ih o tiit hoontheng ang abah uh, sen tiit hoonkotte elong elang eje adoleh tiit hoon theng nok uh saarookwet raangtaan ih eje; tiit ah erah doh hoon theng.
Adoleh, tiit ajeng ah erah nang ih elong ih hoon theng li an baleh, nok atang loongtang ngathong nah tiit ah hoon theng.
Chiinnyah tiit ajeng arah dongla lidoh, cho etheng eje mat ah o ih chaang theng ah. Arah mat dong hoomte ah biin anaan tahoonru; seng ih uh tiim thoilam di ang koja erah tami baatke.” Erah jengkhaap jeng lidi, ngoongthumte loong ah saapsoon ih thuk rumta.
Hoongrok haphaang ah sem lidi, Pool ih hanpiite loong ah khoonpoon rum ano, chaankot jengkhaap ah jeng koh rum ano raajeng rumta eno Mesidonia ko ih wangta.
Pool erah hah lam ih wang ano chaankot jengkhaap ah miloong asuh rapne ih koh thiin rumta. Erah lih adi Akaia hah ni thok ano,
laajom tongthiinta. Siria nah wang ang ngeh ih taat khookhaam adi Jehudi loong ih heh tek haat suh kaankoong rumta ah Pool ih jatjoot eta; erah raangtaan ih Pool Mesidonia lam ih ngaakwang chungta.
Heh damdi Puros sah Sopater, Beria hah nawa roongwangta; erah damdi Thesalonika nawa, Aristarkas nyia Sekundas, Derbe nawa Gaius, Esia hah nawa langla Taichikas nyia Trophimas; eno Timothi loong ah nep wakwang rumta.
Neng loong ah sengngah sengngah ban wangrum ano Troas ni banwan tahe.
Toomuh Kham Kuwaang lih adi Philippi nawa juulam ih daansoon eno, sa bangnga lidi Troas ni chomui eno erah ni sa sinat tongthiinti.
Huuniibaat rangja di rang chosoomti adi phaksat ah room phaksah eti. Pool erah saalih adi rangkhano ih wangte ang ano, miloong ah damdi rangphe thungkham di thok roong waanta.
Seng khoontongti nokkhoh adi weetook loong ah phaak eta.
Jaaro wasiit heh men ah Eutikaas ngeh ih angta ah wokaacha ni tongta, eno Pool ih tiitwaan jangbaat adi, Eutikaas ah heh jupmot ih ngotdatta, eno mokjup ano nokkhoh thoongjom khoh nawa datti kata. Taat toonpi karum ano, tekmang angta.
Eno Pool ah echaan ih daatkhoom kah ano khekjoh kata. “Nak sotsaam an” Pool ih baat rumta, “amadi heh ething!”
Eno lamtok nokkhok adi we ngaakwang ano, baanlo ah chep hoom phak wangta. Neng damdi rekamdook eh rangsa laandongroh roongwaan rum ano Pool ah doksoon kata.
Jaaro ah nok ni ething ih piikaat rum ano miloong ah neng ten kokchem rumta.
Assos nawa Pool ban toonhui kaat suh seng juukaari ni jaakhoh ban daansoonti. Emah eh kaat theng ngeh ih Pool ih baatthiin tahe, eno heh ah saanghook lam ih wangta.
Assos ni chomui eno, Mitilene ne kaat suh toonhui kati.
Erah dowa juulam ih daansoon kah eno Kios ni saasiit adi thok kati. Erah saalih adi Samos ni thokti, erah lih adi Miletus ni thok wangti.
Esia hah nah rangsa photham ah ngeh ih li ano, Pool ih Ephesas ni wang chungta. Lek jen ang abah, Jerusalem nah Pentikos maangdoh thok suh ngeh ih thuuhuuta.
Pool Miletus ni ang adi Ephesaste suh, chaas mihak phokhoh loong toom chomui rumha ngeh ih jengkhaap maatbaatta.
Eno heh jiinni thokrum kano li rumta, “Sen ih jat ih han sen damdi ang tahang adoh ngah tiimthan saajang mamah ih roongtong tahang, Esia hah nawa phangthok sa dowa ih ah.
Jehudi loong ih nga tek haat taatchung tahang adoh nga mikse ah janhaat angno Teesu laksuh angkang ngeh ih rekamdook ih seklilih ih mokah tang.
Sen raangtaan ih mamah doh se ah li angno tiim nyoot theng angta nokwah dungni ni nyia sen nok ni thoontang nyootsoot rum taha.
Jehudi nyia Ranglajatte loongtang suh phoosiitsiit ih baat rum tang sen rangdah nawa Rangte jiinko wang hanno Teesu Jisu hanpi an ngeh ah.
Amadi bah ngah Esa Chiiala jeng chaatchaat ih Jerusalem ko ih kalang, erah nah mamah ang koja ngah ih tajatkang.
Ngah suh Esa Chiiala ih erah ba baat halang samnuthung rookwet ni chamnaang nyia phaatak ah nga raangtaan ih ban tong roh ela ngeh ah.
Enoothong ngah ih hanpi hang nga roidong ah tiimtha uh tah angka; ngah ih hanpi hang Teesu ih mootthuk halang ah ba mokah ang, erah langla Rangte minchan ruurang tiit ah tumbaat theng.
“Ngah sen loong hani tumkhoom lang, eno Rangte hasong tiit ah tumbaat hang. Amadi ngah ih jat ehang sen ih ngah mabah uh takah japtup ri ang ah
Erah raangtaan ih chiinnyah baat rumhala: Sen loong ah emat ih anbah nga matkapjih tah angka.
Tiimnge liidi Rangte tenthun tiit ah mathan angta thoontang baat ih rum taha.
Erah raangtaan ih Esa Chiiala ih sokboi thuk halan saapsah loong ah rapniine ih sokboi an. Hesah sih jun ih Rangte chaas ni sen loong ah saapriimte heh sah angthuk halan.
Ngah ih jat ehang nga doksoon lidoh, so loong ah sendung nah wang haano, saap ah tachiimka ang ah.
Saapoot thok ha doh miwah loong ah ih mih mokwaan rum ano hanpiite loong ah pheehoom rum ah eno neng lih phanjoot thuk rum ah.
Erah raangtaan ih naririh ih tongtha an, paangjom adi rangwu rangphe ih nga mikse ah janhaat angno nyootsoot rumhala ah samthun roh ih an.
“Sen loong ah Rangte lakhui ni nyia heh minchan jengkhaap ni look haat rumhala, eno juuba Rangte ih heh mina raangtaan ih thiinha minchan khui nah hak thuk suh romseetam kohan.
Ngah ih o jiin nawa hun, kom nyia nyuh akhat tasuh rumra.
Sen teenuh teewah ih jat ehan nga raangtaan nyia nga joon loong raangtaan ih nga laklak ih ngun ah bi angno phaksahi.
Seng loong asuh jirep ah noisok rumhala motchaan kaatchaan ah kah eno changthih noodek suh mamah ih chokot theng ah, Jisu ih baat tahan jengkhaap ah samthun roh ih an, “Echoh ehi nang ih ekot ehi ah tenroon ehan.”
Pool thoonjeng ano, neng damdi heh lakuh ni chooktong ano rangsoomta.
Mih thoontang hu rum ano chupphak rumta eno khekjoot damdi raajeng rumta.
Pool ih takah chotup ri li kano miloong ah ehan thungthih rumta. Eno juukaari adi diisiitkaat rumta.
Neng damdi raajeng thiin eno kati. Ju adi phangla ih daan jopkaat eno, Kos ni thok tahe, erah saalih adi Rhodes ni, erah dowa ih Patara ni kati.
Erah ni kah eno Phoenesia ni wangte juukaari esiit japtup kati, erah di duukah eno daansoon wangti.
Erah di Kipras ah japtup kati, juumeh ko ih Siria ni daanjoop wanti. Tair hah adi juukaang ko wang eno, juukaari ah ih huikhaak loong ah datthiin eta.
Erah hah adi hanpiite loong ah damdi sa sinat tongthiinti. Chiiala chaan nawa ih Pool suh neng ih Jerusalem nah nak kaat theng ngeh ih baat rumta.
Enoothong neng damdi jen roong tongthiin eno, seng kaat theng lamko ih dokchap kati. Samnuthung dowa miloong ah neng sanuh nyia neng sah loong ah siit ano juukaang adi roongra rum taha, erah di seng lakuh ni tong eno rangsoomti.
Eno seng loong ah raajeng mui eno, juukaari ni toon du ti neng ah engaak wang ih rumta.
Seng Tair dowa juulam ih karoh karoh eti eno Ptomais ni tong kati, erah ni hanpiite loong asuh jengse ah ra eno sasiit tong kati.
Erah saalih adi dokchap eno Kaiseria ni thokti. Erah ni Ewanjelist Philip nok ni jam kati, wasinat tung dowa heh Jerusalem ni tongte kristaan loong chosokte danje dowa.
Heh sah jaalah wabajiiji hasong maangkah ang rumta eno neng Rangte tiit baatte ang rumta.
Agubas khowah Judaia nawa thok taha doh seng erah ni sa sinat tongti.
Heh seng reeni wang haano, Pool romkhe ah suh eta, eno romkhe ah ih heh teewah lak alah ah kit ano jengta, “Esa Chiiala ih amah liiha: Roomkhe changte warah Jerusalem nah Jehudi loong ih emamah ih khak ano Ranglajatte loong suh korum ah.”
Erah chaat eno, erah hah dowa phoh ano loong nep roongjeng taha, Jerusalem nah lakaat weetheng ngeh ih taat chuut hu ti.
Eno Pool ih ngaakli tahe, “Sen tiimte hu lan, nga tenthun tiim esuh saap thuk lan? Ngah Jerusalem nah emah ih kitsuh luulu takhookham kang, Teesu Jisu raangtaan ih etek esuh nep khookham hang.”
Lakah jen nuune baattaan keeno liiti, “Teesu tenthun mongtham ju toom ang ah.”
Chomroe tong eno, seng huikhaak ah jamjaang eno Jerusalem ni kaat suh dok chapti.
Kaisiria nawa heliphante mararah ah seng damdi roong ra taha eno Mnason nok ni naangjam suh siitkaat tahe—heh langla Kipras hah nawa angta maang ih dook Rangte menjatte ah.
Jerusalem ni thok kino, Rangte menjatte loong ih tenroon woksoon ih lam banchoh tahe.
Erah saalih adi Jeems damdoh chomui suh Pool seng damdi roong ra taha; eno erah ni chaas nawa mihak phokhoh loong eje ang rumta.
Pool ih jengkhaapse ah ra rum ano Ranglajatte loong damdi heh teewah Rangte ih mamah ih maakta nyia mootkaat thukta tiit ah baat rumta.
Pool jeng ah boichaat rum ano loongtang ih Rangte rangphoong rumta. Eno li rumta, “Seng loong phoh ano Pool, an ih tup eh hu haajaat mathan Jehudi loong ah rangsoomte eh hoonla, enoothong neng loong ah Hootthe lam ah phanroh ih rumha.
Jehudi loong ih jen japchaat eta, an ih Ranglajatte deek akaan ni songte Jehudi loong suh Moses Hootthe ah lakah kap theng nyia nengsuh nengsah khoopkhan banlam ah lahoon theng adoleh Jehudi banlam ah lakah kap theng ngeh ih nyootsoottu rah ah.
Neng ih an thok ah jat jaatjaat eha. Eno, mamah etheng ah?
Seng ih thun hi abah an ih emah re udoh phan ah. Arah di thoomhoon choi mih wabaji je ah.
Chingkhothook thengnah neng damdoh roong kah uno neng lakkhoom ladi thaang ah koh eh uh; eno juuba neng khoh ah sui eh ah. Emah ang ano ba mirep ih an tiit waanla ah tiit hu ruurangla ngeh ih thun rum ah, erah nang ebah heh teewah jaatjaat eh Moses Hootthe jun ih songtongla ngeh ih thun rumho.
Enoothong Ranglajatte dowa o mina ih Rangte men jat ha, erah loong asuh seng roongwaanti tiit ah le jen raangmaat eti; romchoi phaksat ah laphaksat theng, khoisat luiamaan ah laphak theng, hesih laphak theng, adoleh mih damdoh roomjup roomtong laje theng adoleh sak lapiin theng ngeh ah.”
Erah raangtaan ih Pool ih miloong ah siit ano erah saalih adi neng damdi chingkhothook roong kata. Eno Pool Rangteenok ni wang ano leeraang ah amah raang ano rapwanta; chingkhothook ah sa mathan doh thoon ah adoleh khojoop ah wasiit wasiit suh mabah hoonkot theng ah.
Sa sinat thoon nanah di, Esia hah nawa Jehudi loong ih Pool Rangteenok ni japtup wang rum taha. Neng loong ah ih mih khoontongta loong ah phaangdat thuk rum ano Pool ah jokhak eh rumta.
Neng loong ah riiraak rumta, “Ijirel noksong loong!” “Roong johe! Arah mih ah langbo ah noongrep ni Ijirel mih thetbaatte, Moses Hootthe thetbaatte nyia arah Rangteenok thetbaatte ra ah. Eno Ranglajatte mih nep siitwan haano arah esa Rangteenok ah nyaansaan wang hala!”
(Erah jeng rumta ah langla Epheses nawa Triphimus ah Pool damdi samnuh ni japtup rumta, eno neng ih thunta Rangteenok ni Pool ih nopsiit eh wan hala ngeh ah.)
Samnuh thungtang hoongrok haphaang chikrokta, miloong ah khoonsoon ano, Rangteenok nawa Pool ah dok hoom ih kaat rumta. Lakdamdam eh Rangteenok paakaalu ah tangsak eh rumta.
Room nok hah arami saahaap ih Jerusalem ni chikrokla ah japchaat tokdi miloong ah ih Pool tek haat taatchung rumta.
Erah japchaat ano arami loong nyia saahaap wahoh loong ah siit ano saahaap elong ah lakdamdam eh miloong ah taangko karumta. Arami loong ah siit ano kaat kano, miloong ah ih Pool buh rumta ah toihaat eh rumta.
Saahaap elong ah Pool taangko wang ano jowangta eno jaanruh enyi ih kit thuk rumta. Erah lih adi chengta, “Arah mih ah o angla, tiimjih thet kota?”
Mih lomkhoon rumta dowa wasiit maama wasiit maama eh riiraak rumta. Hoongrok haphaang ang kano saahaap elong ah ih tiimjih mamah angla erah tajat jota, erah raangtaan eh heh mina loong asuh Pool ah sipaahi tongtheng adi siitkaat thuk rumta.
Miloong ah Pool likapkap eh kaat rum kano sipaahi loong ah ih Pool ah toonhui eh rumta tiimnge liidi miloong ah woma si thung ang rumta.
Miloong helih helih phanri rumta, “Tek haat etheng tek haat etheng ngeh ah!”
Arami loong ah ih Pool ah sipaahi tongtheng ah noppi nanah di saahaap elong asuh chengta: “An suh tiim atiim tambaat weeha?” “Grik jenglam ih waanho, miijeng nih kah eh uh?” Saahaap elong ah ih chengta.
“Miinyah marang changrook donghoom uno hajaat baji mina phisang hah ni siiara hoonkaat thukte Ijip mih ah an tanih angko?”
Pool ih baatta, “Ngah Jehudi nok hah, Kilia dowa Tarsas samnuthung ni tup hang ah. Miloong ah damdoh roongwaan weethuk hang.”
Saahaap elong ah ih jeng thukta, eno Pool ah diihutok adi toonchap ano miloong asuh nak hoopti an ngeh ih heh lak japta. Miloong ah tikdat kano Pool Hebru jengdi baatta:
“Jehudi phoh ano loong, boichaat thaak he sen ngathong ni nga puipang tiit jenglang rah ah!”
Hebru jenglam eh waan rum kano, ehanhan eh tikdat rumta, eno Pool ah jangjeng kata.
“Ngah Jehudi nok hah, Silika hah Tarsas ni tup hang rah, enoothong Gamaliel le wette ang angno Jerusalem hah aradi hak ang rah. Ngah ih sengte sengwah Hootthe ah rapne eh nyoot angno, chiinnyah sen ang lan ah likhiik ngah uh Rangte lakni lok hang rah.
Teesu lamphante loong ah ngah ih lanti laan mah roh eh siiwi rumtang. Minuh miwah jokhaakleh phaatak ni sak rumtang.
Romwah phokhothoon nyia Ngoongthumte loong ih nep jen deenbaat ehan ngah ih ami tam aha tiit baat hang rah ah. Nengphoh nengno Damaskus ni tongte loong asuh le ah raangleh nga lak ni kakoh rum tahang , enooleh Damaskas dowa kristaan miloong ah jaanruh ih kitleh Jerusalem ni kasiiwi wan rum tahang.
“Damaskas hah thok nanah di, rangnithung di rang nawa nga reeni weephaak ah likhiik eh phaak ra taha.
Hah ni loongdat angno ngasuh liihang rah miroot japchaat tang, ‘Sool, Sool! An ih tiim esuh siiwi halang?’
‘Eno chengtang, Teesu an o anglu?’ ‘Ngah Najaret hah dowa Jisu, an ih siiwi halang ah,’ ngeh ih ngaakli tahang.
Nga dam dowa miloong ah ih weephaak ah tup eh rumta, enoothong erah waan taha root ah tachaat rumta.
Ngah ih chengtang, ‘Teesu, ngah ih tiimjih eh ang?’ Eno Teesu ih ngasuh baat tahang, ‘Toonchap uh Damaskas nah kah uh, an ih tiim etheng ah Rangte ih erah nah baat ho.’
Weephaak nawa ih edook eh hoontang, erah thoidi nga joon loong ah ih nga lakni siit rum hangno Damaskas ko kati.
“Erah samnuthung adi sengte sengwah Hootthe jatte Ananias ngeh ih mih wasiit angta, heh erah hah adi songtongte angta nyia Jehudi loong ih rapne eh choomjoh rumta.
Heh nga reeni chapwang haano, li tahang, nga no ‘Sool, weetup eh uh!’ Erah jeng damdam eh kaasok angno heh japtuptang.
Ananias ih baat tahang, ‘Sengte sengwah Rangte ih heh tenthun mongtham ah jatthuk suh danje halu, adoleh heh laksuh kateng tiit ah jatthuk suh, nyia heh jeng ah boichaat suh danje halu.
Tiimnge liidi, an ih tiim chaat hu nyia tiim tup hu erah ah mirep miraang suh toombaatte angthuk suh ngeh ih li halu.
Ano bah, an ih tiimjih ma kaban uh? Toonchap uthong, an rangdah ah saasiit suh rang ah soom uno ju nah thong tem kah uh.’
“Jerusalem ni ngaakwang angno, Rangteenok ni rangsoom tang adi,
motmang ni, nga Teesu tuptang, eno heheh ih baat tahang, ‘Jerusalem nawa kharok eh doksoon uh, arah dowa miloong asuh nga tiit ah laatbaat ubah uh tabaam boichaat ru ang ah.’
Ngah ih ngaakli tang, ‘Teesu,’ ‘Ngah Jehudi Rangsoomnok ni kah angno an liphante loong ah jokhak katang nyia buthom tang ah neng ih jat eha.
Eno an haaki Stephen tek haat rumta doh, ngah eje angtang, heh tek thukte nyia heh tek haatte nyuh akhat sokboite aju ngah angtang.’
Eno nga Teesu ih baat tahang, ‘Kah uh’ ‘tiimnge liidi an Ranglajatte loong reenah haloot nah kaat thuk ha.’”
Miloong ah ih Pool jengkhaap ah maang thoon jengjeng eh boichaat rumta; eno erongwah ih riiraak rumta, “Phanhaat eh an! Tek haat eh an! Heh ething tong theethe tah angka!”
Miloong ah riiraak rum ano, neng nyuh ah jap eh rumta, botbung ah rangkhoh ni wenhaat eh rumta.
Room nok hah arami saahaap elong ah ih heh mina loong asuh Pool ah sipaahi loong tongtheng ni siitkaat thuk rumta, eno Pool thoidi Jehudi loong erah than tiimnge ih riiraak rumta ah jatjoot suh Pool ah botthuk rumta.
Enoothong bot esuh ngeh ih taatkit rum adi, heh reeni chapta saahaap asuh Pool ih chengta, “Heh thet re mat ah maang thaak hoonka doh Room nok hah ah mi botthom nih eh ah?”
Erah chaat ano saahaap ah, heh nang ih elong asuh cheng wangta, “Tiimjih hoon hu? Mih abah Room nok hah joh!”
Eno saahaap elong ah ih Pool suh cheng kata, “Baat thaak hang, an Room nok hah nih ah?” “Ele” Pool ih ngaakbaatta.
Saahaap elong ah ih liita, “Ngah ebah Room nok hah eh hoon suh ngun rapne ih kotang.” Eno Pool ih liita, “Ngabah tup tahang dowa eh Room hate.”
Pool suh chengte loong ah erah damdam eh heh re dowa neng liko eh heng soon rumta; eno saahaap elong ah Room nok hah mokkhak hang ngeh ih rapne eh choota.
Saahaap elong ah ih Pool aju Jehudi loong ah ih tiim thoidi thet haat suh liiha ngeh ih jat suh taat liita; erah thoidi erah saalih adi Pool lak dowa jaanruh ah jaahaat thuk ano Romwah phokhoh nyia noksong loongtang chomui thuk suh baat rumta. Eno Pool siitkaat ano neng ngathong ni chap thukta.
Pool ih ngoomthumte loong taangko sok ano jengta, “Phoh ano Ijirel noksong! Chiinnyah tuk eh Rangte ngathong ni ngaathung ngaatak phanjangjang eh songtong lang.”
Erah chaat ano Romwah phokhoh Ananias ih Pool reeni chapte loong asuh heh tui ni mangbot suh baat rumta.
Eno Pool ih Romwah phokhoh asuh liita, “An lonoite—Rangte ih amiisak eh baangbuho! Erah di tong uno Hootthe ah pi uno dande hu, ang ah bah uh nga baangbot baat hu ah ih an thet haat hu!”
Heh re tiittiit chapte loong ah ih Pool suh li rumta, “An ih Rangte Romwah phokhothoon kaanju hu!”
Pool ih ngaakli rumta, “Phoh ano Ijirel noksong, Ngah ih Romwah phokhothoon ngeh ih tajattang. Rangteele ni liiha, ‘Mabah uh noksong pante suh an ih ethih lali theng.”
Miloong dung ni mararah ah Pharisi, mararah ah Sadusi japtup rum ano, Ngoongthum theng ni Pool ih dokpoon rumta, “Ijirel phoh ano loong! Ngah Pharisi sah, Parisiite ah. Tek nawa ngaaksaat lidoh roidong na suh laalom thoidi ngah adi thaak poon rum halang!”
Erah lih adi, Pharisi nyia Sadusis loong ah neng jaachi ni phang rookmui rum ano, dungnyi eh hoon rumta. (
Sadusis loong ah ih liita mina tek nawa tangaak saatka, eno chiiala nyia heh kaamwah uh tajeeka; enoothong, Pharisi loong ah eh arah ejomjom hanpiiha.)
Erah thoidi we we boot riiraak eh rumta, eno Pharisi nok hah mararah Hootthe nyootte loong ah toonchap rum ano thidokdok eh daan rumta: “Arah mina thih arah tatupke! Heh damdi chiiala nyia rangsah tam roongwaan kotaaja!”
Choophaan phaan eh daanmui rum kano saahaap elong ah Pool maalek tek haat rumja oh ngeh ih choota. Erah thoidi heh bante loong ah datkhoom kah rum ano midung nawa Pool ah sipaahi tongtheng adi siitkaat thuk rumta.
Erah rangphe adi Pool ngathong ni Teesu ah chap ano heh suh baatta, “Nakcho uh! Jerusalem ni an nga haaki ang uh, eno Room nah uh emamah eh ang theng.”
Erah saalih adi Jehudi loong ah rangkhah di neng kaankoong tiit roongwaan suh khoontong rumta. Neng loong ah ih Pool maang tek haat haat tiim uh lajok phaksat theng ngeh ih kakham rumta.
Erah mongtham hoonte miloong ah rookbaji nang eh ehan ang rumta.
Eno Romwah phokhothoon nyia mihak phokhoh loong asuh baatwan rumta, “Seng ih Pool maang tek haat haat tiim uh lajok phaksat theng ngeh ih kakham hi joh.
Erah raangtaan ih Ngoong awang sen loong ah ih Room nok hah saahaap elong asuh Pool ah sen reenah toom siitkaat rumha ngeh ih maatbaat an, seng ih heh thoilam ah rapniine eh jat suh liihi ngeh ih diipli theng. Eno adoh maang thokra doh lam nah tek haat suh ban tong ih.”
Enoothong erah kaankoong ah Pool diik heh nah sah rah ih japchaatta; eno sipaahi tongtheng adi wang ano Pool suh hubaat wanta.
Eno Pool ih saahaap wasiit ah poon ano baatta, “Arah jaaro ah saahaap elong jiinnah siitwan uh; heh ih tiim atiim baat theng eje tih.”
Erah saahaap ah ih, elong ah reeni siitwan ano, baat wanta, “Pool phaatak ni sak hi eno heh ih poon hangno arah jaaro ah an reeni siitwan thuk halang, heh ih an suh tiim atiim baat theng eje tih.”
Saahaap ah ih heh lakni heh re tiittiit eh, johoom ano chengta, “Ngah suh tiimjaat baat theng ah.”
Eno jaaro ah ih baatta, “Jehudi dowa ngoong awang loong ah roongwaan rumta, rangkhah noksong reenah Pool siitkaat theng ngeh ih diipli rum ano, suwang rumho noksong ih heh thoilam ah rapniine eh jat suh li rumha tih ngeh ah.
Eno an ih nakmok boichaat uh, mih rookbaji nang eh ehan heh bansokte hutong rum ah. Neng ih kakham rumha Pool maang tek haat haat tiim uh lajok phaksat theng ngeh ah. Neng loong ah ih amadi an jengkhaap bansok halu.”
Saahaap elong ah ih liita, “Ngah suh baat halang ah o suh uh nakbaat uh joh.” Eno jaaro ah kaat thukta.
Eno saahaap elong ah ih saahaap wanyi poon ano baat nyuuta, “Kaisiria nah kaat suh sipaahi chaanyi, moksiitte rooksinat, pah piite chaanyi ban khookhaam an, niikja saapoot akhuh doh dokchap theng.
Pool raangtaan ih mok ah koh anno Kobono Pheliks reenah eseetham eh thoksiit an.”
Eno saahaap elong ah ih Kobono Pheliks suh le ah raangmaat eta:
“Elong elang Kludias Lisias, Kobono Pheliks: Jengkhaapse ra hala,
Jehudi loong ah ih arah mina ah joh ano tek haat taat eh rumta. Ngah ih chaattang heh Room nok hah, erah thoidi sipaahi loong ah siit angno pang wangtang.
Tiimthoi tiimlam di Jehudi loong ih mat eh jota erah ah jat suh ngeh ih neng Ngoongthum theng ni taatsiit kaattang.
Eno Pool tek haat theng nyia phaatak nah saktheng abah ngah ih tajat jokang; neng ih mat eh joha abah neng Hootthe chengmui thoidi.
Eno Pool tek haat suh kaankoong rumha ngeh ih chaat angno, lakdamdam eh an reeni wang thuk suh liitang. Mat eh deejootte loong asuh tiit ah an reenah hoon theng ngeh ih baat rum hang.”
Sipaahi loong ah dokchap eh rumta. Erah rangpheeja Pool ah Antipatris maang thokthok eh siitkaat rumta.
Erah saalih adi neng lah ih kaatte arami loong ah sipaahi tongtheng ni ngaakwang rumta eno moksiitte loong ah Pool damdoh wakkaat thuk suh erah ni thiinhaat rumta.
Kaisaria ni thok rum ano Kobono asuh le ah chokoh; Pool ah thiinhaat koh eh rumta.
Kobono ih le ah sok ano Pool suh o haate ah ngeh ih chengta. Silisia haate ngeh ih jat ano,
liita, “An mat eh jootte loong thok ha doh tiit ah ma paat ih.” Eno Pool ah sipaahi loong asuh Kobono tongta nok adi ban thuk rumta.
Sa bangnga lidi Romwah phokhothoon Ananias ih hadaang phokhoh nyia mat hoonte Tartullos ah siit ano Kaisiria ni kata. Neng loong ah Pheliks ngathong ni Pool matjoot tiit ah baatwan rumta.
Eno Pool ah noppoon wan ano, Tartullus ih mat tiit ah Kobono suh amah eh baatkota: “Elong elang! An ejatthoon ang thoidi rekamdook eh jaaseemoong eh pan hali, eno sengdeek sengkaan ese ang raangtaan eh jirep ah huksiit wan halu.
Eno arah likhiik ah saarookwet eh noongrep ni seechoh hi, lang ekah ngeh ih ju liihi.
Ngah ih an rangsa thamhoom suh tali kang, enoothong an ih amasah tiit hoon theng ah boichaat ih weetheng ngeh ih an lasih jowe hala.
Arah mih ah mih rookmui thukte nyia haphaang phakte; Jehudi jaachi ni noongrep ni mui phang donghoomha erah damdi Najaret dowa lamsiitte ah arah mih ah.
Rangsoomnok thetbaatte ah uh arah mih ah, erah thoidi jokhak hi.
<range>
Arah mih asuh cheng ubah, an teeteewah ih jirep ah jatjoh uh tiim esuh mat eh joh hi rah ah.”
Jehudi loong ah matpaat thengni khoonthok rum haano amiisak tiit baat ha ngeh ih roongjeng rumta.
Kobono ih Pool suh jeng uh ngeh ih heh lak japta, eno Pool ih liita, “Ngah ih jat ehang an ih arah deek adi rekamdook eh mat ah hoonkaat halu, eno an ngathong ni nga teewah pangjeng jeng suh tenroon ju.
An teeteewah ih ju jat eh uh, Jerusalem ni rangsoom wangtang ah asih saanyi nang eju ehan tah angka.
Rangsoomnok ni o damdi daanmui angrah uh Jehudi loong ih tatup rang, tam aleh Jehudi rangsoomnok ni nyia samnuthung mani bah uh haphaang hoom ang rah tuprum tahang.
Neng ih mat eh jorum halang ah an suh tajen noisok rumru.
Arah jengkhaap ah ngah ih thang ehang: Ngah ih sengte sengwah Rangte lih phanhang eno neng ih tah angka ngeh ih liiha. Moses Hootthe ni raangha nyia khowah loong ih raangta ah ngah ih jirep ah hanpi ehang.
Ngah uh neng laalomla likhiik Rangte suh laalom lang, mithih mise tek nawa ngaaksaat eh ah liiha ah uh laalom ehang.
Erah raangtaan ih Rangte nyia mina ngathong ni nga thung seklilih ansuh saarookwet eh thun hang.
“Rekam lidi Jerusalem ni ngaak hangno, nga mina loong chosok suh nyia nga Rangte suh kot suh ngun ah hui eh wan tahang.
Eno Rangsoomnok ni khojoop hoon ang rah neng ih tup eh rum tahang. Nga damdi mih uh tanang jeeta hah uh taphaang phaktang.
Enoothong Esia nawa Jehudi loong marah marah eje angta; ngah matjoot jilam ang dobah nengneng ra haano an ngathong nah baatkaat theng rum taha.
Adoleh, arah miloong asuh cheng uh, nok atang ngathong ni toonchap tang adoh ngah matkapjih tiim jat chojoh rum tahang—
neng ngathong ni toonchap tang adoh jaasiit ba jengtang: ‘Chiinnyah uh an ih tek nawa ngaaksaat tiit ah hanpi thoidi cheng halang.’”
Lampo ah jat ano Pheliks ih mat ah kharok eh hoon thukta. “Lisia saahaap elong ah thok taha doh” baat rumta, “Sen mat tiit ah ngah ih hoonkoh rumha.”
Pool sokboite saahaap asuh elong ah ih sipaahi ih rapniine toom ban rum ah ngeh ih baat rumta, enoothong hejoon hewaan uh toom chomui rum ah tiim kot theng ang abah uh toom koh rum ah ngeh ih baat rumta.
Saajombaji lidi Pheliks nyia heh minuh Drusilla, Jehudi nok hah kapta ah siit ano ra taha. Pool ah poon ano Jisu Kristo suh tuumaang tiit ah roongwaan rumta.
Enoothong Pool ih ese tiit, enaan tiit nyia Dande Rangwu tiit jangbaat kano Pheliks ah echo eh ano liita, “amadoh an jen doksoon et uh. Saapoot je adoh we poonha.”
Erah damdi Pool ih ngun hekoh hang ngeh ih mok laalomta; erah raangtaan eh hepoot hepoot doh poon angno roongwaan ang ngeh ih thunta.
Paang nyi lih ang ano, Pheliks lidi, Porkus Phestas ah Kobono angta. Jehudi loong ih ese toom choh hang thun ano Pheliks ih Pool ah phaatak ni sak thiinta.
Sa jom lidi, Phestas ah Kaisiria dowa Jerusalem ni kata,
romwah phokhoh nyia Jehudi dowa mihak phokhoh loong ah ih Pool mat hoon tiit ah erah ni hoonkaat rum taha. Neng ih Phestas
lasih joh rumta Pool Jerusalem nah siitkaat theng ngeh ah, neng loong ah ih Pool ah lam nah tek haat theng ngeh ih kaankoong rumta.
Phestas ih ngaakbaat rumta, “Pool bah Kaisiria ni phaatak ni tongla, ngah enah kharok eh ngaak wangte.
Sen mihak phokhoh loong ah Kaisiria nah nga damdoh toom wakwang rumha mat eh jootjih thetre kota bah ah.”
Neng damdi Phestas ah sa asat tam sa asih waktong ano Kaisiria ni kata. Erah saalih adi Phestas ah mat hoontheng nok adi tong ano Pool siitwan baat rumta.
Pool ah thokkoh haano, Jerusalem nawa ra taha Jehudi loong ah kookchap rum ano heh thetkhat tiit ah rapne ih daanmui rumta, erabah uh heh ah tiim thila erah tadong noisok rumta.
Eno Pool heteewah pangjeng jengta: “Jehudi Hootthe, Rangteenok nyia Luuwanglong ngathong ni ngah tathetre kang.”
Enoothong Jehudi loong ih toom se chohang li ano, Phestas ih Pool suh chengta, “Arah tiit ah Jerusalem nah nga pandoh hoonkaat suh tam nook uh?”
Pool ih liita, “Luuwanglong mat hoon theng noklong ni chaplang, nga mat hoon jilam ang abah uh arah doh hoon theng. An teewah ih jat ih halang, ngah Jehudi loong raangtaan ih tiim uh tathet reekang.
Nga mik laan mah roh hootthe thet hoom kohang bah adoleh thetre kolang bah, ngah ah puipang he ngeh ih tabaat rumra. Enoothong mat ih deejoh rum halang ah ami lah angka bah, o ih uh Jehudi loong lak nah nak haat he. Ngah ih Luuwanglong ngathong ni chuut hu lang.”
Heh suh hukbatte loong damdi roongwaan ano, Phestas ih ngaak baatta, “An ih Luuwanglong lasih johu, heh jiinnah kah uh.”
Rekam saapoot lidi Agrippa Luuwang nyia Bernis Kaisiria hah ni Phestas lamchoh kanyuuta.
Erah ni rekamdook tong kanyu ah lidi, Phestas ah Luuwang damdi Pool tiit roong waanta: “Pheliks ih phaatak ni sakthiin arah ani mih wasiit je ah;
eno ngah Jerusalem ni katang adi, Jehudi romwah phokhoh nyia hadaang phokhoh loong ih dut haat etheng ngeh ih tiit thok hoon rum taha.
Eno ngah ih baat rumtang seng Room nok hah bah matwah ah hechang hebente damdoh heteewah maangchoh waanwaan nyia heh teewah suh heh puipang jengkhaap lajeng thuk tami dut haatke.
Neng loong ah ani ra haano, ngah tasentong tang; erah saalih adi tiit hoon nok ni tong angno erah mih toonsiit kaat thuk rumtang.
Heh jeng phaakiite loong toonchap ano, heh thetkhat tiit tiim uh tajeng rumta, ngah ih thuntang heh thetre tiit jeng eh rum ah ngeh ah.
Neng loong ah nengrom nengrang tiit nyia jen tekchoi Jisu tiit ba daanmui rumta; enoothong Pool ih ething ngeh ih baat rumta.
Arah tiit ah mamah lam eh huk thoithaak ang ngeh ih ngah tiim uh tami thun tang, erah raangtaan ih tiit ah Jerusalem nah hoonkaat suh maanook ju oh ngeh ih Pool suh chengtang.
Enoothong Pool chuut huuta; nga bante suh rapniine eh riikoi sokboi thuk heeno mat tiit ah Luuwanglong ih toom paat ah. Erah raangtaan eh Luuwanglong reeni maang wang thukthuk sipaahi loong asuh riikoi sokboi thuk rumtang.”
Agrippa ih Phestas suh liita, “Arah mih jeng ah nga teeteewah ih chaat suh liihang.” Eno Phestas ih baatta, “Rangkhah an ih chochaat eh uh.”
Erah saalih adi Agrippa nyia Bernis ih arami saahaap elongthoon nyia samnuthung dowa mihak phokhoh loong ah siitnyu ano nok atang thuttheeta nok adi wangrum taha. Phestas ih baat kano, Pool ah nopsiit wanrum taha.
Phestas ih liita, “Agrippa Luuwang nyia adi khoon thokte noksong paangmeh loong: Arah mih ah sok thaak an, heh tiit ah ani waate nyia Jerusalem ni songtongte, Jehudi loongtang ih ngasuh chuiwan rum taha rah ah. Eno neng loong ah riiraak rumta ething lakah boot tongthuk theng.
Enoothong hemik laan mah roh eh thetre arah bah ngah ih tiim uh tachoh jokang. Adoleh heh Luuwanglong ngathong ni heteteewah chuut hu phiino, ngah ih Luuwanglong reenah kaatthukte anglang.
Enoothong Luuwanglong suh tiim raangmaat theng ah tiim uh amuh. Erah raangtaan ih sen ngathong ni Pool thoksiit halang—Agrippa Luuwang, an ngathong ni ah—timnge liidi, heh thetre thaakcheng eno, tiim bah uh mi raangmaat eh suh ah.
Ngah ih thunhang ah langla phaatak ni tiim thoilam di tongla erah lajat thang eh Luuwanglong reeni kaat thuk ah nga thung ni tapunka.”
Agrippa ih Pool suh liita, “An teeteewah tiit jen baat eh uh.” Pool heh lak ah janghaat ano heteewah tiit ah amah baatta:
“Agrippa Luuwang! Nga teeteewah suh khangraangse liihang chiinnyah ngah an ngathong ni chap angno Jehudi loong ih mat eh deejoh halang tiit ah baat hang,
Jehudi rom arang nyia rookmui jengmui ah an ih rapniine ih jat hu, erah thoidi, nga jeng ah naririh eh boichaat weeuh.
“Jehudi mina loongtang ih jat eha jaaro dowa eh ngah mamah eh songtong lang. Nga roidong tang mamah eh songlang neng ih jat eha, nga hah ni mamah songtang, erah lidi Jerusalem ni mamah eh songlang.
Ngah ih liihang ah langla, nga tiit ah neng ih ejen baat eh ah, neng ih jirep ah ejat, jaakhoh ni ngah Pharisi rom arang ah kap angno songtong tang.
Eno ngah adi chaplang abah sengte sengwah suh Rangte ih kakhamta suh laalom thoidi—
seng mina asih jaatnyi ih erah chosuh laalomla, erah raangtaan ih rangwu rangphe Rangte rangsoom rumha. Luuwang, erah suh laalom thoidi ba, Jehudi loong ih mat eh joh rum halang!
Arah di tongte sen loong ah ih tek nawa Rangte ih ngaaksaat thukta tiit hanpi ah mamah eh chaan chohan?
“Nga teewah ih uh Najaret dowa Jisu tiit ah emah ju eh daan tang.
